163 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> iuse_transform::clone() const
164 {
165  return std::make_unique<iuse_transform>( *this );
166 }
167 
168 void iuse_transform::load( const JsonObject &obj )
169 {
170  obj.read( "target", target, true );
171 
172  obj.read( "msg", msg_transform );
173  obj.read( "variant_type", variant_type );
174  obj.read( "container", container );
175  obj.read( "sealed", sealed );
176  if( obj.has_member( "target_charges" ) && obj.has_member( "rand_target_charges" ) ) {
177  obj.throw_error_at( "target_charges",
178  "Transform actor specified both fixed and random target charges" );
179  }
180  obj.read( "target_charges", ammo_qty );
181  if( obj.has_array( "rand_target_charges" ) ) {
182  for( const int charge : obj.get_array( "rand_target_charges" ) ) {
183  random_ammo_qty.push_back( charge );
184  }
185  if( random_ammo_qty.size() < 2 ) {
186  obj.throw_error_at( "rand_target_charges",
187  "You must specify two or more values to choose between" );
188  }
189  }
190  obj.read( "target_ammo", ammo_type );
191 
192  obj.read( "target_timer", target_timer );
193 
194  if( !ammo_type.is_empty() && !container.is_empty() ) {
195  obj.throw_error_at( "target_ammo", "Transform actor specified both ammo type and container type" );
196  }
197 
198  obj.read( "active", active );
199 
200  obj.read( "moves", moves );
201  if( moves < 0 ) {
202  obj.throw_error_at( "moves", "transform actor specified negative moves" );
203  }
204 
205  obj.read( "need_fire", need_fire );
206  need_fire = std::max( need_fire, 0 );
207  if( !obj.read( "need_charges_msg", need_charges_msg ) ) {
208  need_charges_msg = to_translation( "The %s is empty!" );
209  }
210 
211  obj.read( "need_charges", need_charges );
212  need_charges = std::max( need_charges, 0 );
213  if( !obj.read( "need_fire_msg", need_fire_msg ) ) {
214  need_fire_msg = to_translation( "You need a source of fire!" );
215  }
216 
217  obj.read( "need_worn", need_worn );
218  obj.read( "need_wielding", need_wielding );
219 
220  obj.read( "need_empty", need_empty );
221 
222  obj.read( "qualities_needed", qualities_needed );
223 
224  obj.read( "menu_text", menu_text );
225 }
226 
227 std::optional<int> iuse_transform::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
228 {
229  int scale = 1;
230  auto iter = it.type->ammo_scale.find( type );
231  if( iter != it.type->ammo_scale.end() ) {
232  scale = iter->second;
233  }
234  if( !p ) {
235  debugmsg( "%s called action transform that requires character but no character is present",
236  it.typeId().str() );
237  return std::nullopt;
238  }
239 
240  int result = 0;
241 
242  if( need_fire ) {
243  if( !p->use_charges_if_avail( itype_fire, need_fire ) ) {
244  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, need_fire_msg, it.tname() );
245  return std::nullopt;
246  }
247  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
248  return std::nullopt;
249  }
250  }
251 
252  if( !msg_transform.empty() ) {
253  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, msg_transform, it.tname() );
254  }
255 
256  // Uses the moves specified by iuse_actor's definition
257  p->mod_moves( -moves );
258 
259  if( need_fire && p->has_trait( trait_PYROMANIA ) ) {
260  if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
261  p->add_msg_if_player( m_mixed,
262  _( "You light a fire, but it isn't enough. You need to light more." ) );
263  } else {
264  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You happily light a fire." ) );
265  p->add_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_STARTFIRE, 5, 10, 3_hours, 2_hours );
266  p->rem_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_NOFIRE );
267  }
268  }
269 
270  if( it.count_by_charges() != target->count_by_charges() && it.count() > 1 ) {
271  item take_one = it.split( 1 );
272  do_transform( p, take_one, variant_type );
273  p->i_add_or_drop( take_one );
274  } else {
275  do_transform( p, it, variant_type );
276  }
277 
278  if( it.is_tool() ) {
279  result = scale;
280  }
281  return result;
282 }
283 
284 void iuse_transform::do_transform( Character *p, item &it, const std::string &variant_type ) const
285 {
286  item obj_copy( it );
287  item *obj;
288  // defined here to allow making a new item assigned to the pointer
289  item obj_it;
290  if( container.is_empty() ) {
291  obj = &it.convert( target, p );
292  obj->set_itype_variant( variant_type );
293  if( ammo_qty >= 0 || !random_ammo_qty.empty() ) {
294  int qty;
295  if( !random_ammo_qty.empty() ) {
296  const int index = rng( 1, random_ammo_qty.size() - 1 );
297  qty = rng( random_ammo_qty[index - 1], random_ammo_qty[index] );
298  } else {
299  qty = ammo_qty;
300  }
301  if( !ammo_type.is_empty() ) {
302  obj->ammo_set( ammo_type, qty );
303  } else if( obj->is_ammo() ) {
304  obj->charges = qty;
305  } else if( !obj->ammo_current().is_null() ) {
306  obj->ammo_set( obj->ammo_current(), qty );
307  } else if( obj->has_flag( flag_RADIO_ACTIVATION ) && obj->has_flag( flag_BOMB ) ) {
308  obj->set_countdown( 1 );
309  } else {
310  obj->set_countdown( qty );
311  }
312  }
313  } else {
314  obj = &it.convert( container, p );
315  obj->set_itype_variant( variant_type );
316  int count = std::max( ammo_qty, 1 );
317  item cont;
318  if( target->count_by_charges() ) {
319  cont = item( target, calendar::turn, count );
320  count = 1;
321  } else {
322  cont = item( target, calendar::turn );
323  }
324  for( int i = 0; i < count; i++ ) {
325  if( !it.put_in( cont, pocket_type::CONTAINER ).success() ) {
326  it.put_in( cont, pocket_type::MIGRATION );
327  }
328  }
329  if( sealed ) {
330  it.seal();
331  }
332  }
333 
334  if( target_timer > 0_seconds ) {
335  obj->countdown_point = calendar::turn + target_timer;
336  }
337  obj->active = active || obj->has_temperature() || target_timer > 0_seconds;
338  if( p && p->is_worn( *obj ) ) {
339  if( !obj->is_armor() ) {
340  item_location il = item_location( *p, obj );
341  p->takeoff( il );
342  } else {
343  p->calc_encumbrance();
344  p->update_bodytemp();
345  p->on_worn_item_transform( obj_copy, *obj );
346  }
347  }
348 
349  p->clear_inventory_search_cache();
350 }
351 
352 ret_val<void> iuse_transform::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
353  const tripoint & ) const
354 {
355  if( need_worn && !p.is_worn( it ) ) {
356  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You need to wear the %1$s before activating it." ),
357  it.tname() );
358  }
359  if( need_wielding && !p.is_wielding( it ) ) {
360  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You need to wield the %1$s before activating it." ),
361  it.tname() );
362  }
363  if( need_empty && !it.empty() ) {
364  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You need to empty the %1$s before activating it." ),
365  it.tname() );
366  }
367 
368  if( p.is_worn( it ) ) {
369  item tmp = item( target );
370  if( !tmp.has_flag( flag_OVERSIZE ) && !tmp.has_flag( flag_SEMITANGIBLE ) ) {
371  for( const trait_id &mut : p.get_mutations() ) {
372  const mutation_branch &branch = mut.obj();
373  if( branch.conflicts_with_item( tmp ) ) {
374  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Your %1$s mutation prevents you from doing that." ),
375  p.mutation_name( mut ) );
376  }
377  }
378  }
379  }
380 
381  if( need_charges && it.ammo_remaining( &p, true ) < need_charges ) {
382  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( string_format( need_charges_msg, it.tname() ) );
383  }
384 
385  if( qualities_needed.empty() ) {
386  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
387  }
388 
389  std::map<quality_id, int> unmet_reqs;
390  inventory inv;
391  inv.form_from_map( p.pos(), 1, &p, true, true );
392  for( const auto &quality : qualities_needed ) {
393  if( !p.has_quality( quality.first, quality.second ) &&
394  !inv.has_quality( quality.first, quality.second ) ) {
395  unmet_reqs.insert( quality );
396  }
397  }
398  if( unmet_reqs.empty() ) {
399  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
400  }
401  std::string unmet_reqs_string = enumerate_as_string( unmet_reqs.begin(), unmet_reqs.end(),
402  [&]( const std::pair<quality_id, int> &unmet_req ) {
403  return string_format( "%s %d", unmet_req.first.obj().name, unmet_req.second );
404  } );
405  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( n_gettext( "You need a tool with %s.",
406  "You need tools with %s.",
407  unmet_reqs.size() ), unmet_reqs_string );
408 }
409 
410 std::string iuse_transform::get_name() const
411 {
412  if( !menu_text.empty() ) {
413  return menu_text.translated();
414  }
415  return iuse_actor::get_name();
416 }
417 
418 void iuse_transform::finalize( const itype_id & )
419 {
420  if( !item::type_is_defined( target ) ) {
421  debugmsg( "Invalid transform target: %s", target.c_str() );
422  }
423 
424  if( !container.is_empty() ) {
425  if( !item::type_is_defined( container ) ) {
426  debugmsg( "Invalid transform container: %s", container.c_str() );
427  }
428 
429  // todo: check contents fit container?
430  // transform uses migration pocket if not
431  }
432 }
433 
434 void iuse_transform::info( const item &it, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
435 {
436  int amount = std::max( ammo_qty, 1 );
437  item dummy( target, calendar::turn, target->count_by_charges() ? amount : 1 );
438  dummy.set_itype_variant( variant_type );
439  // If the variant is to be randomized, use default no-variant name
440  if( variant_type == "<any>" ) {
441  dummy.clear_itype_variant();
442  }
443  if( it.has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
444  dummy.set_flag( flag_FIT );
445  }
446  if( target->count_by_charges() || !ammo_type.is_empty() ) {
447  if( !ammo_type.is_empty() ) {
448  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "<bold>Turns into</bold>: " ),
449  string_format( _( "%s (%d %s)" ), dummy.tname(), amount, ammo_type->nname( amount ) ) );
450  } else if( !container.is_empty() ) {
451  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "<bold>Turns into</bold>: " ),
452  amount > 1 ?
453  string_format( _( "%s (%d %s)" ),
454  container->nname( 1 ), amount, target->nname( amount ) ) :
455  string_format( _( "%s (%s)" ),
456  container->nname( 1 ), target->nname( amount ) ) );
457  } else {
458  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "<bold>Turns into</bold>: " ),
459  string_format( _( "%s (%d)" ), target->nname( amount ), amount ) );
460  }
461  } else {
462  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "<bold>Turns into</bold>: " ),
463  amount > 1 ?
464  string_format( _( "%d %s" ), amount, target->nname( amount ) ) :
465  string_format( _( "%s" ), target->nname( amount ) ) );
466  }
467 
468  if( target_timer > 0_seconds ) {
469  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Countdown: " ), to_seconds<int>( target_timer ) );
470  }
471 
472  const auto *explosion_use = dummy.get_use( "explosion" );
473  if( explosion_use != nullptr ) {
474  explosion_use->get_actor_ptr()->info( it, dump );
475  }
476 }
477 
478 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> unpack_actor::clone() const
479 {
480  return std::make_unique<unpack_actor>( *this );
481 }
482 
483 void unpack_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
484 {
485  obj.read( "group", unpack_group );
486  obj.read( "items_fit", items_fit );
487  assign( obj, "filthy_volume_threshold", filthy_vol_threshold );
488 }
489 
490 std::optional<int> unpack_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
491 {
492  std::vector<item> items = item_group::items_from( unpack_group, calendar::turn );
493  item last_armor;
494 
495  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You unpack the %s." ), it.tname() );
496 
497  map &here = get_map();
498  for( item &content : items ) {
499  if( content.is_armor() ) {
500  if( items_fit ) {
501  content.set_flag( flag_FIT );
502  } else if( content.typeId() == last_armor.typeId() ) {
503  if( last_armor.has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
504  content.set_flag( flag_FIT );
505  } else if( !last_armor.has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
506  content.unset_flag( flag_FIT );
507  }
508  }
509  last_armor = content;
510  }
511 
512  if( content.get_total_capacity() >= filthy_vol_threshold &&
513  it.has_flag( flag_FILTHY ) ) {
514  content.set_flag( flag_FILTHY );
515  }
516 
517  here.add_item_or_charges( p->pos(), content );
518  }
519 
520  p->i_rem( &it );
521 
522  return 0;
523 }
524 
525 void unpack_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
526 {
527  dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
528  _( "This item could be unpacked to receive something." ) );
529 }

535 
536 void message_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
537 {
538  obj.read( "name", name );
539  obj.read( "message", message );
540 }
541 
542 std::optional<int> message_iuse::use( Character *p, item &it,
543  const tripoint &pos ) const
544 {
545  if( !p ) {
546  return std::nullopt;
547  }
548 
549  if( p->sees( pos ) && !message.empty() ) {
550  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, message.translated(), it.tname() );
551  }
552 
553  return 0;
554 }
555 
556 std::string message_iuse::get_name() const
557 {
558  if( !name.empty() ) {
559  return name.translated();
560  }
561  return iuse_actor::get_name();
562 }

569 void sound_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
570 {
571  obj.read( "name", name );
572  obj.read( "sound_message", sound_message );
573  obj.read( "sound_volume", sound_volume );
574  obj.read( "sound_id", sound_id );
575  obj.read( "sound_variant", sound_variant );
576 }
577 
578 std::optional<int> sound_iuse::use( Character *, item &,
579  const tripoint &pos ) const
580 {
581  sounds::sound( pos, sound_volume, sounds::sound_t::alarm, sound_message.translated(), true,
582  sound_id, sound_variant );
583  return 0;
584 }

586 std::string sound_iuse::get_name() const
587 {

594 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> explosion_iuse::clone() const
595 {
596  return std::make_unique<explosion_iuse>( *this );
597 }
598 
599 // For an explosion (which releases some kind of gas), this function
600 // calculates the points around that explosion where to create those
601 // gas fields.
602 // Those points must have a clear line of sight and a clear path to
603 // the center of the explosion.
604 // They must also be passable.
605 static std::vector<tripoint> points_for_gas_cloud( const tripoint &center, int radius )
606 {
607  map &here = get_map();
608  std::vector<tripoint> result;
609  for( const tripoint &p : closest_points_first( center, radius ) ) {
610  if( here.impassable( p ) ) {
611  continue;
612  }
613  if( p != center ) {
614  if( !here.clear_path( center, p, radius, 1, 100 ) ) {
615  // Can not splatter gas from center to that point, something is in the way
616  continue;
617  }
618  }
619  result.push_back( p );
620  }
621  return result;
622 }
623 
624 void explosion_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
625 {
626  if( obj.has_object( "explosion" ) ) {
627  JsonObject expl = obj.get_object( "explosion" );
628  explosion = load_explosion_data( expl );
629  }
630 
631  obj.read( "draw_explosion_radius", draw_explosion_radius );
632  if( obj.has_member( "draw_explosion_color" ) ) {
633  draw_explosion_color = color_from_string( obj.get_string( "draw_explosion_color" ) );
634  }
635  obj.read( "do_flashbang", do_flashbang );
636  obj.read( "flashbang_player_immune", flashbang_player_immune );
637  obj.read( "fields_radius", fields_radius );
638  if( obj.has_member( "fields_type" ) || fields_radius > 0 ) {
639  fields_type = field_type_id( obj.get_string( "fields_type" ) );
640  }
641  obj.read( "fields_min_intensity", fields_min_intensity );
642  obj.read( "fields_max_intensity", fields_max_intensity );
643  if( fields_max_intensity == 0 ) {
644  fields_max_intensity = fields_type.obj().get_max_intensity();
645  }
646  obj.read( "emp_blast_radius", emp_blast_radius );
647  obj.read( "scrambler_blast_radius", scrambler_blast_radius );
648 }
649 
650 std::optional<int> explosion_iuse::use( Character *p, item &, const tripoint &pos ) const
651 {
652  if( explosion.power >= 0.0f ) {
653  explosion_handler::explosion( p, pos, explosion );
654  }
655 
656  if( draw_explosion_radius >= 0 ) {
657  explosion_handler::draw_explosion( pos, draw_explosion_radius, draw_explosion_color );
658  }
659  if( do_flashbang ) {
660  explosion_handler::flashbang( pos, flashbang_player_immune );
661  }
662  map &here = get_map();
663  if( fields_radius >= 0 && fields_type.id() ) {
664  std::vector<tripoint> gas_sources = points_for_gas_cloud( pos, fields_radius );
665  for( tripoint &gas_source : gas_sources ) {
666  const int field_intensity = rng( fields_min_intensity, fields_max_intensity );
667  here.add_field( gas_source, fields_type, field_intensity, 1_turns );
668  }
669  }
670  if( scrambler_blast_radius >= 0 ) {
671  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos, scrambler_blast_radius ) ) {
672  explosion_handler::scrambler_blast( dest );
673  }
674  }
675  if( emp_blast_radius >= 0 ) {
676  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos, emp_blast_radius ) ) {
677  explosion_handler::emp_blast( dest );
678  }
679  }
680  return 1;
681 }
682 
683 void explosion_iuse::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
684 {
685  if( explosion.power <= 0 ) {
686  // TODO: List other effects, like EMP and clouds
687  return;
688  }
689 
690  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Power at epicenter: " ), explosion.power );
691  const shrapnel_data &sd = explosion.shrapnel;
692  if( sd.casing_mass > 0 ) {
693  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Casing mass: " ), sd.casing_mass );
694  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Fragment mass: " ), string_format( "%.2f",
695  sd.fragment_mass ) );
696  }
697 }
698 
699 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> consume_drug_iuse::clone() const
700 {
701  return std::make_unique<consume_drug_iuse>( *this );
702 }
703 
704 static effect_data load_effect_data( const JsonObject &e )
705 {
706  time_duration time;
707  if( e.has_string( "duration" ) ) {
708  time = read_from_json_string<time_duration>( e.get_member( "duration" ), time_duration::units );
709  } else {
710  time = time_duration::from_turns( e.get_int( "duration", 0 ) );
711  }
712  return effect_data( efftype_id( e.get_string( "id" ) ), time,
713  bodypart_id( e.get_string( "bp", "bp_null" ) ), e.get_bool( "permanent", false ) );
714 }
715 
716 void consume_drug_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
717 {
718  obj.read( "activation_message", activation_message );
719  obj.read( "charges_needed", charges_needed );
720  obj.read( "tools_needed", tools_needed );
721 
722  if( obj.has_array( "effects" ) ) {
723  for( const JsonObject e : obj.get_array( "effects" ) ) {
724  effects.push_back( load_effect_data( e ) );
725  }
726  }
727  optional( obj, false, "damage_over_time", damage_over_time );
728  obj.read( "stat_adjustments", stat_adjustments );
729  obj.read( "fields_produced", fields_produced );
730  obj.read( "moves", moves );
731 
732  for( JsonArray vit : obj.get_array( "vitamins" ) ) {
733  int lo = vit.get_int( 1 );
734  int hi = vit.size() >= 3 ? vit.get_int( 2 ) : lo;
735  vitamins.emplace( vitamin_id( vit.get_string( 0 ) ), std::make_pair( lo, hi ) );
736  }
737 
738  used_up_item = obj.get_string( "used_up_item", used_up_item );
739 
740 }
741 
742 void consume_drug_iuse::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
743 {
744  const std::string vits = enumerate_as_string( vitamins.begin(), vitamins.end(),
745  []( const decltype( vitamins )::value_type & v ) {
746  const time_duration rate = get_player_character().vitamin_rate( v.first );
747  if( rate <= 0_turns ) {
748  return std::string();
749  }
750 
751  const int lo = v.second.first;
752  const int hi = v.second.second;
753 
754  if( v.first->type() == vitamin_type::VITAMIN ) {
755  return string_format( lo == hi ? "%s (%i%%)" : "%s (%i-%i%%)", v.first.obj().name(), lo, hi );
756  }
757  return string_format( lo == hi ? "%s (%i U)" : "%s (%i-%i U)", v.first.obj().name(), lo, hi );
758  } );
759 
760  if( !vits.empty() ) {
761  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Vitamins (RDA) and Compounds (U): " ), vits );
762  }
763 
764  if( tools_needed.count( itype_syringe ) ) {
765  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "You need a <info>syringe</info> to inject this drug." ) );
766  }
767 }
768 
769 std::optional<int> consume_drug_iuse::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
770 {
771  auto need_these = tools_needed;
772 
773  // Check prerequisites first.
774  for( const auto &tool : need_these ) {
775  if( !p->has_amount( tool.first, 1 ) ) {
776  p->add_msg_player_or_say( _( "You need %1$s to consume %2$s!" ),
777  _( "I need a %1$s to consume %2$s!" ),
778  item::nname( tool.first ),
779  it.type_name( 1 ) );
780  return std::nullopt;
781  }
782  }
783  for( const auto &consumable : charges_needed ) {
784  // Amount == -1 means need one, but don't consume it.
785  if( !p->has_charges( consumable.first, ( consumable.second == -1 ) ?
786  1 : consumable.second ) ) {
787  p->add_msg_player_or_say( _( "You need %1$s to consume %2$s!" ),
788  _( "I need a %1$s to consume %2$s!" ),
789  item::nname( consumable.first ),
790  it.type_name( 1 ) );
791  return std::nullopt;
792  }
793  }
794  // Apply the various effects.
795  for( const effect_data &eff : effects ) {
796  time_duration dur = eff.duration;
797  if( p->has_trait( trait_TOLERANCE ) ) {
798  dur *= .8;
799  } else if( p->has_trait( trait_LIGHTWEIGHT ) ) {
800  dur *= 1.2;
801  }
802  p->add_effect( eff.id, dur, eff.bp, eff.permanent );
803  }
804  //Apply the various damage_over_time
805  for( const damage_over_time_data &Dot : damage_over_time ) {
806  p->add_damage_over_time( Dot );
807  }
808  for( const auto &stat_adjustment : stat_adjustments ) {
809  p->mod_stat( stat_adjustment.first, stat_adjustment.second );
810  }
811  map &here = get_map();
812  for( const auto &field : fields_produced ) {
813  const field_type_id fid = field_type_id( field.first );
814  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
815  point offset( rng( -2, 2 ), rng( -2, 2 ) );
816  here.add_field( p->pos_bub() + offset, fid, field.second );
817  }
818  }
819 
820  for( const auto &v : vitamins ) {
821  const int lo = v.first->RDA_to_default( v.second.first );
822  const int high = v.first->RDA_to_default( v.second.second );
823 
824  // have to update the daily estimate with the vitamins from the drug as well
825  p->daily_vitamins[v.first].first += lo;
826 
827  p->vitamin_mod( v.first, rng( lo, high ) );
828  }
829 
830  // Output message.
831  p->add_msg_if_player( activation_message.translated(), it.type_name( 1 ) );
832  // Consume charges.
833  for( const auto &consumable : charges_needed ) {
834  if( consumable.second != -1 ) {
835  p->use_charges( consumable.first, consumable.second );
836  }
837  }
838 
839  if( !used_up_item.empty() ) {
840  item used_up( used_up_item, it.birthday() );
841  p->i_add_or_drop( used_up );
842  }
843 
844  // Uses the moves specified by iuse_actor's definition
845  p->mod_moves( -moves );
846  return 1;
847 }
848 
849 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> delayed_transform_iuse::clone() const
850 {
851  return std::make_unique<delayed_transform_iuse>( *this );
852 }
853 
854 void delayed_transform_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
855 {
856  iuse_transform::load( obj );
857  obj.get_member( "not_ready_msg" ).read( not_ready_msg );
858  transform_age = obj.get_int( "transform_age" );
859 }
860 
861 int delayed_transform_iuse::time_to_do( const item &it ) const
862 {
863  // TODO: change return type to time_duration
864  return transform_age - to_turns<int>( it.age() );
865 }
866 
867 std::optional<int> delayed_transform_iuse::use( Character *p, item &it,
868  const tripoint &pos ) const
869 {
870  if( time_to_do( it ) > 0 ) {
871  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, "%s", not_ready_msg );
872  return std::nullopt;
873  }
874  return iuse_transform::use( p, it, pos );
875 }
876 
877 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> place_monster_iuse::clone() const
878 {
879  return std::make_unique<place_monster_iuse>( *this );
880 }
881 
882 void place_monster_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
883 {
884  mtypeid = mtype_id( obj.get_string( "monster_id" ) );
885  obj.read( "friendly_msg", friendly_msg );
886  obj.read( "hostile_msg", hostile_msg );
887  obj.read( "difficulty", difficulty );
888  obj.read( "moves", moves );
889  obj.read( "place_randomly", place_randomly );
890  obj.read( "is_pet", is_pet );
891  obj.read( "need_charges", need_charges );
892  need_charges = std::max( need_charges, 0 );
893 
894  if( obj.has_array( "skills" ) ) {
895  JsonArray skills_ja = obj.get_array( "skills" );
896  for( JsonValue s : skills_ja ) {
897  skills.emplace( s.get_string() );
898  }
899  }
900 }
901 
902 std::optional<int> place_monster_iuse::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
903 {
904  if( it.ammo_remaining() < need_charges ) {
905  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This requires %d charges to activate." ), need_charges );
906  return std::nullopt;
907  }
908 
909  shared_ptr_fast<monster> newmon_ptr = make_shared_fast<monster>( mtypeid );
910  monster &newmon = *newmon_ptr;
911  newmon.init_from_item( it );
912  if( place_randomly ) {
913  // place_critter_around returns the same pointer as its parameter (or null)
914  if( !g->place_critter_around( newmon_ptr, p->pos(), 1 ) ) {
915  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is no adjacent square to release the %s in!" ),
916  newmon.name() );
917  return std::nullopt;
918  }
919  } else {
920  const std::string query = string_format( _( "Place the %s where?" ), newmon.name() );
921  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( query );
922  if( !pnt_ ) {
923  return std::nullopt;
924  }
925  // place_critter_at returns the same pointer as its parameter (or null)
926  if( !g->place_critter_at( newmon_ptr, *pnt_ ) ) {
927  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot place a %s there." ), newmon.name() );
928  return std::nullopt;
929  }
930  }
931  // Uses the moves specified by iuse_actor's definition
932  p->mod_moves( -moves );
933 
934  newmon.ammo = newmon.type->starting_ammo;
935  if( !newmon.has_flag( mon_flag_INTERIOR_AMMO ) ) {
936  for( std::pair<const itype_id, int> &amdef : newmon.ammo ) {
937  item ammo_item( amdef.first, calendar::turn_zero );
938  const int available = p->charges_of( amdef.first );
939  if( available == 0 ) {
940  amdef.second = 0;
941  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
942  _( "If you had standard factory-built %1$s bullets, you could load the %2$s." ),
943  ammo_item.type_name( 2 ), newmon.name() );
944  continue;
945  }
946  // Don't load more than the default from the monster definition.
947  ammo_item.charges = std::min( available, amdef.second );
948  p->use_charges( amdef.first, ammo_item.charges );
949  //~ First %s is the ammo item (with plural form and count included), second is the monster name
950  p->add_msg_if_player( n_gettext( "You load %1$d x %2$s round into the %3$s.",
951  "You load %1$d x %2$s rounds into the %3$s.", ammo_item.charges ),
952  ammo_item.charges, ammo_item.type_name( ammo_item.charges ),
953  newmon.name() );
954  amdef.second = ammo_item.charges;
955  }
956  }
957 
958  float skill_offset = 0;
959  for( const skill_id &sk : skills ) {
960  skill_offset += p->get_skill_level( sk ) / 2.0f;
961  }
962  /** @EFFECT_INT increases chance of a placed turret being friendly */
963  if( rng( 0, p->int_cur / 2 ) + skill_offset < rng( 0, difficulty ) ) {
964  if( hostile_msg.empty() ) {
965  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You deploy the %s wrong. It is hostile!" ), newmon.name() );
966  } else {
967  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, "%s", hostile_msg );
968  }
969  } else {
970  if( friendly_msg.empty() ) {
971  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You deploy the %s." ), newmon.name() );
972  } else {
973  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, "%s", friendly_msg );
974  }
975  newmon.friendly = -1;
976  if( is_pet ) {
977  newmon.add_effect( effect_pet, 1_turns, true );
978  }
979  }
980  return 1;
981 }
982 
983 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> place_npc_iuse::clone() const
984 {
985  return std::make_unique<place_npc_iuse>( *this );
986 }
987 
988 void place_npc_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
989 {
990  npc_class_id = string_id<npc_template>( obj.get_string( "npc_class_id" ) );
991  obj.read( "summon_msg", summon_msg );
992  obj.read( "moves", moves );
993  obj.read( "place_randomly", place_randomly );
994 }
995 
996 std::optional<int> place_npc_iuse::use( Character *p, item &, const tripoint & ) const
997 {
998  map &here = get_map();
999  const tripoint_range<tripoint> target_range = place_randomly ?
1000  points_in_radius( p->pos(), radius ) :
1001  points_in_radius( choose_adjacent( _( "Place NPC where?" ) ).value_or( p->pos() ), 0 );
1002 
1003  const std::optional<tripoint> target_pos =
1004  random_point( target_range, [&here]( const tripoint & t ) {
1005  return here.passable( t ) && here.has_floor_or_support( t ) &&
1006  !get_creature_tracker().creature_at( t );
1007  } );
1008 
1009  if( !target_pos.has_value() ) {
1010  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is no square to spawn NPC in!" ) );
1011  return std::nullopt;
1012  }
1013 
1014  here.place_npc( target_pos.value().xy(), npc_class_id );
1015  p->mod_moves( -moves );
1016  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, "%s", summon_msg );
1017  return 1;
1018 }
1019 
1020 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> deploy_furn_actor::clone() const
1021 {
1022  return std::make_unique<deploy_furn_actor>( *this );
1023 }
1024 
1025 void deploy_furn_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
1026 {
1027  std::vector<std::string> can_function_as;
1028  const furn_t &the_furn = furn_type.obj();
1029  const std::string furn_name = the_furn.name();
1030 
1031  if( the_furn.workbench ) {
1032  can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a <info>crafting station</info>" ) );
1033  }
1034  if( the_furn.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_BUTCHER_EQ ) ) {
1035  can_function_as.emplace_back(
1036  _( "a place to hang <info>corpses for butchering</info>" ) );
1037  }
1038  if( the_furn.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FLAT_SURF ) ) {
1039  can_function_as.emplace_back(
1040  _( "a flat surface to <info>butcher</info> onto or <info>eat meals</info> from" ) );
1041  }
1042  if( the_furn.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CAN_SIT ) ) {
1043  can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a place to <info>sit</info>" ) );
1044  }
1045  if( the_furn.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_HIDE_PLACE ) ) {
1046  can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a place to <info>hide</info>" ) );
1047  }
1048  if( the_furn.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FIRE_CONTAINER ) ) {
1049  can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a safe place to <info>contain a fire</info>" ) );
1050  }
1051  if( the_furn.crafting_pseudo_item == itype_char_smoker ) {
1052  can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a place to <info>smoke or dry food</info> for preservation" ) );
1053  }
1054 
1055  if( can_function_as.empty() ) {
1056  dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
1057  string_format( _( "Can be <info>activated</info> to deploy as furniture (<stat>%s</stat>)." ),
1058  furn_name ) );
1059  } else {
1060  std::string furn_usages = enumerate_as_string( can_function_as, enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
1061  dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
1062  string_format(
1063  _( "Can be <info>activated</info> to deploy as furniture (<stat>%s</stat>), which can then be used as %s." ),
1064  furn_name, furn_usages ) );
1065  }
1066 }
1067 
1068 void deploy_furn_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1069 {
1070  furn_type = furn_str_id( obj.get_string( "furn_type" ) );
1071 }
1072 
1073 
1074 static ret_val<tripoint> check_deploy_square( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint &pos )
1075 {
1076  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
1077  return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos );
1078  }
1079  tripoint pnt = pos;
1080  if( pos == p->pos() ) {
1081  if( const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Deploy where?" ) ) ) {
1082  pnt = *pnt_;
1083  } else {
1084  return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos );
1085  }
1086  }
1087 
1088  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
1089  return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos,
1090  _( "You attempt to become one with the %s. It doesn't work." ), it.tname() );
1091  }
1092 
1093  map &here = get_map();
1094  optional_vpart_position veh_there = here.veh_at( pnt );
1095  if( veh_there.has_value() ) {
1096  // TODO: check for protrusion+short furniture, wheels+tiny furniture, NOCOLLIDE flag, etc.
1097  // and/or integrate furniture deployment with construction (which already seems to perform these checks sometimes?)
1098  return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos,
1099  _( "The space under %s is too cramped to deploy a %s in." ),
1100  veh_there.value().vehicle().disp_name(), it.tname() );
1101  }
1102 
1103  // For example: dirt = 2, long grass = 3
1104  if( here.move_cost( pnt ) != 2 && here.move_cost( pnt ) != 3 ) {
1105  return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos, _( "You can't deploy a %s there." ), it.tname() );
1106  }
1107 
1108  if( here.has_furn( pnt ) ) {
1109  return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos, _( "The %s at that location is blocking the %s." ),
1110  here.furnname( pnt ), it.tname() );
1111  }
1112 
1113  if( here.has_items( pnt ) ) {
1114  // Check that there are no other people's belongings in the place where the furniture is placed.
1115  // Avoid easy theft of NPC items (e.g. carton theft).
1116  map &temp = get_map();
1117  for( item &i : temp.i_at( pnt ) ) {
1118  if( !i.is_owned_by( *p, true ) ) {
1119  return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos,
1120  _( "You can't deploy the %s on other people's belongings!" ), it.tname() );
1121  }
1122  }
1123 
1124  // Check that there is no liquid on the floor.
1125  // If there is, it needs to be mopped dry with a mop.
1126  if( here.terrain_moppable( tripoint_bub_ms( pnt ) ) ) {
1127  if( get_avatar().crafting_inventory().has_quality( qual_MOP ) ) {
1128  here.mop_spills( tripoint_bub_ms( pnt ) );
1129  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You mopped up the spill with a nearby mop when deploying a %s." ),
1130  it.tname() );
1131  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 15_seconds ) );
1132  } else {
1133  return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos,
1134  _( "You need a mop to clean up liquids before deploying the %s." ), it.tname() );
1135  }
1136  }
1137  }
1138 
1139  return ret_val<tripoint>::make_success( pnt );
1140 }
1141 
1142 std::optional<int> deploy_furn_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
1143  const tripoint &pos ) const
1144 {
1145  ret_val<tripoint> suitable = check_deploy_square( p, it, pos );
1146  if( !suitable.success() ) {
1147  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, suitable.str() );
1148  return std::nullopt;
1149  }
1150 
1151  get_map().furn_set( suitable.value(), furn_type );
1152  it.spill_contents( suitable.value() );
1153  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
1154  return 1;
1155 }
1156 
1157 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> deploy_appliance_actor::clone() const
1158 {
1159  return std::make_unique<deploy_appliance_actor>( *this );
1160 }
1161 
1162 void deploy_appliance_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
1163 {
1164  dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
1165  string_format( _( "Can be <info>activated</info> to deploy as an appliance (<stat>%s</stat>)." ),
1166  vpart_appliance_from_item( appliance_base )->name() ) );
1167 }
1168 
1169 void deploy_appliance_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1170 {
1171  mandatory( obj, false, "base", appliance_base );
1172 }
1173 
1174 std::optional<int> deploy_appliance_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint &pos ) const
1175 {
1176  ret_val<tripoint> suitable = check_deploy_square( p, it, pos );
1177  if( !suitable.success() ) {
1178  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, suitable.str() );
1179  return std::nullopt;
1180  }
1181 
1182  place_appliance( suitable.value(), vpart_appliance_from_item( appliance_base ) );
1183  it.spill_contents( suitable.value() );
1184  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
1185  return 1;
1186 }
1187 
1188 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> reveal_map_actor::clone() const
1189 {
1190  return std::make_unique<reveal_map_actor>( *this );
1191 }
1192 
1193 void reveal_map_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1194 {
1195  radius = obj.get_int( "radius" );
1196  obj.get_member( "message" ).read( message );
1197  std::string ter;
1198  ot_match_type ter_match_type;
1199  for( const JsonValue entry : obj.get_array( "terrain" ) ) {
1200  if( entry.test_string() ) {
1201  ter = entry.get_string();
1202  ter_match_type = ot_match_type::contains;
1203  } else {
1204  JsonObject jo = entry.get_object();
1205  ter = jo.get_string( "om_terrain" );
1206  ter_match_type = jo.get_enum_value<ot_match_type>( "om_terrain_match_type",
1207  ot_match_type::contains );
1208  }
1209  omt_types.emplace_back( ter, ter_match_type );
1210  }
1211 }
1212 
1213 void reveal_map_actor::reveal_targets( const tripoint_abs_omt &center,
1214  const std::pair<std::string, ot_match_type> &target,
1215  int reveal_distance ) const
1216 {
1217  const auto places = overmap_buffer.find_all( center, target.first, radius, false,
1218  target.second );
1219  for( const tripoint_abs_omt &place : places ) {
1220  if( !overmap_buffer.seen( place ) ) {
1221  // Should be replaced with the character using the item passed as an argument if NPCs ever learn to use maps
1222  get_avatar().map_revealed_omts.emplace( place );
1223  }
1224  overmap_buffer.reveal( place, reveal_distance );
1225  }
1226 }
1227 
1228 std::optional<int> reveal_map_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
1229 {
1230  if( it.already_used_by_player( *p ) ) {
1231  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There isn't anything new on the %s." ), it.tname() );
1232  return std::nullopt;
1233  } else if( p->fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
1234  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "It's too dark to read." ) );
1235  return std::nullopt;
1236  }
1237  const tripoint_abs_omt center( it.get_var( "reveal_map_center_omt",
1238  p->global_omt_location().raw() ) );
1239  // Clear highlight on previously revealed OMTs before revealing new ones
1240  p->map_revealed_omts.clear();
1241  for( const auto &omt : omt_types ) {
1242  for( int z = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; z <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; z++ ) {
1243  reveal_targets( tripoint_abs_omt( center.xy(), z ), omt, 0 );
1244  }
1245  }
1246  if( !message.empty() ) {
1247  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, "%s", message );
1248  }
1249  if( p->map_revealed_omts.empty() ) {
1250  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You didn't learn anything new from the %s." ), it.tname() );
1251  }
1252  it.mark_as_used_by_player( *p );
1253  return 0;
1254 }
1255 
1256 void firestarter_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1257 {
1258  moves_cost_fast = obj.get_int( "moves", moves_cost_fast );
1259  moves_cost_slow = obj.get_int( "moves_slow", moves_cost_fast * 10 );
1260  need_sunlight = obj.get_bool( "need_sunlight", false );
1261 }
1262 
1263 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> firestarter_actor::clone() const
1264 {
1265  return std::make_unique<firestarter_actor>( *this );
1266 }
1267 
1268 bool firestarter_actor::prep_firestarter_use( const Character &p, tripoint_bub_ms &pos )
1269 {
1270  // checks for fuel are handled by use and the activity, not here
1271  if( pos == p.pos_bub() ) {
1272  if( const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Light where?" ) ) ) {
1273  // TODO: fix point types
1274  pos = tripoint_bub_ms( *pnt_ );
1275  } else {
1276  return false;
1277  }
1278  }
1279  if( pos == p.pos_bub() ) {
1280  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You would set yourself on fire." ) );
1281  p.add_msg_if_player( _( "But you're already smokin' hot." ) );
1282  return false;
1283  }
1284  map &here = get_map();
1285  if( here.get_field( pos, fd_fire ) ) {
1286  // check if there's already a fire
1287  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is already a fire." ) );
1288  return false;
1289  }
1290  // check if there's a fire fuel source spot
1291  bool target_is_firewood = false;
1292  if( here.tr_at( pos ).id == tr_firewood_source ) {
1293  target_is_firewood = true;
1294  } else {
1295  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
1296  auto zones = mgr.get_zones( zone_type_SOURCE_FIREWOOD, here.getglobal( pos ) );
1297  if( !zones.empty() ) {
1298  target_is_firewood = true;
1299  }
1300  }
1301  if( target_is_firewood ) {
1302  if( !query_yn( _( "Do you really want to burn your firewood source?" ) ) ) {
1303  return false;
1304  }
1305  }
1306  // Check for an adjacent fire container
1307  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &query : here.points_in_radius( pos, 1 ) ) {
1308  // Don't ask if we're setting a fire on top of a fireplace
1309  // TODO: fix point types
1310  if( here.has_flag_furn( "FIRE_CONTAINER", pos.raw() ) ) {
1311  break;
1312  }
1313  // Skip the position we're trying to light on fire
1314  if( query == pos ) {
1315  continue;
1316  }
1317  // TODO: fix point types
1318  if( here.has_flag_furn( "FIRE_CONTAINER", query.raw() ) ) {
1319  if( !query_yn( _( "Are you sure you want to start fire here? There's a fireplace adjacent." ) ) ) {
1320  return false;
1321  } else {
1322  // Don't ask multiple times if they say no and there are multiple fireplaces
1323  break;
1324  }
1325  }
1326  }
1327  // Check for a brazier.
1328  bool has_unactivated_brazier = false;
1329  for( const item &i : here.i_at( pos ) ) {
1330  if( i.typeId() == itype_brazier ) {
1331  has_unactivated_brazier = true;
1332  }
1333  }
1334  return !has_unactivated_brazier ||
1335  query_yn(
1336  _( "There's a brazier there but you haven't set it up to contain the fire. Continue?" ) );
1337 }
1338 
1339 void firestarter_actor::resolve_firestarter_use( Character *p, const tripoint_bub_ms &pos )
1340 {
1341  if( get_map().add_field( pos, fd_fire, 1, 10_minutes ) ) {
1342  if( !p->has_trait( trait_PYROMANIA ) ) {
1343  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You successfully light a fire." ) );
1344  } else {
1345  if( one_in( 4 ) ) {
1346  p->add_msg_if_player( m_mixed,
1347  _( "You light a fire, but it isn't enough. You need to light more." ) );
1348  } else {
1349  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You happily light a fire." ) );
1350  p->add_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_STARTFIRE, 5, 10, 6_hours, 4_hours );
1351  p->rem_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_NOFIRE );
1352  }
1353  }
1354  }
1355 }
1356 
1357 ret_val<void> firestarter_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
1358  const tripoint & ) const
1359 {
1360  if( p.is_underwater() ) {
1361  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
1362  }
1363 
1364  if( !it.ammo_sufficient( &p ) ) {
1365  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "This tool doesn't have enough charges." ) );
1366  }
1367 
1368  if( need_sunlight && light_mod( p.pos() ) <= 0.0f ) {
1369  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You need direct sunlight to light a fire with this." ) );
1370  }
1371 
1372  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
1373 }
1374 
1375 float firestarter_actor::light_mod( const tripoint &pos ) const
1376 {
1377  if( !need_sunlight ) {
1378  return 1.0f;
1379  }
1380  if( g->is_sheltered( pos ) ) {
1381  return 0.0f;
1382  }
1383 
1384  if( incident_sun_irradiance( get_weather().weather_id, calendar::turn ) > irradiance::moderate ) {
1385  return std::pow( g->natural_light_level( pos.z ) / 80.0f, 8 );
1386  }
1387 
1388  return 0.0f;
1389 }
1390 
1391 int firestarter_actor::moves_cost_by_fuel( const tripoint_bub_ms &pos ) const
1392 {
1393  map &here = get_map();
1394  if( here.flammable_items_at( pos, 100 ) ) {
1395  return moves_cost_fast;
1396  }
1397 
1398  if( here.flammable_items_at( pos, 10 ) ) {
1399  return ( moves_cost_slow + moves_cost_fast ) / 2;
1400  }
1401 
1402  return moves_cost_slow;
1403 }
1404 
1405 std::optional<int> firestarter_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
1406  const tripoint &spos ) const
1407 {
1408  if( !p ) {
1409  debugmsg( "%s called action firestarter that requires character but no character is present",
1410  it.typeId().str() );
1411  return std::nullopt;
1412  }
1413 
1414  // TODO: fix point types
1415  tripoint_bub_ms pos( spos );
1416  float light = light_mod( p->pos() );
1417  if( !prep_firestarter_use( *p, pos ) ) {
1418  return std::nullopt;
1419  }
1420 
1421  double skill_level = p->get_skill_level( skill_survival );
1422  /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL speeds up fire starting */
1423  float moves_modifier = std::pow( 0.8, std::min( 5.0, skill_level ) );
1424  const int moves_base = moves_cost_by_fuel( pos );
1425  const double moves_per_turn = to_moves<double>( 1_turns );
1426  const int min_moves = std::min<int>(
1427  moves_base, std::sqrt( 1 + moves_base / moves_per_turn ) * moves_per_turn );
1428  const int moves = std::max<int>( min_moves, moves_base * moves_modifier ) / light;
1429  if( moves > to_moves<int>( 1_minutes ) ) {
1430  // If more than 1 minute, inform the player
1431  const int minutes = moves / to_moves<int>( 1_minutes );
1432  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, need_sunlight ?
1433  n_gettext( "If the current weather holds, it will take around %d minute to light a fire.",
1434  "If the current weather holds, it will take around %d minutes to light a fire.", minutes ) :
1435  n_gettext( "At your skill level, it will take around %d minute to light a fire.",
1436  "At your skill level, it will take around %d minutes to light a fire.", minutes ),
1437  minutes );
1438  } else if( moves < to_moves<int>( 2_turns ) && get_map().is_flammable( pos ) ) {
1439  // If less than 2 turns, don't start a long action
1440  resolve_firestarter_use( p, pos );
1441  p->mod_moves( -moves );
1442  return 1;
1443  }
1444 
1445  // skill gains are handled by the activity, but stored here in the index field
1446  const int potential_skill_gain = moves_modifier * ( std::min( 10.0, moves_cost_fast / 100.0 ) + 2 );
1447  p->assign_activity( ACT_START_FIRE, moves, potential_skill_gain,
1448  0, it.tname() );
1449  p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, &it );
1450  p->activity.values.push_back( g->natural_light_level( pos.z() ) );
1451  p->activity.placement = get_map().getglobal( pos );
1452  // charges to use are handled by the activity
1453  return 0;
1454 }
1455 
1456 void salvage_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1457 {
1458  assign( obj, "cost", cost );
1459  assign( obj, "moves_per_part", moves_per_part );
1460 }
1461 
1462 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> salvage_actor::clone() const
1463 {
1464  return std::make_unique<salvage_actor>( *this );
1465 }
1466 
1467 std::optional<int> salvage_actor::use( Character *p, item &cutter, const tripoint & ) const
1468 {
1469  if( !p ) {
1470  debugmsg( "%s called action salvage that requires character but no character is present",
1471  cutter.typeId().str() );
1472  return std::nullopt;
1473  }
1474 
1475  item_location item_loc = game_menus::inv::salvage( *p, this );
1476  if( !item_loc ) {
1477  add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
1478  return std::nullopt;
1479  }
1480 
1481  return salvage_actor::try_to_cut_up( *p, cutter, item_loc );
1482 }
1483 
1484 std::optional<int> salvage_actor::try_to_cut_up
1485 ( Character &p, item &cutter, item_location &cut ) const
1486 {
1487  if( !valid_to_cut_up( &p, *cut.get_item() ) ) {
1488  // Messages should have already been displayed.
1489  return std::nullopt;
1490  }
1491 
1492  if( &cutter == cut.get_item() ) {
1493  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can not cut the %s with itself." ), cutter.tname() );
1494  return std::nullopt;
1495  }
1496 
1497  salvage_actor::cut_up( p, cut );
1498  // Return used charges from cutter
1499  return cost >= 0 ? cost : 1;
1500 }
1501 
1502 // Helper to visit instances of all the sub-materials of an item.
1503 static void visit_salvage_products( const item &it,
1504  const std::function<void( const item & )> &func )
1505 {
1506  for( const auto &material : it.made_of() ) {
1507  if( const std::optional<itype_id> id = material.first->salvaged_into() ) {
1508  item exemplar( *id );
1509  func( exemplar );
1510  }
1511  }
1512 }
1513 
1514 static units::mass proportional_weight( const item &it, int material_portions )
1515 {
1516  int total_portions = std::max( 1, it.type->mat_portion_total );
1517  return it.weight() * material_portions / total_portions;
1518 }
1519 
1520 // Helper to determine if there's enough of any material to even produce a result when cut up.
1521 static bool can_produce_results( const item &it )
1522 {
1523  for( const std::pair<const material_id, int> &mat : it.made_of() ) {
1524  if( const std::optional<itype_id> mat_id = mat.first->salvaged_into() ) {
1525  item material( *mat_id );
1526  if( material.count_by_charges() ) {
1527  material.charges = 1;
1528  }
1529  if( material.weight() <= proportional_weight( it, mat.second ) ) {
1530  return true;
1531  }
1532  }
1533  }
1534  return false;
1535 }
1536 
1537 int salvage_actor::time_to_cut_up( const item &it ) const
1538 {
1539  units::mass total_material_weight;
1540  int num_materials = 0;
1541  visit_salvage_products( it, [&total_material_weight, &num_materials]( const item & exemplar ) {
1542  total_material_weight += exemplar.weight();
1543  num_materials += 1;
1544  } );
1545  if( num_materials == 0 ) {
1546  return 0;
1547  }
1548  units::mass average_material_weight = total_material_weight / num_materials;
1549  int count = it.weight() / average_material_weight;
1550  return moves_per_part * count;
1551 }
1552 
1553 // If p is a nullptr, it does not print messages or query for confirmation
1554 // it here is the item that is a candidate for being cut up.
1555 bool salvage_actor::valid_to_cut_up( const Character *const p, const item &it ) const
1556 {
1557  // There must be some historical significance to these items.
1558  if( !it.is_salvageable() ) {
1559  if( p ) {
1560  add_msg( m_info, _( "Can't salvage anything from %s." ), it.tname() );
1561  }
1562  if( it.is_disassemblable() ) {
1563  if( p ) {
1564  add_msg( m_info, _( "Try disassembling the %s instead." ), it.tname() );
1565  }
1566  }
1567  return false;
1568  }
1569 
1570  if( !it.empty() ) {
1571  if( p ) {
1572  add_msg( m_info, _( "Please empty the %s before cutting it up." ), it.tname() );
1573  }
1574  return false;
1575  }
1576  if( !can_produce_results( it ) ) {
1577  if( p ) {
1578  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is too small to salvage material from." ), it.tname() );
1579  }
1580  return false;
1581  }
1582  if( p ) {
1583  // Softer warnings at the end so we don't ask permission and then tell them no.
1584  if( &it == p->get_wielded_item().get_item() ) {
1585  return query_yn( _( "You are wielding that, are you sure?" ) );
1586  } else if( p->is_worn( it ) ) {
1587  return query_yn( _( "You're wearing that, are you sure?" ) );
1588  }
1589  }
1590 
1591  return true;
1592 }
1593 
1594 // Find a recipe that can be used to craft item x. Searches craft and uncraft recipes
1595 // Used only by salvage_actor::cut_up
1596 static std::optional<recipe> find_uncraft_recipe( const item &x )
1597 {
1598  auto is_valid_uncraft = [&x]( const recipe & curr ) -> bool {
1599  return !( curr.obsolete || curr.result() != x.typeId()
1600  || curr.makes_amount() > 1 || curr.is_null() );
1601  };
1602 
1603  // Check uncraft first, then crafting recipes if none was found
1604  recipe uncraft = recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft( x.typeId() );
1605  if( is_valid_uncraft( uncraft ) ) {
1606  return uncraft;
1607  }
1608 
1609  auto iter = std::find_if( recipe_dict.begin(), recipe_dict.end(),
1610  [&]( const std::pair<const recipe_id, recipe> &curr ) {
1611  return is_valid_uncraft( curr.second );
1612  } );
1613  if( iter != recipe_dict.end() ) {
1614  return iter->second;
1615  }
1616  return std::nullopt;
1617 }
1618 
1619 void salvage_actor::cut_up( Character &p, item_location &cut ) const
1620 {
1621  // Map of salvaged items (id, count)
1622  std::map<itype_id, int> salvage;
1623  std::map<material_id, units::mass> mat_to_weight;
1624  std::set<material_id> mat_set;
1625  for( std::pair<material_id, int> mat : cut.get_item()->made_of() ) {
1626  mat_set.insert( mat.first );
1627  }
1628 
1629  // Calculate efficiency losses
1630  float efficiency = 1.0;
1631  // Higher fabrication, less chance of entropy, but still a chance.
1632  /** @EFFECT_FABRICATION reduces chance of losing components when cutting items up */
1633  int entropy_threshold = std::max( 0,
1634  5 - static_cast<int>( round( p.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication ) ) ) );
1635  if( rng( 1, 10 ) <= entropy_threshold ) {
1636  efficiency *= 0.9;
1637  }
1638 
1639  // Fail dex roll, potentially lose more parts.
1640  /** @EFFECT_DEX randomly reduces component loss when cutting items up */
1641  if( dice( 3, 4 ) > p.dex_cur ) {
1642  efficiency *= 0.95;
1643  }
1644 
1645  // If the item being cut is damaged, additional losses will be incurred.
1646  efficiency *= std::pow( 0.8, cut.get_item()->damage_level() );
1647 
1648  auto distribute_uniformly = [&mat_to_weight]( const item & x, float num_adjusted ) -> void {
1649  for( const auto &type : x.made_of() )
1650  {
1651  mat_to_weight[type.first] += proportional_weight( x, type.second ) * num_adjusted;
1652  }
1653  };
1654 
1655  // efficiency is decreased every time the ingredients of a recipe have more mass than the output
1656  // num_adjusted represents the number of items and efficiency in one value
1657  std::function<void( item, float )> cut_up_component =
1658  [&salvage, &mat_set, &distribute_uniformly, &cut_up_component]
1659  ( const item & curr, float num_adjusted ) -> void {
1660 
1661  // If it is one of the basic components, add it into the list
1662  if( curr.type->is_basic_component() )
1663  {
1664  int num_actual = static_cast<int>( num_adjusted );
1665  salvage[curr.typeId()] += num_actual;
1666  return;
1667  }
1668 
1669  // Discard invalid component
1670  // Non-salvageable items are discarded even if made of appropriate material
1671  if( !curr.made_of_any( mat_set ) || !curr.is_salvageable() )
1672  {
1673  return;
1674  }
1675 
1676  // Items count by charges are not always smaller than base materials
1677  // Necessary for e.g. bones -> bone splinters
1678  if( curr.count_by_charges() )
1679  {
1680  distribute_uniformly( curr, num_adjusted );
1681  return;
1682  }
1683 
1684  // All intact components are also cut up and destroyed
1685  if( !curr.components.empty() )
1686  {
1687  for( const item_components::type_vector_pair &tvp : curr.components ) {
1688  for( const item &iter : tvp.second ) {
1689  cut_up_component( iter, num_adjusted );
1690  }
1691  }
1692  return;
1693  }
1694 
1695  // Try to find an available recipe and "restore" its components
1696  std::optional<recipe> uncraft = find_uncraft_recipe( curr );
1697  if( uncraft )
1698  {
1699  const requirement_data requirements = uncraft->simple_requirements();
1700 
1701  units::mass ingredient_weight = 0_gram;
1702  for( const auto &altercomps : requirements.get_components() ) {
1703  if( !altercomps.empty() && altercomps.front().type ) {
1704  ingredient_weight += altercomps.front().type->weight * altercomps.front().count;
1705  }
1706  }
1707  // We decrease efficiency so on avg no more mass is salvaged than the original item weighed
1708  num_adjusted *= std::min( 1.0f, static_cast<float>( curr.weight().value() )
1709  / static_cast<float>( ingredient_weight.value() ) );
1710 
1711  // Find default components set from recipe
1712  for( const auto &altercomps : requirements.get_components() ) {
1713  const item_comp &comp = altercomps.front();
1714  item next = item( comp.type, calendar::turn );
1715  if( next.count_by_charges() ) {
1716  next.charges = 1;
1717  }
1718  cut_up_component( next, num_adjusted * comp.count );
1719  }
1720  } else
1721  {
1722  // No recipe was found so we guess and distribute the weight uniformly.
1723  // This is imprecise but it can't be exploited as no recipe exists for the item
1724  distribute_uniformly( curr, num_adjusted );
1725  }
1726  };
1727 
1728  // Decompose the item into irreducible parts
1729  cut_up_component( *cut.get_item(), efficiency );
1730 
1731  // Not much practice, and you won't get very far ripping things up.
1732  p.practice( skill_fabrication, rng( 0, 5 ), 1 );
1733 
1734  // Add the uniformly distributed mass to the relevant salvage items
1735  for( const auto &iter : mat_to_weight ) {
1736  if( const std::optional<itype_id> id = iter.first->salvaged_into() ) {
1737  salvage[*id] += iter.second / id->obj().weight;
1738  }
1739  }
1740 
1741  add_msg( m_info, _( "You try to salvage materials from the %s." ),
1742  cut.get_item()->tname() );
1743 
1744  const item_location::type cut_type = cut.where();
1745  const tripoint pos = cut.position();
1746  const bool filthy = cut.get_item()->is_filthy();
1747 
1748  // Clean up before removing the item.
1749  remove_ammo( *cut.get_item(), p );
1750  // Original item has been consumed.
1751  cut.remove_item();
1752  // Force an encumbrance update in case they were wearing that item.
1753  p.calc_encumbrance();
1754 
1755  map &here = get_map();
1756  for( const auto &salvaged_mat : salvage ) {
1757  item result( salvaged_mat.first, calendar::turn );
1758  int amount = salvaged_mat.second;
1759  if( amount > 0 ) {
1760  // Time based on number of components.
1761  p.mod_moves( -moves_per_part );
1762  if( result.count_by_charges() ) {
1763  result.charges = amount;
1764  amount = 1;
1765  }
1766  add_msg( m_good, n_gettext( "Salvaged %1$i %2$s.", "Salvaged %1$i %2$s.", amount ),
1767  amount, result.display_name( amount ) );
1768  if( filthy ) {
1769  result.set_flag( flag_FILTHY );
1770  }
1771  if( cut_type == item_location::type::character ) {
1772  p.i_add_or_drop( result, amount );
1773  } else {
1774  for( int i = 0; i < amount; i++ ) {
1775  here.add_item_or_charges( pos, result );
1776  }
1777  }
1778  } else {
1779  add_msg( m_bad, _( "Could not salvage a %s." ), result.display_name() );
1780  }
1781  }
1782 }
1783 
1784 void inscribe_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1785 {
1786  assign( obj, "cost", cost );
1787  assign( obj, "on_items", on_items );
1788  assign( obj, "on_terrain", on_terrain );
1789  assign( obj, "material_restricted", material_restricted );
1790 
1791  if( obj.has_array( "material_whitelist" ) ) {
1792  material_whitelist.clear();
1793  assign( obj, "material_whitelist", material_whitelist );
1794  }
1795 
1796  assign( obj, "verb", verb );
1797  assign( obj, "gerund", gerund );
1798 
1799  if( !on_items && !on_terrain ) {
1800  obj.throw_error(
1801  R"(Tried to create an useless inscribe_actor, at least on of "on_items" or "on_terrain" should be true)" );
1802  }
1803 }
1804 
1805 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> inscribe_actor::clone() const
1806 {
1807  return std::make_unique<inscribe_actor>( *this );
1808 }
1809 
1810 bool inscribe_actor::item_inscription( item &tool, item &cut ) const
1811 {
1812  if( !cut.made_of( phase_id::SOLID ) ) {
1813  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't inscribe an item that isn't solid!" ) );
1814  return false;
1815  }
1816 
1817  if( material_restricted && !cut.made_of_any( material_whitelist ) ) {
1818  std::wstring lower_verb = utf8_to_wstr( verb.translated() );
1819  std::transform( lower_verb.begin(), lower_verb.end(), lower_verb.begin(), towlower );
1820  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't %1$s %2$s because of the material it is made of." ),
1821  wstr_to_utf8( lower_verb ), cut.display_name() );
1822  return false;
1823  }
1824 
1825  enum inscription_type {
1826  INSCRIPTION_LABEL,
1827  INSCRIPTION_NOTE,
1828  };
1829 
1830  uilist menu;
1831  menu.text = string_format( _( "%s meaning?" ), verb );
1832  menu.addentry( INSCRIPTION_LABEL, true, -1, _( "It's a label" ) );
1833  menu.addentry( INSCRIPTION_NOTE, true, -1, _( "It's a note" ) );
1834  menu.query();
1835 
1836  std::string carving;
1837  std::string carving_tool;
1838  switch( menu.ret ) {
1839  case INSCRIPTION_LABEL:
1840  carving = "item_label";
1841  carving_tool = "item_label_tool";
1842  break;
1843  case INSCRIPTION_NOTE:
1844  carving = "item_note";
1845  carving_tool = "item_note_tool";
1846  break;
1847  default:
1848  return false;
1849  }
1850 
1851  const bool hasnote = cut.has_var( carving );
1852  std::string messageprefix = ( hasnote ? _( "(To delete, clear the text and confirm)\n" ) : "" ) +
1853  //~ %1$s: gerund (e.g. carved), %2$s: item name
1854  string_format( pgettext( "carving", "%1$s on the %2$s is: " ),
1855  gerund, cut.type_name() );
1856 
1857  string_input_popup popup;
1858  popup.title( string_format( _( "%s what?" ), verb ) )
1859  .width( 64 )
1860  .text( hasnote ? cut.get_var( carving ) : std::string() )
1861  .description( messageprefix )
1862  .identifier( "inscribe_item" )
1863  .max_length( 128 )
1864  .query();
1865  if( popup.canceled() ) {
1866  return false;
1867  }
1868  const std::string message = popup.text();
1869  if( message.empty() ) {
1870  cut.erase_var( carving );
1871  cut.erase_var( carving_tool );
1872  } else {
1873  cut.set_var( carving, message );
1874  cut.set_var( carving_tool, tool.typeId().str() );
1875  }
1876 
1877  return true;
1878 }
1879 
1880 std::optional<int> inscribe_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
1881 {
1882  if( !p ) {
1883  debugmsg( "%s called action inscribe that requires character but no character is present",
1884  it.typeId().str() );
1885  return std::nullopt;
1886  }
1887 
1888  int choice = INT_MAX;
1889  if( on_terrain && on_items ) {
1890  uilist imenu;
1891  imenu.text = string_format( _( "%s on what?" ), verb );
1892  imenu.addentry( 0, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "The terrain" ) );
1893  imenu.addentry( 1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "An item" ) );
1894  imenu.query();
1895  choice = imenu.ret;
1896  } else if( on_terrain ) {
1897  choice = 0;
1898  } else {
1899  choice = 1;
1900  }
1901 
1902  if( choice < 0 || choice > 1 ) {
1903  return std::nullopt;
1904  }
1905 
1906  if( choice == 0 ) {
1907  const std::optional<tripoint> dest_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Write where?" ) );
1908  if( !dest_ ) {
1909  return std::nullopt;
1910  }
1911  return iuse::handle_ground_graffiti( *p, &it, string_format( _( "%s what?" ), verb ),
1912  dest_.value() );
1913  }
1914 
1915  item_location loc = game_menus::inv::titled_menu( get_avatar(), _( "Inscribe which item?" ) );
1916  if( !loc ) {
1917  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
1918  return std::nullopt;
1919  }
1920  item &cut = *loc;
1921  if( &cut == &it ) {
1922  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You try to bend your %s, but fail." ), it.tname() );
1923  return 0;
1924  }
1925  // inscribe_item returns false if the action fails or is canceled somehow.
1926 
1927  if( item_inscription( it, cut ) ) {
1928  return cost >= 0 ? cost : 1;
1929  }
1930 
1931  return std::nullopt;
1932 }
1933 
1934 void fireweapon_off_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1935 {
1936  obj.read( "target_id", target_id, true );
1937  obj.read( "success_message", success_message );
1938  obj.read( "failure_message", failure_message );
1939  noise = obj.get_int( "noise", 0 );
1940  moves = obj.get_int( "moves", 0 );
1941  success_chance = obj.get_int( "success_chance", INT_MIN );
1942 }
1943 
1944 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> fireweapon_off_actor::clone() const
1945 {
1946  return std::make_unique<fireweapon_off_actor>( *this );
1947 }
1948 
1949 std::optional<int> fireweapon_off_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
1950  const tripoint & ) const
1951 {
1952  if( !p ) {
1953  debugmsg( "%s called action fireweapon_off that requires character but no character is present",
1954  it.typeId().str() );
1955  return std::nullopt;
1956  }
1957 
1958  // Uses the moves specified by iuse_actor's definition
1959  p->mod_moves( -moves );
1960  if( rng( 0, 10 ) - it.damage_level() > success_chance && !p->is_underwater() ) {
1961  if( noise > 0 ) {
1962  sounds::sound( p->pos(), noise, sounds::sound_t::combat, success_message );
1963  } else {
1964  p->add_msg_if_player( "%s", success_message );
1965  }
1966 
1967  it.convert( target_id, p );
1968  it.active = true;
1969  } else if( !failure_message.empty() ) {
1970  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, "%s", failure_message );
1971  }
1972 
1973  return 1;
1974 }
1975 
1976 ret_val<void> fireweapon_off_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
1977  const tripoint & ) const
1978 {
1979  if( !it.ammo_sufficient( &p ) ) {
1980  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "This tool doesn't have enough charges." ) );
1981  }
1982 
1983  if( p.is_underwater() ) {
1984  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
1985  }
1986 
1987  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
1988 }
1989 
1990 void fireweapon_on_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1991 {
1992  obj.read( "noise_message", noise_message );
1993  obj.get_member( "charges_extinguish_message" ).read( charges_extinguish_message );
1994  obj.get_member( "water_extinguish_message" ).read( water_extinguish_message );
1995  noise_chance = obj.get_int( "noise_chance", 1 );
1996 }
1997 
1998 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> fireweapon_on_actor::clone() const
1999 {
2000  return std::make_unique<fireweapon_on_actor>( *this );
2001 }
2002 
2003 std::optional<int> fireweapon_on_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
2004  const tripoint &pos ) const
2005 {
2006  bool extinguish = true;
2007  translation deactivation_msg;
2008  if( !it.ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
2009  deactivation_msg = charges_extinguish_message;
2010  } else if( p && p->is_underwater() ) {
2011  deactivation_msg = water_extinguish_message;
2012  } else {
2013  extinguish = false;
2014  }
2015 
2016  if( !p ) {
2017  map &here = get_map();
2018  if( here.is_water_shallow_current( pos ) || here.is_divable( pos ) ) {
2019  // Item is on ground on water
2020  extinguish = true;
2021  }
2022  }
2023 
2024  if( extinguish ) {
2025  it.deactivate( p, false );
2026  if( p ) {
2027  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, "%s", deactivation_msg );
2028  }
2029  return 0;
2030 
2031  } else if( p && one_in( noise_chance ) ) {
2032  p->add_msg_if_player( "%s", noise_message );
2033  }
2034 
2035  return 1;
2036 }
2037 
2038 void manualnoise_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2039 {
2040  obj.get_member( "use_message" ).read( use_message );
2041  obj.read( "noise_message", noise_message );
2042  noise_id = obj.get_string( "noise_id", "misc" );
2043  noise_variant = obj.get_string( "noise_variant", "default" );
2044  noise = obj.get_int( "noise", 0 );
2045  moves = obj.get_int( "moves", 0 );
2046 }
2047 
2048 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> manualnoise_actor::clone() const
2049 {
2050  return std::make_unique<manualnoise_actor>( *this );
2051 }
2052 
2053 std::optional<int> manualnoise_actor::use( Character *p, item &, const tripoint & ) const
2054 {
2055  // Uses the moves specified by iuse_actor's definition
2056  p->mod_moves( -moves );
2057  if( noise > 0 ) {
2058  sounds::sound( p->pos(), noise, sounds::sound_t::activity,
2059  noise_message.empty() ? _( "Hsss" ) : noise_message.translated(), true, noise_id, noise_variant );
2060  }
2061  p->add_msg_if_player( "%s", use_message );
2062  return 1;
2063 }
2064 
2065 ret_val<void> manualnoise_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
2066  const tripoint & ) const
2067 {
2068  if( !it.ammo_sufficient( &p ) ) {
2069  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "This tool doesn't have enough charges." ) );
2070  }
2071 
2072  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
2073 }

2076 {
2077 }

2080 {
2081  return std::make_unique<play_instrument_iuse>( *this );
2082 }
2083 
2084 std::optional<int> play_instrument_iuse::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
2085 {
2086  if( it.active ) {
2087  it.active = false;
2088  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You stop playing your %s." ),
2089  _( "<npcname> stops playing their %s." ),
2090  it.display_name() );
2091  } else {
2092  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
2093  _( "You start playing your %s." ),
2094  _( "<npcname> starts playing their %s." ),
2095  it.display_name() );
2096  it.active = true;
2097  }
2098  return std::nullopt;
2099 }
