2101 ret_val<void> play_instrument_iuse::can_use( const Character &, const item &,
2102  const tripoint & ) const
2103 {
2104  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
2105 }
2106 
2107 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> musical_instrument_actor::clone() const
2108 {
2109  return std::make_unique<musical_instrument_actor>( *this );
2110 }
2111 
2112 void musical_instrument_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2113 {
2114  speed_penalty = obj.get_int( "speed_penalty", 10 );
2115  volume = obj.get_int( "volume" );
2116  fun = obj.get_int( "fun" );
2117  fun_bonus = obj.get_int( "fun_bonus", 0 );
2118  description_frequency = time_duration::from_turns( obj.get_int( "description_frequency", 0 ) );
2119  if( !obj.read( "description_frequency", description_frequency ) ) {
2120  obj.throw_error( "missing member \"description_frequency\"" );
2121  }
2122  obj.read( "player_descriptions", player_descriptions );
2123  obj.read( "npc_descriptions", npc_descriptions );
2124 }
2125 
2126 std::optional<int> musical_instrument_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
2127  const tripoint & ) const
2128 {
2129  if( !p ) {
2130  it.active = false;
2131  return std::nullopt;
2132  }
2133 
2134  if( !p->is_npc() && music::is_active_music_id( music::music_id::instrument ) ) {
2135  music::deactivate_music_id( music::music_id::instrument );
2136  // Because musical instrument creates musical sound too
2137  if( music::is_active_music_id( music::music_id::sound ) ) {
2138  music::deactivate_music_id( music::music_id::sound );
2139  }
2140  }
2141 
2142  if( p->is_mounted() ) {
2143  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You can't play music while mounted." ),
2144  _( "<npcname> can't play music while mounted." ) );
2145  it.active = false;
2146  return std::nullopt;
2147  }
2148  if( p->is_underwater() ) {
2149  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2150  _( "You can't play music underwater." ),
2151  _( "<npcname> can't play music underwater." ) );
2152  it.active = false;
2153  return std::nullopt;
2154  }
2155 
2156  // Stop playing a wind instrument when winded or even eventually become winded while playing it?
2157  // It's impossible to distinguish instruments for now anyways.
2158  if( p->has_effect( effect_sleep ) || p->has_effect( effect_stunned ) ||
2159  p->has_effect( effect_asthma ) ) {
2160  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2161  _( "You stop playing your %s." ),
2162  _( "<npcname> stops playing their %s." ),
2163  it.display_name() );
2164  it.active = false;
2165  return std::nullopt;
2166  }
2167 
2168  // Check for worn or wielded - no "floating"/bionic instruments for now
2169  // TODO: Distinguish instruments played with hands and with mouth, consider encumbrance
2170  const int inv_pos = p->get_item_position( &it );
2171  if( inv_pos >= 0 || inv_pos == INT_MIN ) {
2172  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2173  _( "You need to hold or wear %s to play it." ),
2174  _( "<npcname> needs to hold or wear %s to play it." ),
2175  it.display_name() );
2176  it.active = false;
2177  return std::nullopt;
2178  }
2179 
2180  // At speed this low you can't coordinate your actions well enough to play the instrument
2181  if( p->get_speed() <= 25 + speed_penalty ) {
2182  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2183  _( "You feel too weak to play your %s." ),
2184  _( "<npcname> feels too weak to play their %s." ),
2185  it.display_name() );
2186  it.active = false;
2187  return std::nullopt;
2188  }
2189 
2190  // We can play the music now
2191  if( !p->is_npc() ) {
2192  music::activate_music_id( music::music_id::instrument );
2193  }
2194 
2195  if( p->get_effect_int( effect_playing_instrument ) <= speed_penalty ) {
2196  // Only re-apply the effect if it wouldn't lower the intensity
2197  p->add_effect( effect_playing_instrument, 2_turns, false, speed_penalty );
2198  }
2199 
2200  std::string desc = "music";
2201  /** @EFFECT_PER increases morale bonus when playing an instrument */
2202  const int morale_effect = fun + fun_bonus * p->per_cur;
2203  if( morale_effect >= 0 && calendar::once_every( description_frequency ) ) {
2204  if( !player_descriptions.empty() && p->is_avatar() ) {
2205  desc = random_entry( player_descriptions ).translated();
2206  } else if( !npc_descriptions.empty() && p->is_npc() ) {
2207  //~ %1$s: npc name, %2$s: npc action description
2208  desc = string_format( pgettext( "play music", "%1$s %2$s" ), p->disp_name( false ),
2209  random_entry( npc_descriptions ) );
2210  }
2211  } else if( morale_effect < 0 && calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
2212  // No musical skills = possible morale penalty
2213  if( p->is_avatar() ) {
2214  desc = _( "You produce an annoying sound." );
2215  } else {
2216  desc = string_format( _( "%s produces an annoying sound." ), p->disp_name( false ) );
2217  }
2218  }
2219 
2220  if( morale_effect >= 0 ) {
2221  sounds::sound( p->pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::music, desc, true, "musical_instrument",
2222  it.typeId().str() );
2223  } else {
2224  sounds::sound( p->pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::music, desc, true, "musical_instrument_bad",
2225  it.typeId().str() );
2226  }
2227 
2228  if( !p->has_effect( effect_music ) && p->can_hear( p->pos(), volume ) ) {
2229  // Sound code doesn't describe noises at the player position
2230  if( p->is_avatar() && desc != "music" ) {
2231  add_msg( m_info, desc );
2232  }
2233  p->add_effect( effect_music, 1_turns );
2234  const int sign = morale_effect > 0 ? 1 : -1;
2235  p->add_morale( MORALE_MUSIC, sign, morale_effect, 5_minutes, 2_minutes, true );
2236  }
2237 
2238  return 0;
2239 }
2240 
2241 ret_val<void> musical_instrument_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &,
2242  const tripoint & ) const
2243 {
2244  // TODO: (maybe): Mouth encumbrance? Smoke? Lack of arms? Hand encumbrance?
2245  if( p.is_underwater() ) {
2246  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
2247  }
2248  if( p.is_mounted() ) {
2249  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while mounted." ) );
2250  }
2251 
2252  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
2253 }
2254 
2255 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> learn_spell_actor::clone() const
2256 {
2257  return std::make_unique<learn_spell_actor>( *this );
2258 }
2259 
2260 void learn_spell_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2261 {
2262  spells = obj.get_string_array( "spells" );
2263 }
2264 
2265 void learn_spell_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2266 {
2267  std::string message;
2268  if( spells.size() == 1 ) {
2269  message = _( "This can teach you a spell." );
2270  } else {
2271  message = _( "This can teach you a number of spells." );
2272  }
2273  dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2274  dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "Spells Contained:" ) );
2275  avatar &pc = get_avatar();
2276  for( const std::string &sp_id_str : spells ) {
2277  const spell_id sp_id( sp_id_str );
2278  std::string spell_text = sp_id->name.translated();
2279  if( sp_id->spell_class.is_valid() ) {
2280  spell_text = string_format( pgettext( "spell name, spell class", "%s, %s" ),
2281  spell_text, sp_id->spell_class->name() );
2282  }
2283  if( pc.has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
2284  dump.emplace_back( "SPELL", spell_text );
2285  } else {
2286  if( pc.magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) ) {
2287  const spell sp = pc.magic->get_spell( sp_id );
2288  spell_text += ": " + string_format( _( "Level %u" ), sp.get_level() );
2289  if( sp.is_max_level( pc ) ) {
2290  spell_text = string_format( _( "<color_light_green>%1$s (Max)</color>" ), spell_text );
2291  } else {
2292  spell_text = string_format( "<color_yellow>%s</color>", spell_text );
2293  }
2294  } else {
2295  if( pc.magic->can_learn_spell( pc, sp_id ) ) {
2296  spell_text = string_format( "<color_light_blue>%s</color>", spell_text );
2297  }
2298  }
2299  dump.emplace_back( "SPELL", spell_text );
2300  }
2301  }
2302 }
2303 
2304 std::optional<int> learn_spell_actor::use( Character *p, item &, const tripoint & ) const
2305 {
2306  if( p->fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
2307  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "It's too dark to read." ) );
2308  return std::nullopt;
2309  }
2310  if( p->has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
2311  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't read." ) );
2312  return std::nullopt;
2313  }
2314  std::vector<uilist_entry> uilist_initializer;
2315  uilist spellbook_uilist;
2316  spellbook_callback sp_cb;
2317  bool know_it_all = true;
2318  for( const std::string &sp_id_str : spells ) {
2319  const spell_id sp_id( sp_id_str );
2320  sp_cb.add_spell( sp_id );
2321  uilist_entry entry( sp_id.obj().name.translated() );
2322  if( p->magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) ) {
2323  const spell sp = p->magic->get_spell( sp_id );
2324  entry.ctxt = string_format( _( "Level %u" ), sp.get_level() );
2325  if( sp.is_max_level( *p ) ) {
2326  entry.ctxt += _( " (Max)" );
2327  entry.enabled = false;
2328  } else {
2329  know_it_all = false;
2330  }
2331  } else {
2332  if( p->magic->can_learn_spell( *p, sp_id ) ) {
2333  entry.ctxt = _( "Study to Learn" );
2334  know_it_all = false;
2335  } else {
2336  entry.ctxt = _( "Can't learn!" );
2337  entry.enabled = false;
2338  }
2339  }
2340  uilist_initializer.emplace_back( entry );
2341  }
2342 
2343  if( know_it_all ) {
2344  add_msg( m_info, _( "You already know everything this could teach you." ) );
2345  return std::nullopt;
2346  }
2347 
2348  spellbook_uilist.entries = uilist_initializer;
2349  spellbook_uilist.w_height_setup = 24;
2350  spellbook_uilist.w_width_setup = 80;
2351  spellbook_uilist.callback = &sp_cb;
2352  spellbook_uilist.title = _( "Study a spell:" );
2353  spellbook_uilist.pad_left_setup = 38;
2354  spellbook_uilist.query();
2355  const int action = spellbook_uilist.ret;
2356  if( action < 0 ) {
2357  return std::nullopt;
2358  }
2359  const bool knows_spell = p->magic->knows_spell( spells[action] );
2360  player_activity study_spell( ACT_STUDY_SPELL,
2361  p->magic->time_to_learn_spell( *p, spells[action] ) );
2362  study_spell.str_values = {
2363  "", // reserved for "until you gain a spell level" option [0]
2364  "learn"
2365  }; // [1]
2366  study_spell.values = { 0, 0, 0 };
2367  if( knows_spell ) {
2368  study_spell.str_values[1] = "study";
2369  const int study_time = uilist( _( "Spend how long studying?" ), {
2370  { to_moves<int>( 30_minutes ), true, -1, _( "30 minutes" ) },
2371  { to_moves<int>( 1_hours ), true, -1, _( "1 hour" ) },
2372  { to_moves<int>( 2_hours ), true, -1, _( "2 hours" ) },
2373  { to_moves<int>( 4_hours ), true, -1, _( "4 hours" ) },
2374  { to_moves<int>( 8_hours ), true, -1, _( "8 hours" ) },
2375  { 10100, true, -1, _( "Until you gain a spell level" ) }
2376  } );
2377  if( study_time <= 0 ) {
2378  return std::nullopt;
2379  }
2380  study_spell.moves_total = study_time;
2381  spell &studying = p->magic->get_spell( spell_id( spells[action] ) );
2382  if( studying.get_difficulty( *p ) < static_cast<int>( p->get_skill_level( studying.skill() ) ) ) {
2383  p->handle_skill_warning( studying.skill(),
2384  true ); // show the skill warning on start reading, since we don't show it during
2385  }
2386  }
2387  study_spell.moves_left = study_spell.moves_total;
2388  if( study_spell.moves_total == 10100 ) {
2389  study_spell.str_values[0] = "gain_level";
2390  study_spell.values[0] = 0; // reserved for xp
2391  study_spell.values[1] = p->magic->get_spell( spell_id( spells[action] ) ).get_level() + 1;
2392  }
2393  study_spell.name = spells[action];
2394  p->assign_activity( study_spell );
2395  return 0;
2396 }
2397 
2398 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> cast_spell_actor::clone() const
2399 {
2400  return std::make_unique<cast_spell_actor>( *this );
2401 }
2402 
2403 void cast_spell_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2404 {
2405  no_fail = obj.get_bool( "no_fail" );
2406  item_spell = spell_id( obj.get_string( "spell_id" ) );
2407  spell_level = obj.get_int( "level" );
2408  need_worn = obj.get_bool( "need_worn", false );
2409  need_wielding = obj.get_bool( "need_wielding", false );
2410  mundane = obj.get_bool( "mundane", false );
2411 }
2412 
2413 void cast_spell_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2414 {
2415  if( mundane ) {
2416  const std::string message = string_format( _( "This item when activated: %1$s" ),
2417  item_spell->description );
2418  dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2419  } else {
2420  //~ %1$s: spell name, %2$i: spell level
2421  const std::string message = string_format( _( "This item casts %1$s at level %2$i." ),
2422  item_spell->name, spell_level );
2423  dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2424  if( no_fail ) {
2425  dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "This item never fails." ) );
2426  }
2427  }
2428 }
2429 
2430 std::string cast_spell_actor::get_name() const
2431 {
2432  return mundane ? _( "Activate" ) : _( "Cast spell" );
2433 }
2434 
2435 std::optional<int> cast_spell_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
2436 {
2437  if( need_worn && !p->is_worn( it ) ) {
2438  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need to wear the %1$s before activating it." ), it.tname() );
2439  return std::nullopt;
2440  }
2441  if( need_wielding && !p->is_wielding( it ) ) {
2442  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need to wield the %1$s before activating it." ), it.tname() );
2443  return std::nullopt;
2444  }
2445 
2446  spell casting = spell( spell_id( item_spell ) );
2447 
2448  player_activity cast_spell( ACT_SPELLCASTING, casting.casting_time( *p ) );
2449  // [0] this is used as a spell level override for items casting spells
2450  cast_spell.values.emplace_back( spell_level );
2451  if( no_fail ) {
2452  // [1] if this value is 1, the spell never fails
2453  cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 1 );
2454  } else {
2455  // [1]
2456  cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 0 );
2457  }
2458  cast_spell.name = casting.id().c_str();
2459  if( it.has_flag( flag_USE_PLAYER_ENERGY ) ) {
2460  // [2] this value overrides the mana cost if set to 0
2461  cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 1 );
2462  } else {
2463  // [2]
2464  cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 0 );
2465  }
2466  p->assign_activity( cast_spell );
2467  p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, &it );
2468  // Actual handling of charges_to_use is in activity_handlers::spellcasting_finish
2469  return 0;
2470 }
2471 
2472 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> holster_actor::clone() const
2473 {
2474  return std::make_unique<holster_actor>( *this );
2475 }
2476 
2477 void holster_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2478 {
2479  obj.read( "holster_prompt", holster_prompt );
2480  obj.read( "holster_msg", holster_msg );
2481 }
2482 
2483 bool holster_actor::can_holster( const item &holster, const item &obj ) const
2484 {
2485  return obj.active ? false : holster.can_contain( obj ).success();
2486 }
2487 
2488 bool holster_actor::store( Character &you, item &holster, item &obj ) const
2489 {
2490  if( obj.is_null() || holster.is_null() ) {
2491  debugmsg( "Null item was passed to holster_actor" );
2492  return false;
2493  }
2494 
2495  const ret_val<void> contain = holster.can_contain( obj );
2496  if( !contain.success() ) {
2497  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, contain.str(), holster.tname(), obj.tname() );
2498  }
2499  if( obj.active ) {
2500  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't think putting your %1$s in your %2$s is a good idea" ),
2501  obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2502  return false;
2503  }
2504  you.add_msg_if_player( holster_msg.empty() ? _( "You holster your %s" ) : holster_msg.translated(),
2505  obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2506 
2507  // holsters ignore penalty effects (e.g. GRABBED) when determining number of moves to consume
2508  you.as_character()->store( holster, obj, false, holster.obtain_cost( obj ),
2509  pocket_type::CONTAINER, true );
2510  return true;
2511 }
2512 
2513 template<typename T>
2514 static item_location form_loc_recursive( T &loc, item &it )
2515 {
2516  item *parent = loc.find_parent( it );
2517  if( parent != nullptr ) {
2518  return item_location( form_loc_recursive( loc, *parent ), &it );
2519  }
2520 
2521  return item_location( loc, &it );
2522 }
2523 
2524 static item_location form_loc( Character &you, const tripoint &p, item &it )
2525 {
2526  if( you.has_item( it ) ) {
2527  return form_loc_recursive( you, it );
2528  }
2529  map_cursor mc( p );
2530  if( mc.has_item( it ) ) {
2531  return form_loc_recursive( mc, it );
2532  }
2533  map &here = get_map();
2534  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( p );
2535  if( vp ) {
2536  vehicle_cursor vc( vp->vehicle(), vp->part_index() );
2537  if( vc.has_item( it ) ) {
2538  return form_loc_recursive( vc, it );
2539  }
2540  }
2541 
2542  debugmsg( "Couldn't find item %s to form item_location, forming dummy location to ensure minimum functionality",
2543  it.display_name() );
2544  return item_location( you, &it );
2545 }
2546 
2547 std::optional<int> holster_actor::use( Character *you, item &it, const tripoint &p ) const
2548 {
2549  if( you->is_wielding( it ) ) {
2550  you->add_msg_if_player( _( "You need to unwield your %s before using it." ), it.tname() );
2551  return std::nullopt;
2552  }
2553 
2554  int pos = 0;
2555  std::vector<std::string> opts;
2556 
2557  std::string prompt = holster_prompt.empty() ? _( "Holster item" ) : holster_prompt.translated();
2558  opts.push_back( prompt );
2559  pos = -1;
2560  std::list<item *> all_items = it.all_items_top(
2561  pocket_type::CONTAINER );
2562  std::transform( all_items.begin(), all_items.end(), std::back_inserter( opts ),
2563  []( const item * elem ) {
2564  return string_format( _( "Draw %s" ), elem->display_name() );
2565  } );
2566 
2567  item *internal_item = nullptr;
2568  if( opts.size() > 1 ) {
2569  int ret = uilist( string_format( _( "Use %s" ), it.tname() ), opts );
2570  if( ret < 0 ) {
2571  pos = -2;
2572  } else {
2573  pos += ret;
2574  if( opts.size() != it.num_item_stacks() ) {
2575  ret--;
2576  }
2577  auto iter = std::next( all_items.begin(), ret );
2578  internal_item = *iter;
2579  }
2580  } else {
2581  if( !all_items.empty() ) {
2582  internal_item = all_items.front();
2583  }
2584  }
2585 
2586  if( pos < -1 ) {
2587  you->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
2588  return std::nullopt;
2589  }
2590 
2591  if( pos >= 0 ) {
2592  item_location weapon = you->get_wielded_item();
2593  if( weapon && weapon.get_item()->has_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD ) ) {
2594  std::optional<bionic *> bio_opt = you->find_bionic_by_uid( you->get_weapon_bionic_uid() );
2595  if( !bio_opt || !you->deactivate_bionic( **bio_opt ) ) {
2596  you->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You can't unwield your %s." ), weapon.get_item()->tname() );
2597  return std::nullopt;
2598  }
2599  }
2600  // worn holsters ignore penalty effects (e.g. GRABBED) when determining number of moves to consume
2601  if( you->is_worn( it ) ) {
2602  you->wield_contents( it, internal_item, false, it.obtain_cost( *internal_item ) );
2603  } else {
2604  you->wield_contents( it, internal_item );
2605  }
2606 
2607  } else {
2608  if( you->as_avatar() == nullptr ) {
2609  return std::nullopt;
2610  }
2611 
2612  // iuse_actor really needs to work with item_location
2613  item_location item_loc = form_loc( *you, p, it );
2614  game_menus::inv::insert_items( *you->as_avatar(), item_loc );
2615  }
2616 
2617  return 0;
2618 }
2619 
2620 void holster_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2621 {
2622  std::string message = _( "Can be activated to store suitable items." );
2623  dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2624 }
2625 
2626 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> ammobelt_actor::clone() const
2627 {
2628  return std::make_unique<ammobelt_actor>( *this );
2629 }
2630 
2631 void ammobelt_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2632 {
2633  belt = itype_id( obj.get_string( "belt" ) );
2634 }
2635 
2636 void ammobelt_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2637 {
2638  dump.emplace_back( "AMMO", string_format( _( "Can be used to assemble: %s" ),
2639  item::nname( belt ) ) );
2640 }
2641 
2642 std::optional<int> ammobelt_actor::use( Character *p, item &, const tripoint & ) const
2643 {
2644  item mag( belt );
2645  mag.ammo_unset();
2646 
2647  if( p->rate_action_reload( mag ) != hint_rating::good ) {
2648  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Insufficient ammunition to assemble %s" ), mag.tname() );
2649  return std::nullopt;
2650  }
2651 
2652  item_location loc = p->i_add( mag );
2653  item::reload_option opt = p->select_ammo( loc, true );
2654  if( opt ) {
2655  p->assign_activity( reload_activity_actor( std::move( opt ) ) );
2656  } else {
2657  loc.remove_item();
2658  }
2659 
2660  return 0;
2661 }
2662 
2663 void repair_item_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2664 {
2665  // Mandatory:
2666  for( const std::string line : obj.get_array( "materials" ) ) {
2667  materials.emplace( line );
2668  }
2669 
2670  // TODO: Make skill non-mandatory while still erroring on invalid skill
2671  const std::string skill_string = obj.get_string( "skill" );
2672  used_skill = skill_id( skill_string );
2673  if( !used_skill.is_valid() ) {
2674  obj.throw_error_at( "skill", "Invalid skill" );
2675  }
2676 
2677  cost_scaling = obj.get_float( "cost_scaling" );
2678 
2679  // Optional
2680  tool_quality = obj.get_int( "tool_quality", 0 );
2681  move_cost = obj.get_int( "move_cost", 500 );
2682  trains_skill_to = obj.get_int( "trains_skill_to", 5 ) - 1;
2683 }
2684 
2685 bool repair_item_actor::can_use_tool( const Character &p, const item &tool, bool print_msg ) const
2686 {
2687  if( p.has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
2688  if( print_msg ) {
2689  p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You can't do that while incorporeal." ),
2690  _( "<npcname> can't do that while incorporeal." ) );
2691  }
2692  return false;
2693  }
2694  if( p.cant_do_underwater( print_msg ) ) {
2695  return false;
2696  }
2697  if( p.cant_do_mounted( print_msg ) ) {
2698  return false;
2699  }
2700  if( p.fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
2701  if( print_msg ) {
2702  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't see to do that!" ) );
2703  }
2704  return false;
2705  }
2706  if( !tool.ammo_sufficient( &p ) ) {
2707  if( print_msg ) {
2708  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your tool does not have enough charges to do that." ) );
2709  }
2710  return false;
2711  }
2712 
2713  return true;
2714 }
2715 
2716 static item_location get_item_location( Character &p, item &it, const tripoint &pos )
2717 {
2718  // Item on a character
2719  if( p.has_item( it ) ) {
2720  return item_location( p, &it );
2721  }
2722 
2723  // Item in a vehicle
2724  if( const optional_vpart_position &vp = get_map().veh_at( pos ) ) {
2725  vehicle_cursor vc( vp->vehicle(), vp->part_index() );
2726  bool found_in_vehicle = false;
2727  vc.visit_items( [&]( const item * e, item * ) {
2728  if( e == &it ) {
2729  found_in_vehicle = true;
2730  return VisitResponse::ABORT;
2731  }
2732  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
2733  } );
2734  if( found_in_vehicle ) {
2735  return item_location( vc, &it );
2736  }
2737  }
2738 
2739  // Item on the map
2740  return item_location( map_cursor( pos ), &it );
2741 }
2742 
2743 std::optional<int> repair_item_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
2744  const tripoint &position ) const
2745 {
2746  if( !can_use_tool( *p, it, true ) ) {
2747  return std::nullopt;
2748  }
2749 
2750  p->assign_activity( ACT_REPAIR_ITEM, 0, p->get_item_position( &it ), INT_MIN );
2751  // We also need to store the repair actor subtype in the activity
2752  p->activity.str_values.push_back( type );
2753  // storing of item_location to support repairs by tools on the ground
2754  p->activity.targets.emplace_back( get_item_location( *p, it, position ) );
2755  // All repairs are done in the activity, including charge cost and target item selection
2756  return 0;
2757 }
2758 
2759 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> repair_item_actor::clone() const
2760 {
2761  return std::make_unique<repair_item_actor>( *this );
2762 }
2763 
2764 std::set<itype_id> repair_item_actor::get_valid_repair_materials( const item &fix ) const
2765 {
2766  std::set<itype_id> valid_entries;
2767  for( const auto &mat : materials ) {
2768  if( fix.can_repair_with( mat ) ) {
2769  const itype_id &component_id = mat.obj().repaired_with();
2770  // Certain (different!) materials are repaired with the same components (steel, iron, hard steel use scrap metal).
2771  // This checks avoids adding the same component twice, which is annoying to the user.
2772  if( valid_entries.find( component_id ) != valid_entries.end() ) {
2773  continue;
2774  }
2775  valid_entries.insert( component_id );
2776  }
2777  }
2778  return valid_entries;
2779 }
2780 
2781 bool repair_item_actor::handle_components( Character &pl, const item &fix,
2782  bool print_msg, bool just_check, bool check_consumed_available ) const
2783 {
2784  // Entries valid for repaired items
2785  std::set<itype_id> valid_entries = get_valid_repair_materials( fix );
2786 
2787  if( valid_entries.empty() ) {
2788  if( print_msg ) {
2789  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %s is not made of any of:" ),
2790  fix.tname() );
2791  for( const auto &mat_name : materials ) {
2792  const material_type &mat = mat_name.obj();
2793  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "%s (repaired using %s)" ), mat.name(),
2794  item::nname( mat.repaired_with(), 2 ) );
2795  }
2796  }
2797 
2798  return false;
2799  }
2800 
2801  const inventory &crafting_inv = pl.crafting_inventory();
2802 
2803  // Repairing or modifying items requires at least 1 repair item,
2804  // otherwise number is related to size of item
2805  // Round up if checking, but roll if actually consuming
2806  // TODO: should 250_ml be part of the cost_scaling?
2807  const int items_needed = std::max<int>( 1, just_check ?
2808  std::ceil( fix.base_volume() / 250_ml * cost_scaling ) :
2809  roll_remainder( fix.base_volume() / 250_ml * cost_scaling ) );
2810 
2811  std::function<bool( const item & )> filter;
2812  if( fix.is_filthy() ) {
2813  filter = []( const item & component ) {
2814  return component.allow_crafting_component();
2815  };
2816  } else {
2817  filter = is_crafting_component;
2818  }
2819 
2820  // Go through all discovered repair items and see if we have any of them available
2821  std::vector<item_comp> comps;
2822  for( const itype_id &component_id : valid_entries ) {
2823  if( item::count_by_charges( component_id ) ) {
2824  if( crafting_inv.has_charges( component_id, items_needed ) ) {
2825  comps.emplace_back( component_id, items_needed );
2826  }
2827  } else if( crafting_inv.has_amount( component_id, items_needed, false, filter ) ) {
2828  comps.emplace_back( component_id, items_needed );
2829  }
2830  }
2831 
2832  if( check_consumed_available && comps.empty() ) {
2833  if( print_msg ) {
2834  for( const itype_id &mat_comp : valid_entries ) {
2835  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
2836  _( "You don't have enough clean %s to do that. Have: %d, need: %d" ),
2837  item::nname( mat_comp, 2 ),
2838  item::find_type( mat_comp )->count_by_charges() ?
2839  crafting_inv.charges_of( mat_comp, items_needed ) :
2840  crafting_inv.amount_of( mat_comp, false ),
2841  items_needed );
2842  }
2843  }
2844 
2845  return false;
2846  }
2847 
2848  if( !just_check ) {
2849  if( comps.empty() ) {
2850  // This shouldn't happen - the check in can_repair_target should prevent it
2851  // But report it, just in case
2852  debugmsg( "Attempted repair with no components" );
2853  }
2854 
2855  pl.consume_items( comps, 1, filter );
2856  }
2857 
2858  return true;
2859 }
2860 
2861 // Find the difficulty of the recipe for the item type.
2862 // Base difficulty is the repair difficulty of the hardest thing to repair it is made of.
2863 // if the training variable is true, then we're just repairing the easiest part of the thing.
2864 // so instead take the easiest thing to repair it is made of.
2865 static std::pair<int, bool> find_repair_difficulty( const itype &it )
2866 {
2867  int difficulty = -1;
2868  bool difficulty_defined = false;
2869 
2870  if( !it.materials.empty() ) {
2871  for( const auto &mats : it.materials ) {
2872  if( difficulty < mats.first->repair_difficulty() ) {
2873  difficulty = mats.first->repair_difficulty();
2874  difficulty_defined = true;
2875  }
2876  }
2877  }
2878 
2879  return { difficulty, difficulty_defined };
2880 }
2881 
2882 // Returns the level of the most difficult material to repair in the item
2883 // Or if it has a repairs_like, the lowest level recipe that results in that.
2884 // If none exist the difficulty is 10
2885 int repair_item_actor::repair_recipe_difficulty( const item &fix ) const
2886 {
2887  std::pair<int, bool> ret;
2888  ret = find_repair_difficulty( *fix.type );
2889  int diff = ret.first;
2890  bool defined = ret.second;
2891 
2892  // See if there's a repairs_like that has a defined difficulty
2893  if( !defined && !fix.type->repairs_like.is_empty() ) {
2894  ret = find_repair_difficulty( fix.type->repairs_like.obj() );
2895  if( ret.second ) {
2896  diff = ret.first;
2897  defined = true;
2898  }
2899  }
2900 
2901  // If we still don't find a difficulty, difficulty is 10
2902  if( !defined ) {
2903  diff = 10;
2904  }
2905 
2906  return diff;
2907 }
2908 
2909 bool repair_item_actor::can_repair_target( Character &pl, const item &fix, bool print_msg,
2910  bool check_consumed_available ) const
2911 {
2912  // In some rare cases (indices getting scrambled after inventory overflow)
2913  // our `fix` can be a different item.
2914  if( fix.is_null() ) {
2915  if( print_msg ) {
2916  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have that item!" ) );
2917  }
2918  return false;
2919  }
2920  if( fix.is_firearm() ) {
2921  if( print_msg ) {
2922  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That requires gunsmithing tools." ) );
2923  }
2924  return false;
2925  }
2926  if( fix.count_by_charges() || fix.has_flag( flag_NO_REPAIR ) ) {
2927  if( print_msg ) {
2928  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot repair this type of item." ) );
2929  }
2930  return false;
2931  }
2932 
2933  if( any_of( materials.begin(), materials.end(), [&fix]( const material_id & mat ) {
2934  return mat.obj()
2935  .repaired_with() == fix.typeId();
2936  } ) ) {
2937  if( print_msg ) {
2938  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This can be used to repair other items, not itself." ) );
2939  }
2940  return false;
2941  }
2942 
2943  if( !handle_components( pl, fix, print_msg, true, check_consumed_available ) ) {
2944  return false;
2945  }
2946 
2947  const bool can_be_refitted = fix.has_flag( flag_VARSIZE );
2948  if( can_be_refitted && !fix.has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
2949  return true;
2950  }
2951 
2952  const bool resizing_matters = fix.get_sizing( pl ) != item::sizing::ignore;
2953  const bool small = pl.get_size() == creature_size::tiny;
2954  const bool can_resize = small != fix.has_flag( flag_UNDERSIZE );
2955  if( can_be_refitted && resizing_matters && can_resize ) {
2956  return true;
2957  }
2958 
2959  if( fix.damage() > fix.degradation() ) {
2960  return true;
2961  }
2962 
2963  if( print_msg ) {
2964  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot improve your %s any more this way." ), fix.tname() );
2965  }
2966  return false;
2967 }
2968 
2969 std::pair<float, float> repair_item_actor::repair_chance(
2970  const Character &pl, const item &fix, repair_item_actor::repair_type action_type ) const
2971 {
2972  /** @EFFECT_TAILOR randomly improves clothing repair efforts */
2973  /** @EFFECT_MECHANICS randomly improves metal repair efforts */
2974  const float skill = pl.get_skill_level( used_skill );
2975  const int material_difficulty = repair_recipe_difficulty( fix );
2976  int action_difficulty = 0;
2977  switch( action_type ) {
2978  case RT_NOTHING: /* fallthrough */
2979  case RT_DOWNSIZING: /* fallthrough */
2980  case RT_UPSIZING:
2981  break;
2982  case RT_REPAIR:
2983  action_difficulty = fix.damage_level();
2984  break;
2985  case RT_REFIT:
2986  // Let's make refitting as hard as recovering an almost-wrecked item
2987  action_difficulty = fix.max_damage() / itype::damage_scale;
2988  break;
2989  case RT_PRACTICE:
2990  // Skill gain scales with recipe difficulty, so practice difficulty should too
2991  action_difficulty = material_difficulty;
2992  break;
2993  default:
2994  // 5 is obsoleted reinforcing, remove after 0.H
2995  action_difficulty = 1'000'000; // ensure failure
2996  break;
2997  }
2998 
2999  const int difficulty = material_difficulty + action_difficulty;
3000  // Sample numbers - cotton and wool have diff 1, plastic diff 3 and kevlar diff 4:
3001  // This assumes that training is false, and under almost all circumstances that should be the case
3002  // Item | Damage | Skill | Dex | Success | Failure
3003  // Hoodie | 1 | 0 | 8 | 4.0% | 1.4%
3004  // Hoodie | Refit | 0 | 8 | 2.0% | 2.4%
3005  // Hoodie | Refit | 2 | 8 | 6.0% | 0.4%
3006  // Hoodie | Refit | 2 | 12 | 6.0% | 0.0%
3007  // Hoodie | Refit | 4 | 8 | 10.0% | 0.0%
3008  // Socks | 3 | 0 | 8 | 2.0% | 2.4%
3009  // Boots | 1 | 0 | 8 | 0.0% | 3.4%
3010  // Raincoat | Refit | 2 | 8 | 2.0% | 2.4%
3011  // Raincoat | Refit | 2 | 12 | 2.0% | 1.6%
3012  // Ski mask | Refit | 2 | 8 | 4.0% | 1.4%
3013  // Raincoat | Refit | 2 | 8 | 4.0% | 1.4%
3014  // Turnout | Refit | 2 | 8 | 0.0% | 4.4%
3015  // Turnout | Refit | 4 | 8 | 2.0% | 2.4%
3016 
3017  float success_chance = ( 10 + 2 * skill - 2 * difficulty + tool_quality / 5.0f ) / 100.0f;
3018  /** @EFFECT_DEX reduces the chances of damaging an item when repairing */
3019  float damage_chance = ( difficulty - skill - ( tool_quality + pl.dex_cur ) / 5.0f ) / 100.0f;
3020 
3021  damage_chance = std::max( 0.0f, std::min( 1.0f, damage_chance ) );
3022  success_chance = std::max( 0.0f, std::min( 1.0f - damage_chance, success_chance ) );
3023 
3024  return std::make_pair( success_chance, damage_chance );
3025 }
3026 
3027 repair_item_actor::repair_type repair_item_actor::default_action( const item &fix,
3028  int current_skill_level ) const
3029 {
3030  if( fix.damage() > fix.degradation() ) {
3031  return RT_REPAIR;
3032  }
3033 
3034  const bool can_be_refitted = fix.has_flag( flag_VARSIZE );
3035  const bool doesnt_fit = !fix.has_flag( flag_FIT );
3036  if( doesnt_fit && can_be_refitted ) {
3037  return RT_REFIT;
3038  }
3039 
3040  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3041  const bool smol = player_character.get_size() == creature_size::tiny;
3042 
3043  const bool is_undersized = fix.has_flag( flag_UNDERSIZE );
3044  const bool is_oversized = fix.has_flag( flag_OVERSIZE );
3045  const bool resizing_matters = fix.get_sizing( player_character ) != item::sizing::ignore;
3046 
3047  const bool too_big_while_smol = smol && !is_undersized && !is_oversized;
3048  if( too_big_while_smol && can_be_refitted && resizing_matters ) {
3049  return RT_DOWNSIZING;
3050  }
3051 
3052  const bool too_small_while_big = !smol && is_undersized && !is_oversized;
3053  if( too_small_while_big && can_be_refitted && resizing_matters ) {
3054  return RT_UPSIZING;
3055  }
3056 
3057  if( current_skill_level <= trains_skill_to ) {
3058  return RT_PRACTICE;
3059  }
3060 
3061  return RT_NOTHING;
3062 }
3063 
3064 static bool damage_item( Character &pl, item_location &fix )
3065 {
3066  const std::string startdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3067  const bool destroyed = fix->inc_damage();
3068  const std::string resultdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3069  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You damage your %s! ( %s-> %s)" ), fix->tname( 1, false ),
3070  startdurability, resultdurability );
3071  if( destroyed ) {
3072  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You destroy it!" ) );
3073  if( fix.where() == item_location::type::character ) {
3074  pl.i_rem_keep_contents( fix.get_item() );
3075  } else {
3076  for( const item *it : fix->all_items_top() ) {
3077  if( it->has_flag( flag_NO_DROP ) ) {
3078  continue;
3079  }
3080  put_into_vehicle_or_drop( pl, item_drop_reason::tumbling, { *it }, fix.pos_bub() );
3081  }
3082  fix.remove_item();
3083  }
3084 
3085  pl.calc_encumbrance();
3086  pl.calc_discomfort();
3087 
3088  return true;
3089  }
3090 
3091  return false;
3092 }
3093 
3094 repair_item_actor::attempt_hint repair_item_actor::repair( Character &pl, item &tool,
3095  item_location &fix, bool refit_only ) const
3096 {
3097  if( !can_use_tool( pl, tool, true ) ) {
3098  return AS_CANT_USE_TOOL;
3099  }
3100  if( !can_repair_target( pl, *fix, true, true ) ) {
3101  return AS_CANT;
3102  }
3103 
3104  const int current_skill_level = pl.get_skill_level( used_skill );
3105  repair_item_actor::repair_type action;
3106  if( refit_only ) {
3107  if( fix->has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
3108  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "The %s already fits!" ), fix->tname() );
3109  return AS_CANT;
3110  } else if( !fix->has_flag( flag_VARSIZE ) ) {
3111  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "This %s cannot be refitted!" ), fix->tname() );
3112  return AS_CANT;
3113  } else {
3114  action = RT_REFIT;
3115  }
3116  } else {
3117  action = default_action( *fix, current_skill_level );
3118  }
3119  const auto chance = repair_chance( pl, *fix, action );
3120  int practice_amount = repair_recipe_difficulty( *fix ) / 2 + 1;
3121  float roll_value = rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 );
3122  enum roll_result {
3123  SUCCESS,
3124  FAILURE,
3125  NEUTRAL
3126  } roll;
3127 
3128  if( roll_value > 1.0f - chance.second ) {
3129  roll = FAILURE;
3130  } else if( roll_value < chance.first ) {
3131  roll = SUCCESS;
3132  } else {
3133  roll = NEUTRAL;
3134  }
3135 
3136  if( action == RT_NOTHING ) {
3137  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You won't learn anything more by doing that." ) );
3138  return AS_CANT;
3139  }
3140 
3141  // If not for this if, it would spam a lot
3142  if( current_skill_level > trains_skill_to ) {
3143  practice_amount = 0;
3144  }
3145  pl.practice( used_skill, practice_amount, trains_skill_to );
3146 
3147  if( roll == FAILURE ) {
3148  if( chance.first <= 0.0f ) {
3149  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
3150  _( "It seems working on your %s is just beyond your current level of expertise." ),
3151  fix->tname() );
3152  }
3153  return damage_item( pl, fix ) ? AS_DESTROYED : AS_FAILURE;
3154  }
3155 
3156  if( action == RT_PRACTICE ) {
3157  return AS_RETRY;
3158  }
3159 
3160  if( action == RT_REPAIR ) {
3161  if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3162  const std::string startdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3163  handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false, true );
3164 
3165  fix->mod_damage( -itype::damage_scale );
3166 
3167  const std::string resultdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3168  if( fix->repairable_levels() ) {
3169  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You repair your %s! ( %s-> %s)" ),
3170  fix->tname( 1, false ), startdurability, resultdurability );
3171  } else {
3172  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You repair your %s completely! ( %s-> %s)" ),
3173  fix->tname( 1, false ), startdurability, resultdurability );
3174  }
3175  return AS_SUCCESS;
3176  }
3177 
3178  return AS_RETRY;
3179  }
3180 
3181  if( action == RT_REFIT ) {
3182  if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3183  if( !fix->has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
3184  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You take your %s in, improving the fit." ),
3185  fix->tname() );
3186  fix->set_flag( flag_FIT );
3187 
3188  pl.calc_encumbrance();
3189  }
3190  handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false, true );
3191  return AS_SUCCESS;
3192  }
3193 
3194  return AS_RETRY;
3195  }
3196 
3197  if( action == RT_DOWNSIZING ) {
3198  //We don't need to check for smallness or undersize because DOWNSIZING already guarantees that
3199  if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3200  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You resize the %s to accommodate your tiny build." ),
3201  fix->tname().c_str() );
3202  fix->set_flag( flag_UNDERSIZE );
3203  pl.calc_encumbrance();
3204  handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false, true );
3205  return AS_SUCCESS;
3206  }
3207  return AS_RETRY;
3208  }
3209 
3210  if( action == RT_UPSIZING ) {
3211  //We don't need to check for smallness or undersize because UPSIZING already guarantees that
3212  if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3213  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You adjust the %s back to its normal size." ),
3214  fix->tname().c_str() );
3215  fix->unset_flag( flag_UNDERSIZE );
3216  pl.calc_encumbrance();
3217  handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false, true );
3218  return AS_SUCCESS;
3219  }
3220  return AS_RETRY;
3221  }
3222 
3223  pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot improve your %s any more this way." ), fix->tname() );
3224  return AS_CANT;
3225 }
3226 
3227 std::string repair_item_actor::action_description( repair_item_actor::repair_type rt )
3228 {
3229  static const std::array<std::string, NUM_REPAIR_TYPES> arr = {{
3230  translate_marker( "Nothing" ),
3231  translate_marker( "Repairing" ),
3232  translate_marker( "Refitting" ),
3233  translate_marker( "Downsizing" ),
3234  translate_marker( "Upsizing" ),
3235  "Obsolete",
3236  translate_marker( "Practicing" )
3237  }
3238  };
3239 
3240  return _( arr[rt] );
3241 }
3242 
3243 std::string repair_item_actor::get_name() const
3244 {
3245  return _( "Repair" );
3246 }
3247 
3248 std::string repair_item_actor::get_description() const
3249 {
3250  const std::string mats = enumerate_as_string( materials.begin(), materials.end(),
3251  []( const material_id & mid ) {
3252  return mid->name();
3253  } );
3254  return string_format( _( "Repair %s" ), mats );
3255 }
3256 
3257 void heal_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
3258 {
3259  // Mandatory
3260  move_cost = obj.get_int( "move_cost" );
3261  limb_power = obj.get_float( "limb_power", 0 );
3262 
3263  // Optional
3264  bandages_power = obj.get_float( "bandages_power", 0 );
3265  bandages_scaling = obj.get_float( "bandages_scaling", 0.25f * bandages_power );
3266  disinfectant_power = obj.get_float( "disinfectant_power", 0 );
3267  disinfectant_scaling = obj.get_float( "disinfectant_scaling", 0.25f * disinfectant_power );
3268 
3269  head_power = obj.get_float( "head_power", 0.8f * limb_power );
3270  torso_power = obj.get_float( "torso_power", 1.5f * limb_power );
3271 
3272  limb_scaling = obj.get_float( "limb_scaling", 0.25f * limb_power );
3273  double scaling_ratio = limb_power < 0.0001f ? 0.0 :
3274  static_cast<double>( limb_scaling / limb_power );
3275  head_scaling = obj.get_float( "head_scaling", scaling_ratio * head_power );
3276  torso_scaling = obj.get_float( "torso_scaling", scaling_ratio * torso_power );
3277 
3278  bleed = obj.get_int( "bleed", 0 );
3279  bite = obj.get_float( "bite", 0.0f );
3280  infect = obj.get_float( "infect", 0.0f );
3281 
3282  if( obj.has_array( "effects" ) ) {
3283  for( const JsonObject e : obj.get_array( "effects" ) ) {
3284  effects.push_back( load_effect_data( e ) );
3285  }
3286  }
3287 
3288  if( obj.has_string( "used_up_item" ) ) {
3289  obj.read( "used_up_item", used_up_item_id, true );
3290  } else if( obj.has_object( "used_up_item" ) ) {
3291  JsonObject u = obj.get_object( "used_up_item" );
3292  u.read( "id", used_up_item_id, true );
3293  used_up_item_quantity = u.get_int( "quantity", used_up_item_quantity );
3294  used_up_item_charges = u.get_int( "charges", used_up_item_charges );
3295  used_up_item_flags = u.get_tags<flag_id>( "flags" );
3296  }
3297 }
3298 
3299 static Character &get_patient( Character &healer, const tripoint &pos )
3300 {
3301  if( healer.pos() == pos ) {
3302  return healer;
3303  }
3304 
3305  Character *const person = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<Character>( pos );
3306  if( !person ) {
3307  // Default to heal self on failure not to break old functionality
3308  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IUSE, "No heal target at position %d,%d,%d", pos.x, pos.y, pos.z );
3309  return healer;
3310  }
3311 
3312  return *person;
3313 }
3314 
3315 std::optional<int> heal_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint &pos ) const
3316 {
3317  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
3318  return std::nullopt;
3319  }
3320  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
3321  return std::nullopt;
3322  }
3323  if( it.is_filthy() ) {
3324  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't use filthy items for healing." ) );
3325  return std::nullopt;
3326  }
3327 
3328  Character &patient = get_patient( *p, pos );
3329  const bodypart_str_id hpp = use_healing_item( *p, patient, it, false ).id();
3330  if( hpp == bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
3331  return std::nullopt;
3332  }
3333 
3334  // each tier of proficiency cuts required time by half
3335  int cost = move_cost;
3336  cost = p->has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care_expert ) ? cost / 2 : cost;
3337  cost = p->has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ? cost / 2 : cost;
3338 
3339  p->assign_activity( firstaid_activity_actor( cost, it.tname(), patient.getID() ) );
3340 
3341  // Player: Only time this item_location gets used in firstaid::finish() is when activating the item's
3342  // container from the inventory window, so an item_on_person impl is all that is needed.
3343  // Otherwise the proper item_location provided by menu selection supercedes it in consume::finish().
3344  // NPC: Will only use its inventory for first aid items.
3345  p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, &it );
3346  p->activity.str_values.emplace_back( hpp.c_str() );
3347  p->set_moves( 0 );
3348  return 0;
3349 }
3350 
3351 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> heal_actor::clone() const
3352 {
3353  return std::make_unique<heal_actor>( *this );
3354 }
3355 
3356 int heal_actor::get_heal_value( const Character &healer, bodypart_id healed ) const
3357 {
3358  int heal_base;
3359  float bonus_mult;
3360  if( healed == bodypart_id( "head" ) ) {
3361  heal_base = head_power;
3362  bonus_mult = head_scaling;
3363  } else if( healed == bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) {
3364  heal_base = torso_power;
3365  bonus_mult = torso_scaling;
3366  } else {
3367  heal_base = limb_power;
3368  bonus_mult = limb_scaling;
3369  }
3370 
3371  if( heal_base > 0 ) {
3372  /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3373  return round( heal_base + bonus_mult * healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) );
3374  }
3375 
3376  return heal_base;
3377 }
3378 
3379 int heal_actor::get_bandaged_level( const Character &healer ) const
3380 {
3381  if( bandages_power > 0 ) {
3382  float prof_bonus = healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
3383  prof_bonus = healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ?
3384  prof_bonus + 1 : prof_bonus;
3385  prof_bonus = healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care_expert ) ?
3386  prof_bonus + 2 : prof_bonus;
3387  /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3388  float total_bonus = bandages_power + bandages_scaling * prof_bonus;
3389  total_bonus = healer.enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::BANDAGE_BONUS,
3390  total_bonus );
3391  return round( total_bonus );
3392  }
3393 
3394  return bandages_power;
3395 }
3396 
3397 int heal_actor::get_disinfected_level( const Character &healer ) const
3398 {
3399  if( disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
3400  /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3401  float prof_bonus = healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
3402  prof_bonus = healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ?
3403  prof_bonus + 1 : prof_bonus;
3404  prof_bonus = healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care_expert ) ?
3405  prof_bonus + 2 : prof_bonus;
3406  float total_bonus = disinfectant_power + disinfectant_scaling * prof_bonus;
3407  total_bonus = healer.enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::DISINFECTANT_BONUS,
3408  total_bonus );
3409  return round( total_bonus );
3410  }
3411 
3412  return disinfectant_power;
3413 }
3414 
3415 int heal_actor::get_stopbleed_level( const Character &healer ) const
3416 {
3417  if( bleed > 0 ) {
3418  /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3419  float prof_bonus = healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) / 2;
3420  prof_bonus = healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ?
3421  prof_bonus + 1 : prof_bonus;
3422  prof_bonus = healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care_expert ) ?
3423  prof_bonus + 2 : prof_bonus;
3424  float total_bonus = bleed * prof_bonus;
3425  total_bonus = healer.enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::BLEED_STOP_BONUS,
3426  total_bonus );
3427  return round( total_bonus );
3428  }
3429 
3430  return bleed;
3431 }
3432 
3433 int heal_actor::finish_using( Character &healer, Character &patient, item &it,
3434  bodypart_id healed ) const
3435 {
3436  float practice_amount = limb_power * 3.0f;
3437  const int dam = get_heal_value( healer, healed );
3438  const int cur_hp = patient.get_part_hp_cur( healed );
3439 
3440  if( ( cur_hp >= 1 ) && ( dam > 0 ) ) { // Prevent first-aid from mending limbs
3441  patient.heal( healed, dam );
3442  } else if( ( cur_hp >= 1 ) && ( dam < 0 ) ) {
3443  patient.apply_damage( nullptr, healed, -dam ); //hurt takes + damage
3444  }
3445 
3446  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3447  const bool u_see = healer.is_avatar() || patient.is_avatar() ||
3448  player_character.sees( healer ) || player_character.sees( patient );
3449  const bool player_healing_player = healer.is_avatar() && patient.is_avatar();
3450  // Need a helper here - messages are from healer's point of view
3451  // but it would be cool if NPCs could use this function too
3452  const auto heal_msg = [&]( game_message_type msg_type,
3453  const char *player_player_msg, const char *other_msg ) {
3454  if( !u_see ) {
3455  return;
3456  }
3457 
3458  if( player_healing_player ) {
3459  add_msg( msg_type, player_player_msg );
3460  } else {
3461  add_msg( msg_type, other_msg );
3462  }
3463  };
3464 
3465  if( patient.has_effect( effect_bleed, healed ) ) {
3466  // small band-aids won't stop big arterial bleeding, but with tourniquet they just might
3467  int pwr = 3 * get_stopbleed_level( healer );
3468  if( patient.worn_with_flag( flag_TOURNIQUET, healed ) ) {
3469  pwr *= 2;
3470  }
3471  if( pwr > patient.get_effect_int( effect_bleed, healed ) ) {
3472  effect &wound = patient.get_effect( effect_bleed, healed );
3473  time_duration dur = wound.get_duration() - ( get_stopbleed_level( healer ) *
3474  wound.get_int_dur_factor() );
3475  wound.set_duration( std::max( 0_turns, dur ) );
3476  if( wound.get_duration() == 0_turns ) {
3477  heal_msg( m_good, _( "You stop the bleeding." ), _( "The bleeding is stopped." ) );
3478  } else {
3479  heal_msg( m_good, _( "You reduce the bleeding, but it's not stopped yet." ),
3480  _( "The bleeding is reduced, but not stopped." ) );
3481  }
3482  } else {
3483  heal_msg( m_warning,
3484  _( "Your dressing is too ineffective for a bleeding of this extent, and you fail to stop it." ),
3485  _( "The wound still bleeds." ) );
3486  }
3487  practice_amount += bleed / 3.0f;
3488  }
3489  if( patient.has_effect( effect_bite, healed ) ) {
3490  if( x_in_y( bite, 1.0f ) ) {
3491  patient.remove_effect( effect_bite, healed );
3492  heal_msg( m_good, _( "You clean the wound." ), _( "The wound is cleaned." ) );
3493  } else {
3494  heal_msg( m_warning, _( "Your wound still aches." ), _( "The wound still looks bad." ) );
3495  }
3496 
3497  practice_amount += bite * 3.0f;
3498  }
3499  if( patient.has_effect( effect_infected, healed ) ) {
3500  if( x_in_y( infect, 1.0f ) ) {
3501  const time_duration infected_dur = patient.get_effect_dur( effect_infected, healed );
3502  patient.remove_effect( effect_infected, healed );
3503  patient.add_effect( effect_recover, infected_dur );
3504  heal_msg( m_good, _( "You disinfect the wound." ), _( "The wound is disinfected." ) );
3505  } else {
3506  heal_msg( m_warning, _( "Your wound still hurts." ), _( "The wound still looks nasty." ) );
3507  }
3508 
3509  practice_amount += infect * 10.0f;
3510  }
3511 
3512  healer.add_msg_if_player( _( "You finish using the %s." ), it.tname() );
3513 
3514  if( u_see && !healer.is_avatar() ) {
3515  //~ Healing complete message. %1$s is healer name, %2$s is item name.
3516  add_msg( _( "%1$s finishes using the %2$s." ), healer.disp_name(), it.tname() );
3517  }
3518 
3519  for( const effect_data &eff : effects ) {
3520  patient.add_effect( eff.id, eff.duration, eff.bp, eff.permanent );
3521  }
3522 
3523  if( !used_up_item_id.is_empty() ) {
3524  // If the item is a tool, `make` it the new form
3525  // Otherwise it probably was consumed, so create a new one
3526  if( it.is_tool() ) {
3527  it.convert( used_up_item_id, &healer );
3528  for( const auto &flag : used_up_item_flags ) {
3529  it.set_flag( flag );
3530  }
3531  } else {
3532  item used_up( used_up_item_id, it.birthday() );
3533  used_up.charges = used_up_item_charges;
3534  for( const auto &flag : used_up_item_flags ) {
3535  used_up.set_flag( flag );
3536  }
3537  healer.i_add_or_drop( used_up, used_up_item_quantity );
3538  }
3539  }
3540 
3541  // apply healing over time effects
3542  if( bandages_power > 0 ) {
3543  int bandages_intensity = get_bandaged_level( healer );
3544  patient.add_effect( effect_bandaged, 1_turns, healed );
3545  effect &e = patient.get_effect( effect_bandaged, healed );
3546  e.set_duration( e.get_int_dur_factor() * ( bandages_intensity + 0.5f ) );
3547  patient.set_part_damage_bandaged( healed,
3548  patient.get_part_hp_max( healed ) - patient.get_part_hp_cur( healed ) );
3549  practice_amount += 2 * bandages_intensity;
3550  }
3551  if( disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
3552  int disinfectant_intensity = get_disinfected_level( healer );
3553  patient.add_effect( effect_disinfected, 1_turns, healed );
3554  effect &e = patient.get_effect( effect_disinfected, healed );
3555  e.set_duration( e.get_int_dur_factor() * ( disinfectant_intensity + 0.5f ) );
3556  patient.set_part_damage_disinfected( healed,
3557  patient.get_part_hp_max( healed ) - patient.get_part_hp_cur( healed ) );
3558  practice_amount += 2 * disinfectant_intensity;
3559  }
3560  practice_amount = std::max( 9.0f, practice_amount );
3561 
3562  healer.practice( skill_firstaid, static_cast<int>( practice_amount ) );
3563  healer.practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care,
3564  time_duration::from_turns( practice_amount ) );
3565  healer.practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care_expert,
3566  time_duration::from_turns( practice_amount ) );
3567  return 1;
3568 }
3569 
3570 static bodypart_id pick_part_to_heal(
3571  const Character &healer, const Character &patient,
3572  const std::string &menu_header,
3573  int limb_power, int head_bonus, int torso_bonus,
3574  int bleed_stop, float bite_chance, float infect_chance,
3575  bool force, float bandage_power, float disinfectant_power )
3576 {
3577  const bool bleed = bleed_stop > 0;
3578  const bool bite = bite_chance > 0.0f;
3579  const bool infect = infect_chance > 0.0f;
3580  const bool precise = &healer == &patient ? false :
3581  /** @EFFECT_PER slightly increases precision when using first aid on someone else */
3582  /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases precision when using first aid on someone else */
3583  ( ( healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) +
3584  ( healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ? 0 : 1 ) +
3585  ( healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ? 0 : 2 ) ) * 4 +
3586  healer.per_cur >= 20 );
3587  while( true ) {
3588  bodypart_id healed_part = patient.body_window( menu_header, force, precise,
3589  limb_power, head_bonus, torso_bonus,
3590  bleed_stop, bite_chance, infect_chance, bandage_power, disinfectant_power );
3591  if( healed_part == bodypart_id( "bp_null" ) ) {
3592  return bodypart_id( "bp_null" );
3593  }
3594 
3595  if( healed_part->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) ) {
3596  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't use first aid on a bionic limb." ) );
3597  continue;
3598  }
3599 
3600  if( ( infect && patient.has_effect( effect_infected, healed_part ) ) ||
3601  ( bite && patient.has_effect( effect_bite, healed_part ) ) ||
3602  ( bleed && patient.has_effect( effect_bleed, healed_part ) ) ) {
3603  return healed_part;
3604  }
3605 
3606  if( patient.is_limb_broken( healed_part ) ) {
3607  if( healed_part == bodypart_id( "arm_l" ) || healed_part == bodypart_id( "arm_r" ) ) {
3608  add_msg( m_info, _( "That arm is broken. It needs surgical attention or a splint." ) );
3609  } else if( healed_part == bodypart_id( "leg_l" ) || healed_part == bodypart_id( "leg_r" ) ) {
3610  add_msg( m_info, _( "That leg is broken. It needs surgical attention or a splint." ) );
3611  } else {
3612  debugmsg( "That body part is bugged. It needs developer's attention." );
3613  }
3614 
3615  continue;
3616  }
3617 
3618  if( force || patient.get_part_hp_cur( healed_part ) < patient.get_part_hp_max( healed_part ) ) {
3619  return healed_part;
3620  }
3621  }
3622 }
3623 
3624 bodypart_id heal_actor::use_healing_item( Character &healer, Character &patient, item &it,
3625  bool force ) const
3626 {
3627  bodypart_id healed = bodypart_id( "bp_null" );
3628  const int head_bonus = get_heal_value( healer, bodypart_id( "head" ) );
3629  const int limb_power = get_heal_value( healer, bodypart_id( "arm_l" ) );
3630  const int torso_bonus = get_heal_value( healer, bodypart_id( "torso" ) );
3631 
3632  if( !patient.can_use_heal_item( it ) ) {
3633  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
3634  _( "Your biology is not compatible with that item." ),
3635  _( "<npcname>'s biology is not compatible with that item." ) );
3636  return bodypart_id( "bp_null" ); // canceled
3637  }
3638 
3639  if( healer.is_npc() ) {
3640  // NPCs heal whatever has sustained the most damage that they can heal but don't
3641  // rebandage parts unless they are bleeding significantly
3642  int highest_damage = 0;
3643  for( bodypart_id part_id : patient.get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
3644  int damage = 0;
3645  if( ( !patient.has_effect( effect_bandaged, part_id ) && bandages_power > 0 ) ||
3646  ( !patient.has_effect( effect_disinfected, part_id ) && disinfectant_power > 0 ) ) {
3647  damage += patient.get_part_hp_max( part_id ) - patient.get_part_hp_cur( part_id );
3648  damage += infect * patient.get_effect_dur( effect_infected, part_id ) / 10_minutes;
3649  }
3650  if( patient.get_effect_int( effect_bleed, part_id ) > 5 && bleed > 0 ) {
3651  damage += bleed * patient.get_effect_dur( effect_bleed, part_id ) / 5_minutes;
3652  }
3653  if( patient.has_effect( effect_bite, part_id ) && disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
3654  damage += bite * patient.get_effect_dur( effect_bite, part_id ) / 1_minutes;
3655  }
3656  if( damage > highest_damage ) {
3657  highest_damage = damage;
3658  healed = part_id;
3659  }
3660  }
3661  } else if( patient.is_avatar() ) {
3662  // Player healing self - let player select
3663  if( healer.activity.id() != ACT_FIRSTAID ) {
3664  const std::string menu_header = _( "Select a body part for: " ) + it.tname();
3665  healed = pick_part_to_heal( healer, patient, menu_header, limb_power, head_bonus, torso_bonus,
3666  get_stopbleed_level( healer ), bite, infect, force, get_bandaged_level( healer ),
3667  get_disinfected_level( healer ) );
3668  if( healed == bodypart_id( "bp_null" ) ) {
3669  add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
3670  return bodypart_id( "bp_null" ); // canceled
3671  }
3672  return healed;
3673  } else {
3674  // Completed activity, extract body part from it.
3675  healed = bodypart_id( healer.activity.str_values[0] );
3676  }
3677  } else {
3678  // Player healing NPC
3679  // TODO: Remove this hack, allow using activities on NPCs
3680  const std::string menu_header = string_format( pgettext( "healing",
3681  //~ %1$s: patient name, %2$s: healing item name
3682  "Select a body part of %1$s for %2$s:" ),
3683  patient.disp_name(), it.tname() );
3684  healed = pick_part_to_heal( healer, patient, menu_header, limb_power, head_bonus, torso_bonus,
3685  get_stopbleed_level( healer ), bite, infect, force, get_bandaged_level( healer ),
3686  get_disinfected_level( healer ) );
3687  }
3688 
3689  return healed;
3690 }
3691 
3692 void heal_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
3693 {
3694  if( head_power > 0 || torso_power > 0 || limb_power > 0 || bandages_power > 0 ||
3695  disinfectant_power > 0 || bleed > 0 || bite > 0.0f || infect > 0.0f ) {
3696  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "<bold>Healing effects</bold> " ) );
3697  }
3698 
3699  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3700  if( head_power > 0 || torso_power > 0 || limb_power > 0 ) {
3701  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Base healing: " ) );
3702  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_BASE", _( "Head: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline, head_power );
3703  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_BASE", _( " Torso: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline, torso_power );
3704  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_BASE", _( " Limbs: " ), limb_power );
3705  if( g != nullptr ) {
3706  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual healing: " ) );
3707  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_ACT", _( "Head: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline,
3708  get_heal_value( player_character, bodypart_id( "head" ) ) );
3709  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_ACT", _( " Torso: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline,
3710  get_heal_value( player_character, bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) );
3711  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_ACT", _( " Limbs: " ), get_heal_value( player_character,
3712  bodypart_id( "arm_l" ) ) );
3713  }
3714  }
3715 
3716  if( bandages_power > 0 ) {
3717  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Base bandaging quality: " ),
3718  texitify_base_healing_power( static_cast<int>( bandages_power ) ) );
3719  if( g != nullptr ) {
3720  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual bandaging quality: " ),
3721  texitify_healing_power( get_bandaged_level( player_character ) ) );
3722  }
3723  }
3724 
3725  if( disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
3726  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Base disinfecting quality: " ),
3727  texitify_base_healing_power( static_cast<int>( disinfectant_power ) ) );
3728  if( g != nullptr ) {
3729  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual disinfecting quality: " ),
3730  texitify_healing_power( get_disinfected_level( player_character ) ) );
3731  }
3732  }
3733  if( bleed > 0 ) {
3734  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Effect on bleeding: " ), texitify_bandage_power( bleed ) );
3735  if( g != nullptr ) {
3736  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual effect on bleeding: " ),
3737  texitify_healing_power( get_stopbleed_level( get_player_character() ) ) );
3738  }
3739  }
3740  if( bite > 0.0f || infect > 0.0f ) {
3741  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Chance to heal (percent): " ) );
3742  if( bite > 0.0f ) {
3743  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "* Bite: " ),
3744  static_cast<int>( bite * 100 ) );
3745  }
3746  if( infect > 0.0f ) {
3747  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "* Infection: " ),
3748  static_cast<int>( infect * 100 ) );
3749  }
3750  }
3751  dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Moves to use: " ), move_cost );
3752 }
3753 
3754 place_trap_actor::place_trap_actor( const std::string &type ) :
3755  iuse_actor( type ), needs_neighbor_terrain( ter_str_id::NULL_ID() ),
3756  outer_layer_trap( trap_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {}
3757 
3758 place_trap_actor::data::data() : trap( trap_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {}
3759 
3760 void place_trap_actor::data::load( const JsonObject &obj )
3761 {
3762  assign( obj, "trap", trap );
3763  assign( obj, "done_message", done_message );
3764  assign( obj, "practice", practice );
3765  assign( obj, "moves", moves );
3766 }
3767 
3768 void place_trap_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
3769 {
3770  assign( obj, "allow_underwater", allow_underwater );
3771  assign( obj, "allow_under_player", allow_under_player );
3772  assign( obj, "needs_solid_neighbor", needs_solid_neighbor );
3773  assign( obj, "needs_neighbor_terrain", needs_neighbor_terrain );
3774  assign( obj, "bury_question", bury_question );
3775  if( !bury_question.empty() ) {
3776  JsonObject buried_json = obj.get_object( "bury" );
3777  buried_data.load( buried_json );
3778  }
3779  unburied_data.load( obj );
3780  assign( obj, "outer_layer_trap", outer_layer_trap );
3781 }
3782 
3783 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> place_trap_actor::clone() const
3784 {
3785  return std::make_unique<place_trap_actor>( *this );
3786 }
3787 
3788 static bool is_solid_neighbor( const tripoint &pos, const point &offset )
3789 {
3790  map &here = get_map();
3791  const tripoint a = pos + tripoint( offset, 0 );
3792  const tripoint b = pos - tripoint( offset, 0 );
3793  return here.move_cost( a ) != 2 && here.move_cost( b ) != 2;
3794 }
3795 
3796 static bool has_neighbor( const tripoint &pos, const ter_id &terrain_id )
3797 {
3798  map &here = get_map();
3799  for( const tripoint &t : here.points_in_radius( pos, 1, 0 ) ) {
3800  if( here.ter( t ) == terrain_id ) {
3801  return true;
3802  }
3803  }
3804  return false;
3805 }
3806 
3807 bool place_trap_actor::is_allowed( Character &p, const tripoint &pos,
3808  const std::string &name ) const
3809 {
3810  if( !allow_under_player && pos == p.pos() ) {
3811  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Yeah. Place the %s at your feet. Real damn smart move." ),
3812  name );
3813  return false;
3814  }
3815  map &here = get_map();
3816  if( here.move_cost( pos ) != 2 ) {
3817  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't place a %s there." ), name );
3818  return false;
3819  }
3820  if( needs_solid_neighbor ) {
3821  if( !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_east ) && !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_south ) &&
3822  !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_south_east ) && !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_north_east ) ) {
3823  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You must place the %s between two solid tiles." ), name );
3824  return false;
3825  }
3826  }
3827  if( needs_neighbor_terrain && !has_neighbor( pos, needs_neighbor_terrain ) ) {
3828  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %s needs a %s adjacent to it." ), name,
3829  needs_neighbor_terrain.obj().name() );
3830  return false;
3831  }
3832  const trap &existing_trap = here.tr_at( pos );
3833  if( !existing_trap.is_null() ) {
3834  if( existing_trap.can_see( pos, p ) ) {
3835  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
3836  existing_trap.is_benign()
3837  ? _( "You can't place a %s there. It contains a deployed object already." )
3838  : _( "You can't place a %s there. It contains a trap already." ),
3839  name );
3840  } else {
3841  p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You trigger a %s!" ), existing_trap.name() );
3842  existing_trap.trigger( pos, p );
3843  }
3844  return false;
3845  }
3846  return true;
3847 }
3848 
3849 static void place_and_add_as_known( Character &p, const tripoint &pos, const trap_str_id &id )
3850 {
3851  map &here = get_map();
3852  here.trap_set( pos, id );
3853  const trap &tr = here.tr_at( pos );
3854  if( !tr.can_see( pos, p ) ) {
3855  p.add_known_trap( pos, tr );
3856  }
3857 }
3858 
3859 std::optional<int> place_trap_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
3860 {
3861  const bool could_bury = !bury_question.empty();
3862  if( !allow_underwater && p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
3863  return std::nullopt;
3864  }
3865  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
3866  return std::nullopt;
3867  }
3868  const std::optional<tripoint> pos_ = choose_adjacent( string_format( _( "Place %s where?" ),
3869  it.tname() ) );
3870  if( !pos_ ) {
3871  return std::nullopt;
3872  }
3873  tripoint pos = *pos_;
3874 
3875  if( !is_allowed( *p, pos, it.tname() ) ) {
3876  return std::nullopt;
3877  }
3878 
3879  map &here = get_map();
3880  int distance_to_trap_center = unburied_data.trap.obj().get_trap_radius() +
3881  outer_layer_trap.obj().get_trap_radius() + 1;
3882  if( unburied_data.trap.obj().get_trap_radius() > 0 ) {
3883  // Math correction for multi-tile traps
3884  pos.x = ( pos.x - p->posx() ) * distance_to_trap_center + p->posx();
3885  pos.y = ( pos.y - p->posy() ) * distance_to_trap_center + p->posy();
3886  for( const tripoint &t : here.points_in_radius( pos, outer_layer_trap.obj().get_trap_radius(),
3887  0 ) ) {
3888  if( !is_allowed( *p, t, it.tname() ) ) {
3889  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
3890  _( "That trap needs a space in %d tiles radius to be clear, centered %d tiles from you." ),
3891  outer_layer_trap.obj().get_trap_radius(), distance_to_trap_center );
3892  return std::nullopt;
3893  }
3894  }
3895  }
3896 
3897  const bool has_shovel = p->has_quality( qual_DIG, 3 );
3898  const bool is_diggable = here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DIGGABLE, pos );
3899  bool bury = false;
3900  if( could_bury && has_shovel && is_diggable ) {
3901  bury = query_yn( "%s", bury_question );
3902  }
3903  const place_trap_actor::data &data = bury ? buried_data : unburied_data;
3904 
3905  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, data.done_message.translated(), here.tername( pos ) );
3906  p->practice( skill_traps, data.practice );
3907  p->practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_traps,
3908  time_duration::from_seconds( data.practice * 30 ) );
3909  p->practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_trapsetting,
3910  time_duration::from_seconds( data.practice * 30 ) );
3911 
3912  //Total time to set the trap will be determined by player's skills and proficiencies
3913  int move_cost_final = std::round( ( data.moves * std::min( 1,
3914  ( data.practice ^ 2 ) ) ) / ( p->get_skill_level( skill_traps ) <= 1 ? 1 : p->get_skill_level(
3915  skill_traps ) ) );
3916  if( !p->has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_trapsetting ) ) {
3917  move_cost_final = move_cost_final * 2;
3918  }
3919  if( !p->has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_traps ) ) {
3920  move_cost_final = move_cost_final * 4;
3921  }
3922 
3923  //This probably needs to be done via assign_activity
3924  p->mod_moves( -move_cost_final );
3925 
3926  place_and_add_as_known( *p, pos, data.trap );
3927  for( const tripoint &t : here.points_in_radius( pos, data.trap.obj().get_trap_radius(), 0 ) ) {
3928  if( t != pos ) {
3929  place_and_add_as_known( *p, t, outer_layer_trap );
3930  }
3931  }
3932  return 1;
3933 }
3934 
3935 void emit_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
3936 {
3937  assign( obj, "emits", emits );
3938  assign( obj, "scale_qty", scale_qty );
3939 }
3940 
3941 std::optional<int> emit_actor::use( Character *, item &it, const tripoint &pos ) const
3942 {
3943  map &here = get_map();
3944  const float scaling = scale_qty ? it.charges : 1.0f;
3945  for( const auto &e : emits ) {
3946  here.emit_field( pos, e, scaling );
3947  }
3948 
3949  return 1;
3950 }
3951 
3952 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> emit_actor::clone() const
3953 {
3954  return std::make_unique<emit_actor>( *this );
3955 }
3956 
3957 void emit_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
3958 {
3959  /*
3960  // TODO: This must be called after all finalization
3961  for( const auto& e : emits ) {
3962  if( !e.is_valid() ) {
3963  debugmsg( "Item %s has unknown emit source %s", my_item_type.c_str(), e.c_str() );
3964  }
3965  }
3966  */
3967 
3968  if( scale_qty && !item::count_by_charges( my_item_type ) ) {
3969  debugmsg( "Item %s has emit_actor with scale_qty, but is not counted by charges",
3970  my_item_type.c_str() );
3971  scale_qty = false;
3972  }
3973 }
3974 
3975 void saw_barrel_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
3976 {
3977  assign( jo, "cost", cost );
3978 }
3979 
3980 //Todo: Make this consume charges if performed with a tool that uses charges.
3981 std::optional<int> saw_barrel_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
3982 {
3983  if( !p ) {
3984  debugmsg( "%s called action saw_barrel that requires character but no character is present",
3985  it.typeId().str() );
3986  return std::nullopt;
3987  }
3988 
3989  item_location loc = game_menus::inv::saw_barrel( *p, it );
3990 
3991  if( !loc ) {
3992  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
3993  return std::nullopt;
3994  }
3995 
3996  item &obj = *loc.obtain( *p );
3997  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You saw down the barrel of your %s." ), obj.tname() );
3998  obj.put_in( item( "barrel_small", calendar::turn ), pocket_type::MOD );
3999 
4000  return 0;
4001 }
4002 
4003 ret_val<void> saw_barrel_actor::can_use_on( const Character &, const item &,
4004  const item &target ) const
4005 {
4006  if( !target.is_gun() ) {
4007  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "It's not a gun." ) );
4008  }
4009 
4010  if( target.type->gun->barrel_volume <= 0_ml ) {
4011  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "The barrel is too small." ) );
4012  }
4013 
4014  if( target.gunmod_find( itype_barrel_small ) ) {
4015  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "The barrel is already sawn-off." ) );
4016  }
4017 
4018  const auto gunmods = target.gunmods();
4019  const bool modified_barrel = std::any_of( gunmods.begin(), gunmods.end(),
4020  []( const item * mod ) {
4021  return mod->type->gunmod->location == gunmod_location( "barrel" );
4022  } );
4023 
4024  if( modified_barrel ) {
4025  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Can't saw off modified barrels." ) );
4026  }
4027 
4028  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
4029 }
4030 
4031 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> saw_barrel_actor::clone() const
4032 {
4033  return std::make_unique<saw_barrel_actor>( *this );
4034 }

4037 {
4038  assign( jo, "cost", cost );
4039 }
4040 
4041 //Todo: Make this consume charges if performed with a tool that uses charges.
4042 std::optional<int> saw_stock_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
4043 {
4044  if( !p ) {
4045  debugmsg( "%s called action saw_stock that requires character but no character is present",
4046  it.typeId().str() );
4047  return std::nullopt;
4048  }
4049 
4050  item_location loc = game_menus::inv::saw_stock( *p, it );
4051 
4052  if( !loc ) {
4053  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4054  return std::nullopt;
4055  }
4056 
4057  item &obj = *loc.obtain( *p );
4058  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You saw down the stock of your %s." ), obj.tname() );
4059  obj.put_in( item( "stock_none", calendar::turn ), pocket_type::MOD );
4060 
4061  return 0;
4062 }
4063 
4064 ret_val<void> saw_stock_actor::can_use_on( const Character &, const item &,
4065  const item &target ) const
4066 {
4067  if( !target.is_gun() ) {
4068  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "It's not a gun." ) );
4069  }
4070 
4071  if( target.gunmod_find( itype_stock_none ) ) {
4072  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "The stock is already sawn-off." ) );
4073  }
4074 
4075  if( target.gun_type() == gun_type_type( "pistol" ) ) {
4076  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "This gun doesn't have a stock." ) );
4077  }
4078 
4079  const auto gunmods = target.gunmods();
4080  const bool modified_stock = std::any_of( gunmods.begin(), gunmods.end(),
4081  []( const item * mod ) {
4082  return mod->type->gunmod->location == gunmod_location( "stock" );
4083  } );
4084 
4085  const bool accessorized_stock = std::any_of( gunmods.begin(), gunmods.end(),
4086  []( const item * mod ) {
4087  return mod->type->gunmod->location == gunmod_location( "stock accessory" );
4088  } );
4089 
4090  if( target.get_free_mod_locations( gunmod_location( "stock mount" ) ) < 1 ) {
4091  return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
4092  _( "Can't cut off modern composite stocks (must have an empty stock mount)." ) );
4093  }
4094 
4095  if( modified_stock ) {
4096  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Can't cut off modified stocks." ) );
4097  }
4098 
4099  if( accessorized_stock ) {
4100  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Can't cut off accessorized stocks." ) );
4101  }
4102 
4103  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
4104 }
4105 
4106 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> saw_stock_actor::clone() const
4107 {
4108  return std::make_unique<saw_stock_actor>( *this );
4109 }
