4112 {
4113  assign( jo, "size", size );
4114  assign( jo, "moves", moves );
4115 }
4116 
4117 std::optional<int> molle_attach_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
4118  const tripoint & ) const
4119 {
4120  if( !p ) {
4121  debugmsg( "%s called action molle_attach that requires character but no character is present",
4122  it.typeId().str() );
4123  return std::nullopt;
4124  }
4125 
4126  item_location loc = game_menus::inv::molle_attach( *p, it );
4127 
4128  if( !loc ) {
4129  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4130  return std::nullopt;
4131  }
4132 
4133  item &obj = *loc.get_item();
4134  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You attach %s to your MOLLE webbing." ), obj.tname() );
4135 
4136  it.get_contents().add_pocket( obj );
4137 
4138  // the item has been added to the vest it should no longer exist in the world
4139  loc.remove_item();
4140 
4141  return 0;
4142 }
4143 
4144 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> molle_attach_actor::clone() const
4145 {
4146  return std::make_unique<molle_attach_actor>( *this );
4147 }
4148 
4149 std::optional<int> molle_detach_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
4150  const tripoint & ) const
4151 {
4152 
4153  std::vector<const item *> items_attached = it.get_contents().get_added_pockets();
4154  uilist prompt;
4155  prompt.text = _( "Remove which accessory?" );
4156 
4157  for( size_t i = 0; i != items_attached.size(); ++i ) {
4158  prompt.addentry( i, true, -1, items_attached[i]->tname() );
4159  }
4160 
4161  prompt.query();
4162 
4163  if( prompt.ret >= 0 ) {
4164  p->i_add( it.get_contents().remove_pocket( prompt.ret ) );
4165  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You remove the item from your %s." ), it.tname() );
4166  return 0;
4167  }
4168 
4169  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4170  return std::nullopt;
4171 }
4172 
4173 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> molle_detach_actor::clone() const
4174 {
4175  return std::make_unique<molle_detach_actor>( *this );
4176 }
4177 
4178 void molle_detach_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
4179 {
4180  assign( jo, "moves", moves );
4181 }
4182 
4183 std::optional<int> install_bionic_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
4184  const tripoint & ) const
4185 {
4186  if( p->can_install_bionics( *it.type, *p, false ) ) {
4187  if( !p->has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) && !p->has_flag( json_flag_MANUAL_CBM_INSTALLATION ) ) {
4188  p->consume_installation_requirement( it.type->bionic->id );
4189  p->consume_anesth_requirement( *it.type, *p );
4190  }
4191  if( p->install_bionics( *it.type, *p, false ) ) {
4192  return 1;
4193  }
4194  }
4195  return std::nullopt;
4196 }
4197 
4198 ret_val<void> install_bionic_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
4199  const tripoint & ) const
4200 {
4201  if( !it.is_bionic() ) {
4202  return ret_val<void>::make_failure();
4203  }
4204  const bionic_id &bid = it.type->bionic->id;
4205  if( p.is_mounted() ) {
4206  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't install bionics while mounted." ) );
4207  }
4208  if( !p.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) ) {
4209  if( bid->installation_requirement.is_empty() && !p.has_flag( json_flag_MANUAL_CBM_INSTALLATION ) ) {
4210  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't self-install this CBM." ) );
4211  } else if( it.has_flag( flag_FILTHY ) ) {
4212  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't install a filthy CBM!" ) );
4213  } else if( it.has_flag( flag_NO_STERILE ) ) {
4214  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "This CBM is not sterile, you can't install it." ) );
4215  } else if( it.has_fault( fault_bionic_salvaged ) ) {
4216  return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
4217  _( "This CBM is already deployed. You need to reset it to factory state." ) );
4218  } else if( units::energy( std::numeric_limits<int>::max(), units::energy::unit_type{} ) -
4219  p.get_max_power_level() < bid->capacity ) {
4220  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Max power capacity already reached" ) );
4221  }
4222  }
4223 
4224  if( p.has_bionic( bid ) && !bid->dupes_allowed ) {
4225  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You have already installed this bionic." ) );
4226  } else if( bid->upgraded_bionic && !p.has_bionic( bid->upgraded_bionic ) ) {
4227  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "There is nothing to upgrade." ) );
4228  } else {
4229  const bool downgrade =
4230  std::any_of( bid->available_upgrades.begin(), bid->available_upgrades.end(),
4231  [&p]( const bionic_id & b ) {
4232  return p.has_bionic( b );
4233  } );
4234 
4235  if( downgrade ) {
4236  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You have a superior version installed." ) );
4237  }
4238  }
4239 
4240  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
4241 }
4242 
4243 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> install_bionic_actor::clone() const
4244 {
4245  return std::make_unique<install_bionic_actor>( *this );
4246 }
4247 
4248 void install_bionic_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
4249 {
4250  if( !item::find_type( my_item_type )->bionic ) {
4251  debugmsg( "Item %s has install_bionic actor, but it's not a bionic.", my_item_type.c_str() );
4252  }
4253 }
4254 
4255 std::optional<int> detach_gunmods_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
4256  const tripoint & ) const
4257 {
4258  auto filter_irremovable = []( std::vector<item *> &gunmods ) {
4259  gunmods.erase(
4260  std::remove_if(
4261  gunmods.begin(), gunmods.end(), []( const item * i ) {
4262  return i->is_irremovable();
4263  } ),
4264  gunmods.end() );
4265  };
4266 
4267  item gun_copy = item( it );
4268  std::vector<item *> mods = it.gunmods();
4269  std::vector<item *> mods_copy = gun_copy.gunmods();
4270 
4271  filter_irremovable( mods );
4272  filter_irremovable( mods_copy );
4273 
4274  item_location mod_loc = game_menus::inv::gunmod_to_remove( *p, it );
4275 
4276  if( !mod_loc ) {
4277  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4278  return std::nullopt;
4279  }
4280 
4281  // Find the index of the mod to be removed
4282  // used in identifying the mod in mods and mods_copy
4283  int mod_index = -1;
4284  for( size_t i = 0; i != mods.size(); ++i ) {
4285  if( mods[ i ] == mod_loc.get_item() ) {
4286  mod_index = i;
4287  break;
4288  }
4289  }
4290 
4291  if( mod_index >= 0 ) {
4292  gun_copy.remove_item( *mods_copy[mod_index] );
4293 
4294  if( p->meets_requirements( *mods[mod_index], gun_copy ) ||
4295  query_yn( _( "Are you sure? You may be lacking the skills needed to reattach this modification." ) ) ) {
4296 
4297  if( game_menus::inv::compare_items( it, gun_copy, _( "Remove modification?" ) ) ) {
4298  p->gunmod_remove( it, *mods[mod_index] );
4299  return 0;
4300  }
4301  }
4302  }
4303 
4304  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4305  return std::nullopt;
4306 }
4307 
4308 ret_val<void> detach_gunmods_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
4309  const tripoint & ) const
4310 {
4311  const std::vector<const item *> mods = it.gunmods();
4312 
4313  if( mods.empty() ) {
4314  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Doesn't appear to be modded." ) );
4315  }
4316 
4317  const bool no_removables =
4318  std::all_of( mods.begin(), mods.end(),
4319  []( const item * mod ) {
4320  return mod->is_irremovable();
4321  } );
4322 
4323  if( no_removables ) {
4324  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "None of the mods can be removed." ) );
4325  }
4326 
4327  if( p.is_worn(
4328  it ) ) { // Prevent removal of shoulder straps and thereby making the gun un-wearable again.
4329  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Has to be taken off first." ) );
4330  }
4331 
4332  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
4333 }
4334 
4335 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> detach_gunmods_actor::detach_gunmods_actor::clone() const
4336 {
4337  return std::make_unique<detach_gunmods_actor>( *this );
4338 }
4339 
4340 void detach_gunmods_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
4341 {
4342  if( !item::find_type( my_item_type )->gun ) {
4343  debugmsg( "Item %s has detach_gunmods_actor actor, but it's a gun.", my_item_type.c_str() );
4344  }
4345 }
4346 
4347 std::optional<int> modify_gunmods_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
4348  const tripoint &pnt ) const
4349 {
4350 
4351  std::vector<item *> mods;
4352  for( item *mod : it.gunmods() ) {
4353  if( mod->is_transformable() ) {
4354  mods.push_back( mod );
4355  }
4356  }
4357 
4358  uilist prompt;
4359  prompt.text = _( "Modify which part" );
4360 
4361  for( size_t i = 0; i != mods.size(); ++i ) {
4362  prompt.addentry( i, true, -1, string_format( "%s: %s", mods[i]->tname(),
4363  mods[i]->get_use( "transform" )->get_name() ) );
4364  }
4365 
4366  prompt.query();
4367 
4368  if( prompt.ret >= 0 ) {
4369  // set gun to default in case this changes anything
4370  it.gun_set_mode( gun_mode_DEFAULT );
4371  p->invoke_item( mods[prompt.ret], "transform", pnt );
4372  it.on_contents_changed();
4373  return 0;
4374  }
4375 
4376  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4377  return std::nullopt;
4378 }
4379 
4380 ret_val<void> modify_gunmods_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
4381  const tripoint & ) const
4382 {
4383  if( !p.is_wielding( it ) ) {
4384  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Need to be wielding." ) );
4385  }
4386  const std::vector<const item *> mods = it.gunmods();
4387 
4388  if( mods.empty() ) {
4389  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Doesn't appear to be modded." ) );
4390  }
4391 
4392  const bool modifiables = std::any_of( mods.begin(), mods.end(),
4393  []( const item * mod ) {
4394  return mod->is_transformable();
4395  } );
4396 
4397  if( !modifiables ) {
4398  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "None of the mods can be modified." ) );
4399  }
4400 
4401  if( p.is_worn(
4402  it ) ) { // I don't know if modifying really needs this but its for future proofing.
4403  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Has to be taken off first." ) );
4404  }
4405 
4406  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
4407 }
4408 
4409 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> modify_gunmods_actor::modify_gunmods_actor::clone() const
4410 {
4411  return std::make_unique<modify_gunmods_actor>( *this );
4412 }
4413 
4414 void modify_gunmods_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
4415 {
4416  if( !item::find_type( my_item_type )->gun ) {
4417  debugmsg( "Item %s has modify_gunmods_actor actor, but it's a gun.", my_item_type.c_str() );
4418  }
4419 }
4420 
4421 void link_up_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
4422 {
4423  jo.read( "cable_length", cable_length );
4424  jo.read( "charge_rate", charge_rate );
4425  jo.read( "efficiency", efficiency );
4426  jo.read( "move_cost", move_cost );
4427  jo.read( "menu_text", menu_text );
4428  jo.read( "targets", targets );
4429  jo.read( "can_extend", can_extend );
4430 }
4431 
4432 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> link_up_actor::clone() const
4433 {
4434  return std::make_unique<link_up_actor>( *this );
4435 }
4436 
4437 std::string link_up_actor::get_name() const
4438 {
4439  if( !menu_text.empty() ) {
4440  return menu_text.translated();
4441  }
4442  return iuse_actor::get_name();
4443 }
4444 
4445 void link_up_actor::info( const item &it, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
4446 {
4447  std::vector<std::string> targets_strings;
4448  bool appliance = false;
4449  if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_port ) > 0 ) {
4450  targets_strings.emplace_back( _( "vehicle controls" ) );
4451  appliance = true;
4452  }
4453  if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_battery ) > 0 ) {
4454  targets_strings.emplace_back( _( "vehicle battery" ) );
4455  appliance = true;
4456  }
4457  if( appliance ) {
4458  targets_strings.emplace_back( _( "appliance" ) );
4459  }
4460  if( targets.count( link_state::bio_cable ) > 0 ) {
4461  targets_strings.emplace_back( _( "bionic" ) );
4462  }
4463  if( targets.count( link_state::ups ) > 0 ) {
4464  targets_strings.emplace_back( _( "UPS" ) );
4465  }
4466  if( targets.count( link_state::solarpack ) > 0 ) {
4467  targets_strings.emplace_back( _( "solar pack" ) );
4468  }
4469  if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_tow ) > 0 ) {
4470  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "<bold>Can tow a vehicle</bold>." ) );
4471  }
4472  if( !targets_strings.empty() ) {
4473  std::string targets_string = enumerate_as_string( targets_strings, enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
4474  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL",
4475  string_format( _( "<bold>Can be plugged into</bold>: %s." ), targets_string ) );
4476  }
4477 
4478  const bool no_extensions = it.cables().empty();
4479  item dummy( it );
4480  dummy.update_link_traits();
4481 
4482  std::string length_all_info = string_format( _( "<bold>Cable length</bold>: %d" ),
4483  dummy.max_link_length() );
4484  std::string length_solo_info = no_extensions ? "" : string_format( _( " (%d without extensions)" ),
4485  cable_length != -1 ? cable_length : dummy.type->maximum_charges() );
4486  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", length_all_info, length_solo_info );
4487 
4488  if( charge_rate != 0_W ) {
4489  //~ Power in Watts. %+4.1f is a 4 digit number with 1 decimal point (ex: 4737.3 W)
4490  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "<bold>Wattage</bold>: " ), string_format( _( "%+4.1f W" ),
4491  units::to_milliwatt( charge_rate ) / 1000.f ) );
4492  }
4493 
4494  if( !can_extend.empty() ) {
4495  std::vector<std::string> cable_types;
4496  cable_types.reserve( can_extend.size() );
4497  for( const std::string &cable_type : can_extend ) {
4498  cable_types.emplace_back( cable_type == "ELECTRICAL_DEVICES" ? _( "electrical device cables" ) :
4499  itype_id( cable_type )->nname( 1 ) );
4500  }
4501  std::string cable_type_list = enumerate_as_string( cable_types, enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
4502  dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", string_format( _( "<bold>Can extend</bold>: %s" ), cable_type_list ) );
4503  }
4504 }
4505 
4506 std::optional<int> link_up_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint &pnt ) const
4507 {
4508  if( !p ) {
4509  debugmsg( "%s called action link_up that requires character but no character is present",
4510  it.typeId().str() );
4511  return std::nullopt;
4512  }
4513 
4514  if( targets.empty() ) {
4515  debugmsg( "Link up action for %s doesn't have any targets!", it.tname() );
4516  return std::nullopt;
4517  }
4518 
4519  const bool is_cable_item = it.has_flag( flag_CABLE_SPOOL );
4520  const bool unspooled = it.link_length() == -1;
4521  const bool has_loose_end = !unspooled && is_cable_item ?
4522  it.link_has_state( link_state::no_link ) : it.has_no_links();
4523 
4524  const int respool_time_per_square = 200;
4525  const bool past_respool_threshold = it.link_length() > item::LINK_RESPOOL_THRESHOLD;
4526  const int respool_time_total = !past_respool_threshold ? 0 :
4527  ( it.link_length() - item::LINK_RESPOOL_THRESHOLD ) * respool_time_per_square;
4528 
4529  vehicle *t_veh = it.has_link_data() ? it.link().t_veh.get() : nullptr;
4530 
4531  uilist link_menu;
4532  if( !is_cable_item || it.has_no_links() ) {
4533  // This is either a device or a cable item without any connections.
4534  link_menu.text = string_format( _( "What to do with the %s?%s" ), it.link_name(), t_veh ?
4535  string_format( _( "\nAttached to: %s" ), t_veh->name ) : "" );
4536  if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_port ) > 0 ) {
4537  link_menu.addentry( 0, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Attach to vehicle controls or appliance" ) );
4538  }
4539  if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_battery ) > 0 ) {
4540  link_menu.addentry( 1, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Attach to vehicle battery or appliance" ) );
4541  }
4542  if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_tow ) > 0 ) {
4543  link_menu.addentry( 10, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Attach tow cable to towing vehicle" ) );
4544  link_menu.addentry( 11, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Attach tow cable to towed vehicle" ) );
4545  }
4546  if( targets.count( link_state::bio_cable ) > 0 ) {
4547  if( !p->get_remote_fueled_bionic().is_empty() ) {
4548  link_menu.addentry( 20, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Attach to Cable Charger System CBM" ) );
4549  }
4550  }
4551  if( targets.count( link_state::ups ) > 0 && p->cache_has_item_with( flag_IS_UPS ) ) {
4552  link_menu.addentry( 21, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Attach to UPS" ) );
4553  }
4554  if( targets.count( link_state::solarpack ) > 0 ) {
4555  const bool has_solar_pack_on = p->worn_with_flag( flag_SOLARPACK_ON );
4556  if( has_solar_pack_on || p->worn_with_flag( flag_SOLARPACK ) ) {
4557  link_menu.addentry( 22, has_loose_end && has_solar_pack_on, -1, _( "Attach to solar pack" ) );
4558  }
4559  }
4560  if( !is_cable_item || !can_extend.empty() ) {
4561  const bool has_extensions = !unspooled &&
4562  !it.all_items_top( pocket_type::CABLE ).empty();
4563  link_menu.addentry( 30, has_loose_end, -1,
4564  is_cable_item ? _( "Extend another cable" ) : _( "Extend with another cable" ) );
4565  link_menu.addentry( 31, has_extensions, -1, _( "Remove cable extensions" ) );
4566  }
4567  if( targets.count( link_state::no_link ) > 0 ) {
4568  if( unspooled ) {
4569  link_menu.addentry( 998, true, -1, _( "Re-spool" ) );
4570  } else {
4571  link_menu.addentry( 999, !it.has_no_links(), -1,
4572  past_respool_threshold ? _( "Detach and re-spool" ) : _( "Detach" ) );
4573  }
4574  }
4575 
4576  } else if( it.link_has_state( link_state::vehicle_tow ) ) {
4577  // Cables that started a tow can finish one or detach; nothing else.
4578  link_menu.text = string_format( _( "What to do with the %s?%s" ), it.link_name(), t_veh ?
4579  string_format( _( "\nAttached to: %s" ), t_veh->name ) : "" );
4580 
4581  link_menu.addentry( 10, has_loose_end && it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_tow, -1,
4582  _( "Attach loose end to towing vehicle" ) );
4583  link_menu.addentry( 11, has_loose_end && it.link().source == link_state::vehicle_tow, -1,
4584  _( "Attach loose end to towed vehicle" ) );
4585  if( targets.count( link_state::no_link ) > 0 ) {
4586  if( unspooled ) {
4587  link_menu.addentry( 998, true, -1, _( "Re-spool" ) );
4588  } else {
4589  link_menu.addentry( 999, true, -1,
4590  past_respool_threshold ? _( "Detach and re-spool" ) : _( "Detach" ) );
4591  }
4592  }
4593 
4594  } else {
4595  // This is a cable item with at least one connection already:
4596  std::string state_desc_lhs;
4597  std::string state_desc_rhs;
4598  if( it.link_has_state( link_state::no_link ) ) {
4599  state_desc_lhs = _( "\nAttached to " );
4600  if( t_veh ) {
4601  state_desc_rhs = it.link().t_veh->name;
4602  } else if( it.link_has_state( link_state::bio_cable ) ) {
4603  state_desc_rhs = _( "Cable Charger System" );
4604  } else if( it.link_has_state( link_state::ups ) ) {
4605  state_desc_rhs = _( "Unified Power Supply" );
4606  } else if( it.link_has_state( link_state::solarpack ) ) {
4607  state_desc_rhs = _( "solar backpack" );
4608  }
4609  } else {
4610  if( it.link().source == link_state::bio_cable ) {
4611  state_desc_lhs = _( "\nConnecting Cable Charger System to " );
4612  } else if( it.link().source == link_state::ups ) {
4613  state_desc_lhs = _( "\nConnecting UPS to " );
4614  } else if( it.link().source == link_state::solarpack ) {
4615  state_desc_lhs = _( "\nConnecting solar backpack to " );
4616  }
4617  if( it.link().t_veh ) {
4618  state_desc_rhs = it.link().t_veh->name;
4619  } else if( it.link().target == link_state::bio_cable ) {
4620  state_desc_rhs = _( "Cable Charger System" );
4621  }
4622  }
4623  link_menu.text = string_format( _( "What to do with the %s?%s%s" ), it.link_name(),
4624  state_desc_lhs, state_desc_rhs );
4625 
4626  // TODO: Allow plugging UPSes and Solar Packs into more than just bionics.
4627  // There is already code to support setting up a link, but none for actual functionality.
4628  if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_port ) > 0 ) {
4629  link_menu.addentry( 0, has_loose_end && !it.link_has_state( link_state::ups ) &&
4630  !it.link_has_state( link_state::solarpack ),
4631  -1, _( "Attach loose end to vehicle controls or appliance" ) );
4632  }
4633  if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_battery ) > 0 ) {
4634  link_menu.addentry( 1, has_loose_end && !it.link_has_state( link_state::ups ) &&
4635  !it.link_has_state( link_state::solarpack ),
4636  -1, _( "Attach loose end to vehicle battery or appliance" ) );
4637  }
4638  if( targets.count( link_state::bio_cable ) > 0 && !p->get_remote_fueled_bionic().is_empty() ) {
4639  link_menu.addentry( 20, has_loose_end && !it.link_has_state( link_state::bio_cable ),
4640  -1, _( "Attach loose end to Cable Charger System CBM" ) );
4641  }
4642  if( targets.count( link_state::ups ) > 0 && p->cache_has_item_with( flag_IS_UPS ) ) {
4643  link_menu.addentry( 21, has_loose_end && it.link_has_state( link_state::bio_cable ),
4644  -1, _( "Attach loose end to UPS" ) );
4645  }
4646  if( targets.count( link_state::solarpack ) > 0 ) {
4647  const bool has_solar_pack_on = p->worn_with_flag( flag_SOLARPACK_ON );
4648  if( has_solar_pack_on || p->worn_with_flag( flag_SOLARPACK ) ) {
4649  link_menu.addentry( 22, has_loose_end && has_solar_pack_on &&
4650  it.link_has_state( link_state::bio_cable ),
4651  -1, _( "Attach loose end to solar pack" ) );
4652  }
4653  }
4654  if( !can_extend.empty() ) {
4655  const bool has_extensions = !unspooled &&
4656  !it.all_items_top( pocket_type::CABLE ).empty();
4657  link_menu.addentry( 30, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Extend another cable" ) );
4658  link_menu.addentry( 31, has_extensions, -1, _( "Remove cable extensions" ) );
4659  }
4660  if( targets.count( link_state::no_link ) > 0 ) {
4661  if( unspooled ) {
4662  link_menu.addentry( 998, true, -1, _( "Re-spool" ) );
4663  } else {
4664  link_menu.addentry( 999, true, -1,
4665  past_respool_threshold ? _( "Detach and re-spool" ) : _( "Detach" ) );
4666  }
4667  }
4668  }
4669 
4670  int choice = -1;
4671  if( targets.size() == 1 ) {
4672  choice = link_menu.entries.begin()->retval;
4673  } else {
4674  link_menu.query();
4675  choice = link_menu.ret;
4676  }
4677 
4678  if( choice < 0 ) {
4679  // Cancelled selection.
4680  return std::nullopt;
4681 
4682  } else if( choice >= 998 ) {
4683  // Selection: Detach & respool.
4684 
4685  // Reopen the menu after respooling.
4686  p->assign_activity( invoke_item_activity_actor( item_location{*p, &it}, "link_up" ) );
4687  p->activity.auto_resume = true;
4688 
4689  if( t_veh ) {
4690  // Cancel out the linked device's power draw so the vehicle's power display will be accurate.
4691  int power_draw = it.charge_linked_batteries( *t_veh, 0 );
4692  t_veh->linked_item_epower_this_turn += units::from_milliwatt( power_draw );
4693  }
4694 
4695  it.reset_link( true, p );
4696  // Cables that are too long need to be manually rewound before reuse.
4697  if( it.link_length() == -1 ) {
4698  p->assign_activity( player_activity( reel_cable_activity_actor( respool_time_total, item_location{*p, &it} ) ) );
4699  return 0;
4700  } else {
4701  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, string_format( is_cable_item ? _( "You detach the %s." ) :
4702  _( "You gather the %s up with it." ), it.link_name() ) );
4703  }
4704  return 0;
4705  }
4706 
4707  if( choice == 0 || choice == 1 ) {
4708  // Selection: Attach electrical cable to vehicle ports / appliances, OR vehicle batteries.
4709  return link_to_veh_app( p, it, choice == 0 );
4710 
4711  } else if( choice == 10 || choice == 11 ) {
4712  // Selection: Attach tow cable to towing/towed vehicle.
4713  return link_tow_cable( p, it, choice == 10 );
4714 
4715  } else if( choice == 30 ) {
4716  // Selection: Attach to another cable, resulting in a longer one.
4717  return link_extend_cable( p, it, pnt );
4718 
4719  } else if( choice == 31 ) {
4720  // Selection: Remove all cable extensions and give the individual cables to the player.
4721  return remove_extensions( p, it );
4722  }
4723 
4724  map &here = get_map();
4725 
4726  if( choice == 20 ) {
4727  // Selection: Attach electrical cable to Cable Charger System CBM.
4728  if( it.has_no_links() ) {
4729  it.link().target = link_state::bio_cable;
4730  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You attach the cable to your Cable Charger System." ) );
4731  } else if( it.link().source == link_state::ups ) {
4732  it.link().target = link_state::bio_cable;
4733  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged into the UPS." ) );
4734  } else if( it.link().source == link_state::solarpack ) {
4735  it.link().target = link_state::bio_cable;
4736  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged into the solar backpack." ) );
4737  } else if( it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_port ||
4738  it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_battery ) {
4739  it.link().source = link_state::bio_cable;
4740  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged into the vehicle." ) );
4741  }
4742 
4743  it.update_link_traits();
4744  it.process( here, p, p->pos() );
4745  p->mod_moves( -move_cost );
4746  return 0;
4747 
4748  } else if( choice == 21 ) {
4749  // Selection: Attach electrical cable to ups.
4750  item_location loc;
4751  avatar *you = p->as_avatar();
4752  const std::string choose_ups = _( "Choose UPS:" );
4753  const std::string dont_have_ups = _( "You need an active UPS." );
4754  auto ups_filter = [&]( const item & itm ) {
4755  return itm.has_flag( flag_IS_UPS );
4756  };
4757 
4758  if( you != nullptr ) {
4759  loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( ups_filter, *you, choose_ups, -1, dont_have_ups );
4760  }
4761  if( !loc ) {
4762  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4763  return std::nullopt;
4764  }
4765 
4766  if( it.has_no_links() ) {
4767  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You attach the cable to the UPS." ) );
4768  } else if( it.link().target == link_state::bio_cable ) {
4769  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged into the UPS." ) );
4770  } else if( it.link().source == link_state::solarpack ) {
4771  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You link up the UPS and the solar backpack." ) );
4772  } else if( it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_port ||
4773  it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_battery ) {
4774  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You link up the UPS and the vehicle." ) );
4775  }
4776 
4777  it.link().source = link_state::ups;
4778  loc->set_var( "cable", "plugged_in" );
4779  it.update_link_traits();
4780  it.process( here, p, p->pos() );
4781  p->mod_moves( -move_cost );
4782  return 0;
4783 
4784  } else if( choice == 22 ) {
4785  // Selection: Attach electrical cable to solar pack.
4786  item_location loc;
4787  avatar *you = p->as_avatar();
4788  const std::string choose_solar = _( "Choose solar pack:" );
4789  const std::string dont_have_solar = _( "You need an unfolded solar pack." );
4790  auto solar_filter = [&]( const item & itm ) {
4791  return itm.has_flag( flag_SOLARPACK_ON );
4792  };
4793 
4794  if( you != nullptr ) {
4795  loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( solar_filter, *you, choose_solar, -1, dont_have_solar );
4796  }
4797  if( !loc ) {
4798  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4799  return std::nullopt;
4800  }
4801 
4802  if( it.has_no_links() ) {
4803  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You attach the cable to the solar pack." ) );
4804  } else if( it.link().target == link_state::bio_cable ) {
4805  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged into the solar pack." ) );
4806  } else if( it.link().source == link_state::ups ) {
4807  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You link up the solar pack and the UPS." ) );
4808  } else if( it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_port ||
4809  it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_battery ) {
4810  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You link up the solar pack and the vehicle." ) );
4811  }
4812 
4813  it.link().source = link_state::solarpack;
4814  loc->set_var( "cable", "plugged_in" );
4815  it.update_link_traits();
4816  it.process( here, p, p->pos() );
4817  p->mod_moves( -move_cost );
4818  return 0;
4819  }
4820  return std::nullopt;
4821 }
4822 
4823 std::optional<int> link_up_actor::link_to_veh_app( Character *p, item &it,
4824  const bool to_ports ) const
4825 {
4826  map &here = get_map();
4827  // Selection: Attach electrical cable to vehicle ports / appliances, OR vehicle batteries.
4828 
4829  const auto can_link = [&here, &to_ports]( const tripoint & point ) {
4830  const optional_vpart_position ovp = here.veh_at( point );
4831  return ovp && ovp->vehicle().avail_linkable_part( ovp->mount(), to_ports ) != -1;
4832  };
4833  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight( _( "Attach the cable where?" ),
4834  "", can_link, false, false );
4835  if( !pnt_ ) {
4836  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4837  return std::nullopt;
4838  }
4839  const tripoint &selection = *pnt_;
4840  const optional_vpart_position sel_vp = here.veh_at( selection );
4841  if( !sel_vp ) {
4842  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There's no vehicle there." ) );
4843  return std::nullopt;
4844  }
4845 
4846  // You used to be able to plug cables in anywhere on a vehicle, so there's extra effort here
4847  // to inform players that they can only plug them into dashboards or electrical controls now.
4848  if( !can_link( selection ) ) {
4849  if( to_ports && sel_vp && sel_vp->vehicle().has_part( "CABLE_PORTS" ) ) {
4850  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
4851  _( "You can't attach it there - try the dashboard or electronics controls." ) );
4852  } else if( !to_ports && sel_vp && !sel_vp->vehicle().batteries.empty() ) {
4853  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
4854  _( "You can't attach it there - try the battery." ) );
4855  } else {
4856  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't attach it there." ) );
4857  }
4858  return std::nullopt;
4859  }
4860 
4861  if( !it.link_has_state( link_state::vehicle_port ) &&
4862  !it.link_has_state( link_state::vehicle_battery ) ) {
4863 
4864  // Starting a new connection to a vehicle or connecting a cable CBM to a vehicle.
4865  bool had_bio_link = it.link_has_state( link_state::bio_cable );
4866  ret_val<void> result = it.link_to( sel_vp, to_ports ? link_state::vehicle_port :
4867  link_state::vehicle_battery );
4868  if( !result.success() ) {
4869  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, result.str() );
4870  return 0;
4871  }
4872 
4873  // Get the part name for the connection message, using the vehicle name as a fallback.
4874  const int part_index = sel_vp->vehicle().avail_linkable_part( sel_vp->mount(), to_ports );
4875  const std::string sel_vp_name = part_index == -1 ? sel_vp->vehicle().name :
4876  sel_vp->vehicle().part( part_index ).name( false );
4877 
4878  if( had_bio_link ) {
4879  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged into the %s." ), sel_vp_name );
4880  it.link().source = link_state::bio_cable;
4881  } else {
4882  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You connect the %1$s to the %2$s." ), it.type_name(), sel_vp_name );
4883  }
4884 
4885  it.process( here, p, p->pos() );
4886  p->mod_moves( -move_cost );
4887  return 0;
4888 
4889  } else {
4890 
4891  // Connecting two vehicles together.
4892  const bool using_power_cord = it.typeId() == itype_power_cord;
4893  if( using_power_cord && it.link().t_veh->is_powergrid() && sel_vp->vehicle().is_powergrid() ) {
4894  // If both vehicles are adjacent power grids, try to merge them together first.
4895  const point prev_pos = here.bub_from_abs( it.link().t_veh->coord_translate( it.link().t_mount ) +
4896  it.link().t_abs_pos ).xy().raw();
4897  if( selection.xy().distance( prev_pos ) <= 1.5f &&
4898  it.link().t_veh->merge_appliance_into_grid( sel_vp->vehicle() ) ) {
4899  it.link().t_veh->part_removal_cleanup();
4900  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You merge the two power grids." ) );
4901  return 1;
4902  }
4903  // Unable to merge, so connect them with a power cord instead.
4904  }
4905  ret_val<void> result = it.link_to( sel_vp, to_ports ? link_state::vehicle_port :
4906  link_state::vehicle_battery );
4907  if( !result.success() ) {
4908  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, result.str() );
4909  return 0;
4910  }
4911  if( using_power_cord || p->has_item( it ) ) {
4912  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, result.str() );
4913  }
4914 
4915  if( using_power_cord ) {
4916  // Remove linked_flag from attached parts - the just-added cable vehicle parts do the same thing.
4917  it.reset_link( true, p );
4918  }
4919  p->mod_moves( -move_cost );
4920  return 1; // Let the cable be destroyed.
4921  }
4922 }
4923 
4924 std::optional<int> link_up_actor::link_tow_cable( Character *p, item &it,
4925  const bool to_towing ) const
4926 {
4927  map &here = get_map();
4928 
4929  const auto can_link = [&here]( const tripoint & point ) {
4930  const optional_vpart_position ovp = here.veh_at( point );
4931  return ovp && ovp->vehicle().is_external_part( point );
4932  };
4933 
4934  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
4935  to_towing ? _( "Attach cable to the vehicle that will do the towing." ) :
4936  _( "Attach cable to the vehicle that will be towed." ), "", can_link, false, false );
4937  if( !pnt_ ) {
4938  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4939  return std::nullopt;
4940  }
4941  const tripoint &selection = *pnt_;
4942  const optional_vpart_position sel_vp = here.veh_at( selection );
4943  if( !sel_vp ) {
4944  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There's no vehicle there." ) );
4945  return std::nullopt;
4946  }
4947 
4948  if( it.has_no_links() ) {
4949 
4950  // Starting a new tow cable connection.
4951  ret_val<void> result = it.link_to( sel_vp, link_state::vehicle_tow );
4952  if( !result.success() ) {
4953  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, result.str() );
4954  return 0;
4955  }
4956  if( to_towing ) {
4957  it.link().source = link_state::vehicle_tow;
4958  it.link().target = link_state::no_link;
4959  } else {
4960  it.link().source = link_state::no_link;
4961  it.link().target = link_state::vehicle_tow;
4962  }
4963 
4964  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You connect the %1$s to the %2$s." ), it.type_name(),
4965  sel_vp->vehicle().name );
4966 
4967  it.process( here, p, p->pos() );
4968  p->mod_moves( -move_cost );
4969  return 0;
4970 
4971  } else {
4972 
4973  // Connecting two vehicles with tow cable.
4974  ret_val<void> result = it.link_to( sel_vp, link_state::vehicle_tow );
4975  if( !result.success() ) {
4976  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, result.str() );
4977  return 0;
4978  }
4979  if( p->has_item( it ) ) {
4980  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, result.str() );
4981  }
4982 
4983  p->mod_moves( -move_cost );
4984  return 1; // Let the cable be destroyed.
4985  }
4986 }
4987 
4988 std::optional<int> link_up_actor::link_extend_cable( Character *p, item &it,
4989  const tripoint &pnt ) const
4990 {
4991  avatar *you = p->as_avatar();
4992  if( !you ) {
4993  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
4994  return std::nullopt;
4995  }
4996 
4997  const bool is_cable_item = it.has_flag( flag_CABLE_SPOOL );
4998  item_location selected;
4999  if( is_cable_item ) {
5000  const bool can_extend_devices = can_extend.find( "ELECTRICAL_DEVICES" ) != can_extend.end();
5001  const auto filter = [this, &it, &can_extend_devices]( const item & inv ) {
5002  if( !inv.can_link_up() || inv.link_has_state( link_state::needs_reeling ) ||
5003  ( !inv.has_flag( flag_CABLE_SPOOL ) && !can_extend_devices ) ) {
5004  return false;
5005  }
5006  return can_extend.find( inv.typeId().c_str() ) != can_extend.end() && &inv != &it;
5007  };
5008  selected = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( filter, *you, _( "Extend which cable?" ), -1,
5009  _( "You don't have a compatible cable." ) );
5010  } else {
5011  const auto filter = []( const item & inv ) {
5012  if( !inv.can_link_up() || inv.link_has_state( link_state::needs_reeling ) ||
5013  !inv.has_flag( flag_CABLE_SPOOL ) ) {
5014  return false;
5015  }
5016  const link_up_actor *actor = static_cast<const link_up_actor *>
5017  ( inv.get_use( "link_up" )->get_actor_ptr() );
5018  return actor->can_extend.find( "ELECTRICAL_DEVICES" ) != actor->can_extend.end();
5019  };
5020  selected = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( filter, *you, _( "Extend with which cable?" ), -1,
5021  _( "You don't have a compatible cable." ) );
5022  }
5023  if( !selected ) {
5024  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
5025  return std::nullopt;
5026  }
5027 
5028  item_location extension = is_cable_item ? form_loc( *p, pnt, it ) : selected;
5029  item_location extended = is_cable_item ? selected : form_loc( *p, pnt, it );
5030  std::optional<item> extended_copy;
5031 
5032  // We'll make a copy of the extended item and check pocket weight/volume capacity if:
5033  // 1. The extended item is in a container,
5034  // 2. The extended item and extension cord(s) aren't in the same pocket, and
5035  // 3. The extended item is in a pocket without enough remaining room for the extension cord(s).
5036  if( extended.where() == item_location::type::container &&
5037  extended.parent_pocket() != extension.parent_pocket() &&
5038  ( extended.volume_capacity() - extension->volume() < 0_ml ||
5039  extended.weight_capacity() - extension->weight() < 0_gram ) ) {
5040 
5041  extended_copy = *extended;
5042  }
5043 
5044  item *extended_ptr = extended_copy ? &extended_copy.value() : &*extended;
5045 
5046  // Put the extension cable and all of its attached cables, if any, into the extended item's CABLE pocket.
5047  std::vector<const item *> all_cables = extension->cables();
5048  all_cables.emplace_back( &*extension );
5049  for( const item *cable : all_cables ) {
5050  item cable_copy( *cable );
5051  cable_copy.get_contents().clear_items();
5052  cable_copy.reset_link();
5053  if( !extended_ptr->put_in( cable_copy, pocket_type::CABLE ).success() ) {
5054  debugmsg( "Failed to put %s inside %s!", cable_copy.type_name(), extended_ptr->type_name() );
5055  }
5056  }
5057  if( extension->has_link_data() ) {
5058  extended_ptr->link() = extension->link();
5059  }
5060  extended_ptr->update_link_traits();
5061  extended_ptr->process( get_map(), p, p->pos() );
5062 
5063  if( extended_copy ) {
5064  // Check if there's another pocket on the same container that can hold the extended item, respecting pocket settings.
5065  item_location parent = extended.parent_item();
5066  if( parent->can_contain( *extended_ptr, false, false, false, false,
5067  item_location(), 10000000_ml, false ).success() ) {
5068  if( !parent->put_in( *extended_ptr, pocket_type::CONTAINER ).success() ) {
5069  debugmsg( "Failed to put %s inside %s!", extended_ptr->type_name(),
5070  parent->type_name() );
5071  return std::nullopt;
5072  }
5073  } else {
5074  if( !query_yn( _( "The %1$s can't contain the %2$s with the %3$s attached. Continue?" ),
5075  parent->type_name(), extended_ptr->type_name(), extension->type_name() ) ) {
5076  return std::nullopt;
5077  }
5078  // Attach the cord, even though it won't fit, and let it spill out naturally.
5079  extended.parent_pocket()->add( *extended_ptr );
5080  }
5081  extended.make_active();
5082  extended.remove_item();
5083  }
5084 
5085  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You extend the %1$s with the %2$s." ),
5086  extended_ptr->link_name(), extension->type_name() );
5087  extension.remove_item();
5088  p->invalidate_inventory_validity_cache();
5089  p->drop_invalid_inventory();
5090  p->mod_moves( -move_cost );
5091  return 0;
5092 }
5093 
5094 std::optional<int> link_up_actor::remove_extensions( Character *p, item &it ) const
5095 {
5096  std::list<item *> all_cables = it.all_items_ptr( pocket_type::CABLE );
5097  all_cables.remove_if( []( const item * cable ) {
5098  return !cable->has_flag( flag_CABLE_SPOOL ) || !cable->can_link_up();
5099  } );
5100 
5101  if( all_cables.empty() ) {
5102  // Delete any non-cables that somehow got into the pocket.
5103  it.get_contents().clear_pockets_if( []( item_pocket const & pocket ) {
5104  return pocket.is_type( pocket_type::CABLE );
5105  } );
5106  return 0;
5107  }
5108 
5109  item cable_main_copy( *all_cables.back() );
5110  all_cables.pop_back();
5111  if( !all_cables.empty() ) {
5112  for( item *cable : all_cables ) {
5113  item cable_copy( *cable );
5114  cable_copy.get_contents().clear_items();
5115  cable_copy.reset_link();
5116  if( !cable_main_copy.put_in( cable_copy, pocket_type::CABLE ).success() ) {
5117  debugmsg( "Failed to put %s inside %s!", cable_copy.tname(), cable_main_copy.tname() );
5118  }
5119  }
5120  }
5121  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You disconnect the %1$s from the %2$s." ),
5122  cable_main_copy.type_name(), it.type_name() );
5123 
5124  it.get_contents().clear_pockets_if( []( item_pocket const & pocket ) {
5125  return pocket.is_type( pocket_type::CABLE );
5126  } );
5127 
5128  if( it.has_link_data() ) {
5129  // If the item was linked, keep the extension cables linked.
5130  cable_main_copy.link() = it.link();
5131  cable_main_copy.update_link_traits();
5132  cable_main_copy.process( get_map(), p, p->pos() );
5133  it.reset_link( true, p );
5134  }
5135 
5136  p->i_add_or_drop( cable_main_copy );
5137  p->mod_moves( -move_cost );
5138  return 0;
5139 }
5140 
5141 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> deploy_tent_actor::clone() const
5142 {
5143  return std::make_unique<deploy_tent_actor>( *this );
5144 }
5145 
5146 void deploy_tent_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
5147 {
5148  assign( obj, "radius", radius );
5149  assign( obj, "wall", wall );
5150  assign( obj, "floor", floor );
5151  assign( obj, "floor_center", floor_center );
5152  assign( obj, "door_opened", door_opened );
5153  assign( obj, "door_closed", door_closed );
5154  assign( obj, "broken_type", broken_type );
5155 }
5156 
5157 std::optional<int> deploy_tent_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
5158 {
5159  int diam = 2 * radius + 1;
5160  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
5161  return std::nullopt;
5162  }
5163  const std::optional<tripoint> dir = choose_direction( string_format(
5164  _( "Put up the %s where (%dx%d clear area)?" ), it.tname(), diam, diam ) );
5165  if( !dir ) {
5166  return std::nullopt;
5167  }
5168  const tripoint direction = *dir;
5169 
5170  map &here = get_map();
5171  // We place the center of the structure (radius + 1)
5172  // spaces away from the player.
5173  // First check there's enough room.
5174  const tripoint center = p->pos() + tripoint( ( radius + 1 ) * direction.x,
5175  ( radius + 1 ) * direction.y, 0 );
5176  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
5177  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius ) ) {
5178  if( const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( dest ) ) {
5179  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is in the way." ), vp->vehicle().name );
5180  return std::nullopt;
5181  }
5182  if( const Creature *const c = creatures.creature_at( dest ) ) {
5183  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is in the way." ), c->disp_name() );
5184  return std::nullopt;
5185  }
5186  if( here.impassable( dest ) || !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FLAT, dest ) ) {
5187  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s in that direction isn't suitable for placing the %s." ),
5188  here.name( dest ), it.tname() );
5189  return std::nullopt;
5190  }
5191  if( here.has_furn( dest ) ) {
5192  add_msg( m_info, _( "There is already furniture (%s) there." ), here.furnname( dest ) );
5193  return std::nullopt;
5194  }
5195  }
5196 
5197  //checks done start activity:
5198  tent_placement_activity_actor actor( to_moves<int>( 20_minutes ), direction, radius, it, wall,
5199  floor, floor_center, door_closed );
5200  get_player_character().assign_activity( actor );
5201  p->i_rem( &it );
5202  return 0;
5203 }
5204 
5205 bool deploy_tent_actor::check_intact( const tripoint &center ) const
5206 {
5207  map &here = get_map();
5208  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius ) ) {
5209  const furn_id fid = here.furn( dest );
5210  if( dest == center && floor_center ) {
5211  if( fid != *floor_center ) {
5212  return false;
5213  }
5214  } else if( square_dist( dest, center ) < radius ) {
5215  // So we are inside the tent
5216  if( fid != floor ) {
5217  return false;
5218  }
5219  } else {
5220  // We are on the border of the tent
5221  if( fid != wall && fid != door_opened && fid != door_closed ) {
5222  return false;
5223  }
5224  }
5225  }
5226  return true;
5227 }
5228 
5229 void weigh_self_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
5230 {
5231  dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5232  _( "Use this item to weigh yourself. Includes everything you are wearing." ) );
5233 }
5234 
5235 std::optional<int> weigh_self_actor::use( Character *p, item &, const tripoint & ) const
5236 {
5237  if( p->is_mounted() ) {
5238  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot weigh yourself while mounted." ) );
5239  return std::nullopt;
5240  }
5241  // this is a weight, either in kgs or in lbs.
5242  double weight = convert_weight( p->get_weight() );
5243  if( weight > convert_weight( max_weight ) ) {
5244  popup( _( "ERROR: Max weight of %.0f %s exceeded" ), convert_weight( max_weight ), weight_units() );
5245  } else {
5246  popup( "%.0f %s", weight, weight_units() );
5247  }
5248  return 0;
5249 }
5250 
5251 void weigh_self_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
5252 {
5253  assign( jo, "max_weight", max_weight );
5254 }
5255 
5256 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> weigh_self_actor::clone() const
5257 {
5258  return std::make_unique<weigh_self_actor>( *this );
5259 }
5260 
5261 void sew_advanced_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
5262 {
5263  // Mandatory:
5264  for( const std::string line : obj.get_array( "materials" ) ) {
5265  materials.emplace( line );
5266  }
5267  for( const std::string line : obj.get_array( "clothing_mods" ) ) {
5268  clothing_mods.emplace_back( line );
5269  }
5270 
5271  // TODO: Make skill non-mandatory while still erroring on invalid skill
5272  const std::string skill_string = obj.get_string( "skill" );
5273  used_skill = skill_id( skill_string );
5274  if( !used_skill.is_valid() ) {
5275  obj.throw_error_at( "skill", "Invalid skill" );
5276  }
5277 }
5278 
5279 std::optional<int> sew_advanced_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
5280 {
5281  if( p->is_npc() ) {
5282  return std::nullopt;
5283  }
5284  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
5285  return std::nullopt;
5286  }
5287  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
5288  return std::nullopt;
5289  }
5290 
5291  if( p->fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
5292  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't see to sew!" ) );
5293  return std::nullopt;
5294  }
5295 
5296  auto filter = [this]( const item & itm ) {
5297  return itm.is_armor() && !itm.is_firearm() && !itm.is_power_armor() && !itm.is_gunmod() &&
5298  itm.made_of_any( materials ) && !itm.has_flag( flag_INTEGRATED );
5299  };
5300  // note: if !p.is_npc() then p is avatar.
5301  item_location loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu(
5302  filter, *p->as_avatar(), _( "Enhance which clothing?" ) );
5303  if( !loc ) {
5304  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have that item!" ) );
5305  return std::nullopt;
5306  }
5307  item &mod = *loc;
5308  if( &mod == &it ) {
5309  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
5310  _( "This can be used to repair or modify other items, not itself." ) );
5311  return std::nullopt;
5312  }
5313 
5314  // Gives us an item with the mod added or removed (toggled)
5315  const auto modded_copy = []( const item & proto, const flag_id & mod_type ) {
5316  item mcopy = proto;
5317  if( mcopy.has_own_flag( mod_type ) == 0 ) {
5318  mcopy.set_flag( mod_type );
5319  } else {
5320  mcopy.unset_flag( mod_type );
5321  }
5322 
5323  return mcopy;
5324  };
5325 
5326  // Cache available materials
5327  std::map< itype_id, bool > has_enough;
5328  const int items_needed = mod.base_volume() / 750_ml + 1;
5329  const inventory &crafting_inv = p->crafting_inventory();
5330  const std::function<bool( const item & )> is_filthy_filter = is_crafting_component;
5331 
5332  // Go through all discovered repair items and see if we have any of them available
5333  for( const clothing_mod &cm : clothing_mods::get_all() ) {
5334  has_enough[cm.item_string] = crafting_inv.has_amount( cm.item_string, items_needed, false,
5335  is_filthy_filter );
5336  }
5337 
5338  int mod_count = 0;
5339  for( const clothing_mod &cm : clothing_mods::get_all() ) {
5340  mod_count += mod.has_own_flag( cm.flag );
5341  }
5342 
5343  // We need extra thread to lose it on bad rolls
5344  const int thread_needed = mod.base_volume() / 125_ml + 10;
5345 
5346  const auto valid_mods = mod.find_armor_data()->valid_mods;
5347 
5348  const auto get_compare_color = [&]( const float before, const float after,
5349  const bool higher_is_better ) {
5350  return before == after ? c_unset : ( ( after > before ) == higher_is_better ? c_light_green :
5351  c_red );
5352  };
5353 
5354  uilist tmenu;
5355  tmenu.text = _( "How do you want to modify it?" );
5356 
5357  int index = 0;
5358  for( const clothing_mod_id &cm : clothing_mods ) {
5359  clothing_mod obj = cm.obj();
5360  item temp_item = modded_copy( mod, obj.flag );
5361  temp_item.update_clothing_mod_val();
5362 
5363  bool enab = false;
5364  std::string prompt;
5365  if( !mod.has_own_flag( obj.flag ) ) {
5366  // Mod not already present, check if modification is possible
5367  if( obj.restricted &&
5368  std::find( valid_mods.begin(), valid_mods.end(), obj.flag.str() ) == valid_mods.end() ) {
5369  //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$s: mod name
5370  prompt = string_format( _( "Can't %1$s (incompatible with %2$s)" ),
5371  lowercase_first_letter( obj.implement_prompt.translated() ),
5372  mod.tname( 1, false ) );
5373  } else if( !it.ammo_sufficient( p, thread_needed ) ) {
5374  //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$d: number of thread needed
5375  prompt = string_format( _( "Can't %1$s (need %2$d thread loaded)" ),
5376  lowercase_first_letter( obj.implement_prompt.translated() ), thread_needed );
5377  } else if( !has_enough[obj.item_string] ) {
5378  //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$d: number of items needed, %3$s: items needed
5379  prompt = string_format( _( "Can't %1$s (need %2$d %3$s)" ),
5380  lowercase_first_letter( obj.implement_prompt.translated() ),
5381  items_needed, item::nname( obj.item_string, items_needed ) );
5382  } else {
5383  // Modification is possible
5384  enab = true;
5385  //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$d: number of items needed, %3$s: items needed, %4$s: number of thread needed
5386  prompt = string_format( _( "%1$s (%2$d %3$s and %4$d thread)" ),
5387  lowercase_first_letter( obj.implement_prompt.translated() ),
5388  items_needed, item::nname( obj.item_string, items_needed ), thread_needed );
5389  }
5390 
5391  } else {
5392  // Mod already present, give option to destroy
5393  enab = true;
5394  prompt = obj.destroy_prompt.translated();
5395  }
5396  std::string desc;
5397  // FIXME: Remove sew_advanced_actor, no longer used since before 0.G
5398  desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %.2f->%.2f\n", _( "Bash" ), mod.resist( damage_bash ),
5399  temp_item.resist( damage_bash ) ), get_compare_color( mod.resist( damage_bash ),
5400  temp_item.resist( damage_bash ), true ) );
5401  desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %.2f->%.2f\n", _( "Cut" ), mod.resist( damage_cut ),
5402  temp_item.resist( damage_cut ) ), get_compare_color( mod.resist( damage_cut ),
5403  temp_item.resist( damage_cut ), true ) );
5404  desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %.2f->%.2f\n", _( "Ballistic" ),
5405  mod.resist( damage_bullet ),
5406  temp_item.resist( damage_bullet ) ), get_compare_color( mod.resist( damage_bullet ),
5407  temp_item.resist( damage_bullet ),
5408  true ) );
5409  desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %.2f->%.2f\n", _( "Acid" ), mod.resist( damage_acid ),
5410  temp_item.resist( damage_acid ) ), get_compare_color( mod.resist( damage_acid ),
5411  temp_item.resist( damage_acid ), true ) );
5412  desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %.2f->%.2f\n", _( "Fire" ), mod.resist( damage_heat ),
5413  temp_item.resist( damage_heat ) ), get_compare_color( mod.resist( damage_heat ),
5414  temp_item.resist( damage_heat ), true ) );
5415  desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %d->%d\n", _( "Warmth" ), mod.get_warmth(),
5416  temp_item.get_warmth() ), get_compare_color( mod.get_warmth(), temp_item.get_warmth(), true ) );
5417  desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %d->%d\n", _( "Encumbrance" ), mod.get_avg_encumber( *p ),
5418  temp_item.get_avg_encumber( *p ) ), get_compare_color( mod.get_avg_encumber( *p ),
5419  temp_item.get_avg_encumber( *p ), false ) );
5420 
5421  tmenu.addentry_desc( index++, enab, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, prompt, desc );
5422  }
5423  tmenu.textwidth = 80;
5424  tmenu.desc_enabled = true;
5425  tmenu.query();
5426  const int choice = tmenu.ret;
5427 
5428  if( choice < 0 || choice >= static_cast<int>( clothing_mods.size() ) ) {
5429  return std::nullopt;
5430  }
5431 
5432  // The mod player picked
5433  const flag_id &the_mod = clothing_mods[choice].obj().flag;
5434 
5435  // If the picked mod already exists, player wants to destroy it
5436  if( mod.has_own_flag( the_mod ) ) {
5437  if( query_yn( _( "Are you sure? You will not gain any materials back." ) ) ) {
5438  mod.unset_flag( the_mod );
5439  }
5440  mod.update_clothing_mod_val();
5441 
5442  return 0;
5443  }
5444 
5445  // Get the id of the material used
5446  const itype_id &repair_item = clothing_mods[choice].obj().item_string;
5447 
5448  std::vector<item_comp> comps;
5449  comps.emplace_back( repair_item, items_needed );
5450  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 30_seconds * p->fine_detail_vision_mod() ) );
5451  p->practice( used_skill, items_needed * 3 + 3 );
5452  /** @EFFECT_TAILOR randomly improves clothing modification efforts */
5453  int rn = dice( 3, 2 + round( p->get_skill_level( used_skill ) ) ); // Skill
5454  /** @EFFECT_DEX randomly improves clothing modification efforts */
5455  rn += rng( 0, p->dex_cur / 2 ); // Dexterity
5456  /** @EFFECT_PER randomly improves clothing modification efforts */
5457  rn += rng( 0, p->per_cur / 2 ); // Perception
5458  rn -= mod_count * 10; // Other mods
5459 
5460  if( rn <= 8 ) {
5461  const std::string startdurability = mod.durability_indicator( true );
5462  const bool destroyed = mod.inc_damage();
5463  const std::string resultdurability = mod.durability_indicator( true );
5464  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You damage your %s trying to modify it! ( %s-> %s)" ),
5465  mod.tname( 1, false ), startdurability, resultdurability );
5466  if( destroyed ) {
5467  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You destroy it!" ) );
5468  p->i_rem_keep_contents( &mod );
5469  p->calc_encumbrance();
5470  p->calc_discomfort();
5471  }
5472  return thread_needed / 2;
5473  } else if( rn <= 10 ) {
5474  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
5475  _( "You fail to modify the clothing, and you waste thread and materials." ) );
5476  p->consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
5477  return thread_needed;
5478  } else if( rn <= 14 ) {
5479  p->add_msg_if_player( m_mixed, _( "You modify your %s, but waste a lot of thread." ),
5480  mod.tname() );
5481  p->consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
5482  mod.set_flag( the_mod );
5483  mod.update_clothing_mod_val();
5484  p->calc_encumbrance();
5485  p->calc_discomfort();
5486  return thread_needed;
5487  }
5488 
5489  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You modify your %s!" ), mod.tname() );
5490  mod.set_flag( the_mod );
5491  mod.update_clothing_mod_val();
5492  p->consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
5493  p->calc_encumbrance();
5494  p->calc_discomfort();
5495  return thread_needed / 2;
5496 }
5497 
5498 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> sew_advanced_actor::clone() const
5499 {
5500  return std::make_unique<sew_advanced_actor>( *this );
5501 }
5502 
5503 void change_scent_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
5504 {
5505  scenttypeid = scenttype_id( obj.get_string( "scent_typeid" ) );
5506  if( !scenttypeid.is_valid() ) {
5507  obj.throw_error_at( "scent_typeid", "Invalid scent type id." );
5508  }
5509  if( obj.has_array( "effects" ) ) {
5510  for( JsonObject e : obj.get_array( "effects" ) ) {
5511  effects.push_back( load_effect_data( e ) );
5512  }
5513  }
5514  assign( obj, "moves", moves );
5515  assign( obj, "charges_to_use", charges_to_use );
5516  assign( obj, "scent_mod", scent_mod );
5517  assign( obj, "duration", duration );
5518  assign( obj, "waterproof", waterproof );
5519 }
5520 
5521 std::optional<int> change_scent_iuse::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
5522 {
5523  p->set_value( "prev_scent", p->get_type_of_scent().c_str() );
5524  if( waterproof ) {
5525  p->set_value( "waterproof_scent", "true" );
5526  }
5527  p->add_effect( effect_masked_scent, duration, false, scent_mod );
5528  p->set_type_of_scent( scenttypeid );
5529  p->mod_moves( -moves );
5530  add_msg( m_info, _( "You use the %s to mask your scent" ), it.tname() );
5531 
5532  // Apply the various effects.
5533  for( const effect_data &eff : effects ) {
5534  p->add_effect( eff.id, eff.duration, eff.bp, eff.permanent );
5535  }
5536  return charges_to_use;
5537 }
5538 
5539 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> change_scent_iuse::clone() const
5540 {
5541  return std::make_unique<change_scent_iuse>( *this );
5542 }
5543 
5544 std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> effect_on_conditons_actor::clone() const
5545 {
5546  return std::make_unique<effect_on_conditons_actor>( *this );
5547 }
5548 
5549 void effect_on_conditons_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
5550 {
5551  obj.read( "description", description );
5552  obj.read( "menu_text", menu_text );
5553  for( JsonValue jv : obj.get_array( "effect_on_conditions" ) ) {
5554  eocs.emplace_back( effect_on_conditions::load_inline_eoc( jv, "" ) );
5555  }
5556 }
5557 
5558 std::string effect_on_conditons_actor::get_name() const
5559 {
5560  if( !menu_text.empty() ) {
5561  return menu_text.translated();
5562  }
5563  return iuse_actor::get_name();
5564 }
5565 
5566 void effect_on_conditons_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
5567 {
5568  dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", description.translated() );
5569 }
5570 
5571 std::optional<int> effect_on_conditons_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
5572  const tripoint & ) const
5573 {
5574  if( !p ) {
5575  debugmsg( "%s called action effect_on_conditons that requires character but no character is present",
5576  it.typeId().str() );
5577  return std::nullopt;
5578  }
5579 
5580  Character *char_ptr = nullptr;
5581  if( avatar *u = p->as_avatar() ) {
5582  char_ptr = u;
5583  } else if( npc *n = p->as_npc() ) {
5584  char_ptr = n;
5585  }
5586 
5587  item_location loc( *p->as_character(), &it );
5588  dialogue d( get_talker_for( char_ptr ), get_talker_for( loc ) );
5589  write_var_value( var_type::context, "npctalk_var_id", &d, it.typeId().str() );
5590  for( const effect_on_condition_id &eoc : eocs ) {
5591  if( eoc->type == eoc_type::ACTIVATION ) {
5592  eoc->activate( d );
5593  } else {
5594  debugmsg( "Must use an activation eoc for activation. If you don't want the effect_on_condition to happen on its own (without the item's involvement), remove the recurrence min and max. Otherwise, create a non-recurring effect_on_condition for this item with its condition and effects, then have a recurring one queue it." );
5595  }
5596  }
5597  // Prevents crash from trying to spend charge with item removed
5598  if( !p->has_item( it ) ) {
5599  return 0;
5600  }
5601  return 1;
5602 }
